translation.en: They were arrested while on duty in one of the Islands on Lake Victoria.
translation.lug: Baakwatibwa nga bali ku mulimu ku kimu ku bizinga ku nnyanja Nalubaale.

translation.en: They were sent to Makindye Military barracks and jailed for four years without any substantial reason.
translation.lug: Baasindikibwa mu nkambi y'amagye y'e Makindye ne basibibwa emyaka ena nga tewali nsonga ya ssimba.

translation.en: They single out the brutal hacking of the late Abbas Kagimu where until to date no culprit had been brought to book, and his family is suffering.
translation.lug: Banokolayo obutemu obwakolebwa ku mugenzi Abbas Kagimu nga n'okutuusa kati tewaliiwo yali avunaaniddwa era famire ye ekyabonaabona.

translation.en: Sheikh Haidari Sserwanga Bukenya and Maneno Majaliwa were granted amnesty.
translation.lug: Sheik Haidari Sserwanga Bukenya ne Maneno Majaliwa baasonyiyibwa emisango.

translation.en: They are still being held in Luzira prison even after being cleared by the General Court Martial.
translation.lug: Bakyakuumibwa mu kkomera e Luzira newankubadde nga baateebwa kkooti y'amagye.

translation.en: Their fate now is impending clearance by Chieftaincy of Military intelligence agency which has up to now failed to act.
translation.lug: Okusalawo ku nsonga yaabwe kulindiridde okusalawo kw'akulira ebyobukessi okutannakolebwa n'okutuuka kati.

translation.en: They also talk about the unlawful arrest of Lukwebe's wife and other female suspects because of their husbands' involvement in ADF rebel activities.
translation.lug: Era boogera ku kukwatibwa kwa mukyala wa Lukwebe n'abakyala abalala olw'abaami baabwe okwenyigira mu bikolwa bya ADF eby'obuyeekera.

translation.en: On 3rd February 2004, they had an audience with His Excellency the President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
translation.lug: Nga 3 Ogwokubiri, 2004, baasisinkana n'Oweekitiibwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.

translation.en: The former Uganda People's Defense Force Chief of Staff Joshua Masaba discussed the ADF reporters' grievances with the president.
translation.lug: Eyali akulira abakozi mu ggye lya Uganda People's Defense Force, Joshua Masaba yayogera ku butakkaanya bw'abasasi b'amawulire ba ADF ne Pulezidenti.

translation.en: The President, through the former Minister of State for Security Betty Akech directed for the release of Majaliwa and Sheik Haidari Sserwanga Bukenya.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti, ng'ayita mu eyali minisita omubeezi ow'ebyokwerinda Betty Akech yalagira okuteebwa kwa Majaliwa ne Sheik Haidari Sserwanga Bukenya.

translation.en: They worked as a team by conducting mass mobilisation to convince other Allied Democratic Forces combatants to renounce the rebellion.
translation.lug: Baakolera wamu nga ttiimu nga bakunga abantu okumatiza abaaliko abalwanyi ba Allied Democratic Forces okulangirira nti bavudde mu kwegugunga.

translation.en: That the Allied Democratic Forces Reporters representing office should have an audience with the Chieftaincy leadership.
translation.lug: Woofiisi y'abanoonya amawulire agakwata ku Allied Democratic Forces balina okuba n'olukiiko n'abakulira amagye.

translation.en: They have issues with the former Uganda National Rescue Font ll of Ali Bamuze and Uganda National Freedom Army of Muhammed Kiggundu.
translation.lug: Balina obutakkaanya n'eyali Uganda National Rescue Front II eya Ali Bamuze ne Uganda National Freedom Army eya Muhammed Kiggundu.

translation.en: They appealed to the government to recognise them and the current leadership of Allied Democratic Forces reporters.
translation.lug: Baasaba gavumenti okubakkiriza mu butongole n'obukulembeze bw'amawulire ga Allied Democratic Forces obuliko.

translation.en: Build confidence and relationship between government and Allied Democratic Forces reporters in the country.
translation.lug: Okuzimba obuvumu n'enkolagana wakati wa gavumenti n'abasasi b'amawulire ga Allied Democratic Forces mu ggwanga.

translation.en: They assist the government in its bid for peace negotiations with ADF combatants still in the bush, ending war and fighting terrorism.
translation.lug: Bayambako gavumenti mu nteekateeka zaayo ez'enteeseganya ez'emirembe n'abalwanyi ba ADF abakyali mu nsiko okukomya olutalo n'okulwanisa obutujju.

translation.en: That warn that eighty per cent of Allied Democratic Forces returnees are still in their youthful age.
translation.lug: Ekyo kiwabula nti ebitundu kinaana ku kikumi by'abalwanyi ba Allied Democratic Forces abaakomawo bakyali mu myaka gyabwe egy'obuvuka.

translation.en: The Uganda National Rescue Front II returnees are older and above 50 years.
translation.lug: Aba Uganda Rescue Front II abaakomawo bakuluko era basukka emyaka 50.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces returnees are still young, swift and vigilant to be employed for more hardships.
translation.lug: Abalwanyi ba Allied Democratic Forces abaakomawo bakyali bato, bangu ate bakalabakalaba okuweebwa emirimu emirala emikakali.

translation.en: They call upon the government to desist from mistreating them and should be dully considered like other returnees and UPDF soldiers.
translation.lug: Bakubira gavumenti omulanga okukomya okubatulugunya era balina okutwalibwa mg'abaakomawo abalala oba abasirikale ba UPDF.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces include combatants in the Democratic Republic of Congo, returnees who got amnesty and Muslim youths.
translation.lug: Abajaasi ba Allied Democratic Forces mulimu abaalwanirako mu Democratic Republic of Congo, abaakomawo ne baweebwa obubudamo n'abavuka Abasiraamu.

translation.en: Dealing with this group requires a lot of experience, that's why there has been continued recruitment into ADF to date, especially in the Eastern region.
translation.lug: Okukolagana n'ekibinja kino kyetaaga obumanyirivu bungi, Eno y'ensonga lwaki wabaddewo okuyingiza mu okutakoma mu ADF naddala mu kitundu ky'e buvanjuba.

translation.en: Most of these Muslim youths, though not much educated are aware of the new Islamic resurrection in the world.
translation.lug: Abasinga ku bavubuka bano Abasiraamu, wadde nga tebaasoma nnyo bamanyi ku kweyubula ky'obusiraamu okuggya mu nsi.

translation.en: The Muslim youths are also aware of the American invasion of Iraq, Afghanistan and the events taking place in Somalia.
translation.lug: Abavubuka Abasiraamu nabo bamanyi ku bulumbaganyi America bwe yakola ku Iraq, Afghanistan n'ebyo ebigenda mu maaso mu Somalia.

translation.en: The former Container Village meant for Allied Democratic Force mobilisation office to be re-established and reinstated.
translation.lug: Eyali Container Village eteekeddwa kuba woofiisi y'okukunga aba Allied Democratic Force yaakuzzibwawo era ezzibwemu ebintu.

translation.en: It will be done as was the case during the late Twatera's time, to enable them to perform normal operations.
translation.lug: Kijja kukolebwa nga bwe kyali ebiseera by'omugenzi Twatera nga biggwako, okubasobozesa okukola ebikwekweto ebya bulijjo.

translation.en: The Independent issue of July 2010, says that the office which mainly comprised of Allied Democratic Forces reporters was strategically put in place.
translation.lug: Independent eyafuluma mu Gwomunaana 2010, gagamba woofiisi y'abasaka amawulire ku Allied Democratic Forces yateekebwawo mu kifo ekirungi.

translation.en: There is an office coordinating up the dealings and conduct of Allied Democratic Force reporters to Chieftaincy of Military Intelligence.
translation.lug: Waliwo woofiisi ekola ku bikolwa n'enneeyisa y'abasasi b'amawulire ga Allied Democratic Forces etuusa obubaka ew'akulira obukessi mu magye.

translation.en: There is a reception centre meant to receive Allied Democratic Force members who have renounced rebellion.
translation.lug: Waliwo ekifo ewatuukirwa ekirina okwaniriza abammemba ba Allied Democratic Force abalangiridde nti bavudde mu buyeekera.

translation.en: The office also does counselling, recovering arms and reuniting ADF members with their family members, and assisting them in getting amnesty.
translation.lug: Woofiisi era ekola okubudaabuda, okuzuula ebyokulwanyisa n'okudda okutabaganya bammemba ba ADF n'abenganda zaabwe kko n'okubayamba okufuna we babeera.

translation.en: They monitor activities of former Allied Democratic Force, Salaf and Tablique Muslims in eighteen districts in Uganda.
translation.lug: Balondoola emirimu egy'abaaliko abajaasi ba Allied Democratic Forces, Salaf n'Abasiraamu ba Tablique mu disitulikiti kkumi na munaana mu Uganda.

translation.en: Doing intelligence networking, tracking and surveillance missions on Allied Democratic Fund plan and activities.
translation.lug: Okukola obukessi, okulondoola n'okulabiriza ebigendererwa bya Allied Democratic Fund enteekateeka n'emirimu gyabwe.

translation.en: Countrywide mass mobilisation, sensitisation programmes for the Presidential campaigns and other elections.
translation.lug: Okukunga abantu okwetooloola, okubamanyisa ku nteekateeka ya kakuyege w'obwapulezidenti n'okulonda okulala.

translation.en: The ADF reporters should be considered for enrolment into Uganda People's Defense Force with their respective ranks while in the bush maintained.
translation.lug: Abasasi b'amawulire ba ADF balina okulowoozebwa okuyingizibwa mu Uganda People's Defense era bayingirire ku lanka zaabwe ze babadde nazo nga bali mu nsiko.

translation.en: The financial assistance and resettlement package for Allied Democratic Force reporters is clearly stipulated in the Amnesty Act of 2000.
translation.lug: Obuyambi bw'ensimbi n'enteekateeka z'okuwa ababadde basaka amawulire ga Allied Democratic Force n'okuddamu okuwa amayumba aw'okubeera eragibwa bulungi mu tteeka ly'okusenza abaaliko abalwanyi.

translation.en: They seek approval from the Chieftaincy of Military Intelligence and government to help them form an Organisation for Amnesty beneficiaries.
translation.lug: Basaba okukakasibwa kw'omukungu akulira eby'obukessi mu magye ne gavumenti okubayamba okubateeerawo ekibiina ekiganyula abasonyiyiddwa gavumenti.

translation.en: Once they become registered and legally recognised they can lobby and solicit funds from Non-Government Organizations, and donor agencies.
translation.lug: Bwe bamala okwewandiisa n'okukkirizibwa obulungi mu mateeka olwo basobola okusaka n'okukungaanya obuyambi okuva mu bitongole eby'obwannakyewa n'ebigabi by'obuyambi.

translation.en: They still remain a peaceful community that has worked with the Chieftaincy of Military Intelligence despite several shortcomings.
translation.lug: Basigala nga bantu ba ddembe abakolaganye n'ekitongole ky'amagye eky'obukessi wadde nga waliwo obuzibu obutali bumu.

translation.en: Grievances and displeasure were exhibited by the former Allied Democratic Force reporters and were spearheaded by a few individuals.
translation.lug: Obutakkaanya n'obutali bumativu byeyolekedde mu baaliko abasasi b'amawulire ga Allied Democratic Forces era kwakuliddwamu abantu abatonotono.

translation.en: Some of the Allied Democratic Force reporters stubbornly refused to enrol and train to become Uganda People's Defense Force soldiers.
translation.lug: Abamu ku basaka amawulire ga Allied Democratic Forces mu ffujjo yagaanye okwewandiisa n'okutendekebwa okufuuka abajaasi ba Uganda People's Defense Force.

translation.en: This has made it difficult for some of them to easily access Uganda People's Defense Force salary loans, promotions, and gratuity.
translation.lug: Kino kizibuwalizza abamu ku bo okufuna omusaala gwa Uganda People's Defense, okwewola, okukuzibwa n'obusiimo.

translation.en: A substantial number of the willing and disciplined former Allied Democratic Force reporters were trained and integrated into UPDF.
translation.lug: Omuwendo omunene ogw'abaali abasasi b'amawulire ga Allied Democratic Forces baatendekebwa ne bayingizibwa mu UPDF.

translation.en: Munyoro, Yahaya Sendi, Sadat Kinobe, Kakaire Badru, Mucunguzi Tadeo, Tumwiine Kamada, and Nakawooya Amina were recruited in UPDF.
translation.lug: Munyoro, Yahaya, Sendi, Sadat Kinobe, Kakaire Badru, Mucunguzi Tadeo, Tumwiine Kamada ne Nakawooya Amina baayingiziddwa mu UPDF.

translation.en: The office at Kitante for carrying out Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force of Uganda operations was turned into Department of Operations at headquarters.
translation.lug: Woofiisi y'e Kitante eyali ekola ku kulwanyisa obutujju mu Uganda yakyusibwa n'efuuka Department of Operations era esangibwa ku kitebe ekikulu.

translation.en: The current Ghanaian Electoral Commission members have presided over elections for sometime now.
translation.lug: Bammemba b'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda akaliko mu Ghana babadde mu kulonda okumala ebbanga eriwera kati.

translation.en: The interparty Advisory Committee oversees the activities of Ghana's Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Akakiiko akawabula ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi kalondoola emirimu gy'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda mu Ghana.

translation.en: The interparty Advisory Committee is an informal, non legislated body of representative of all registered political parties.
translation.lug: Akakiiko akawabula ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi tekali mu mateeka, si kibiina ekiwandiise ekiriko abakiise bonna ab'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: It ensures the active involvement and constructive engagement of parties in designing and implementing the Electoral Commission programmes.
translation.lug: Kifaayo okulaba ng'ebibiina byebata butereevu mu kukola n'okuteekesa mu nkola pulogulaamu z'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: South Africa's Electoral Commission is appointed by the President upon recommendation of a committee of the National Assembly.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda aka South Africa kalondebwa Pulezidenti oluvannyuma lw'okusembebwa akakiiko k'eggwanga.

translation.en: Recommendations are made from a list of candidates prepared by a panel of representatives from the other institutions supporting democracy.
translation.lug: Okusembebwa kukolebwa okuva mu lukalala lw'abantu olutegekebwa abakaka okuva mu bitongole ebiwagira demokolasiya.

translation.en: Institutions supporting democracy are the Human Rights Commission, the Constitutional Court, and the Commission on Gender Equality.
translation.lug: Ebitongole ebiwagira dimokulasiya kuliko; Ekitongole ekitakabanira eddembe ly'obuntu, Kkooti ya ssemateeka n'ekitongole ky'ekikula ky'abantu.

translation.en: Recently the InterParty Organisation of Dialogue member party secretary generals visited Malawi.
translation.lug: Gyebuvuddeko, ssaabawandiisi w'omukago ogugatta ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebirina ababaka mu Paalamenti yakyalako e Malawi.

translation.en: They visited Malawi to study how its Electoral Commission has organised agreeable elections.
translation.lug: Baakyalako e Malawi okuyiga engeri akakiiko kaayo ak'ebyokulonda gye kaategekamu okulonda okukkirizika.

translation.en: Mathias Nsubuga was the chairman InterParty Organisation for Dialogue.
translation.lug: Mathias Nsubuga ye yali ssentebe w'omukago ogugatta ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebirina ababaka mu Paalamenti.

translation.en: The Malawi experience is the best solution Uganda should adopt to end its election related conflicts according to Mathias Nsubuga.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Mathias Msubuga, mbeera Malawi gy'eyitamu ly'eddagala erisinga Uganda ly'erina okufuna okusobola okukomya obululu obulimu obukuubagano.

translation.en: Basing on Malawi's procedure of constituting the Electoral Commission, Nsubuga believes Uganda can get an all inclusive Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku ngeri Malawi gey'okulonda akakiiko k'ebyokulonda, Nsubuga akkiriza nti Uganda esobola okufuna akakiiko k'ebyokulonda aka bonna.

translation.en: He said parties would organise a meeting of InterParty Organisation for Dialogue's highest body.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ebibiina okutegeka olukiiko n'abakungu b'omukago ogugatta ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebirina ababaka mu Paalamenti aba waggulu.

translation.en: The reason for calling for independent bodies to appoint the Electoral Commission is to ensure the commissioners' loyalty to the country.
translation.lug: Ensonga ey'okuteekawo ebitongole ebyetengeredde okulonda akakiiko k'ebyokulonda, kwe kukakasa obwesimbu bwa kamisona eri eggwanga.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission ensures that the commissioners' loyalty is not to the president, but to the country.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kafa nti obwesimbu bwa kamisona si bwa Pulezidenti, naye eri ggwanga.

translation.en: Fewer African presidents are willing to give up the power to appoint electoral commissioners.
translation.lug: Bapulezidenti ba Afirika batono abeetegefu okuwaayo obyinza eri ba kamisona b'ebyokulonda abalondeddwa.

translation.en: People in the electoral commission are increasingly becoming Africa's kingmakers.
translation.lug: Abantu abali mu kakiiko k'ebyokulonda beeyongera okufuuka abasalawo ku abaani abajja mu buyinza mu Afirika.

translation.en: President Museveni said the current Electoral Commission team was vetted by parliament.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yagambye akakiiko k'ebyokulonda akaliko kaasusulwa Paalamenti.

translation.en: President Museveni had a meeting with the United States deputy secretariat of state Johnny Carson last month.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni omwezi oguwedde yalina olukiiko n'omumyuka w'omuwandiisi w'eggwandiisizo lya United States Johnny Carson.

translation.en: Daudi Migereko,the government's chief whip said Ugandans are ready and are used to holding regular elections.
translation.lug: Daudi Migereko nampala wa gavumneti, yagambye Bannayuganda beetegefu era baamanyiira okubeera n'okulonda okwabuli kaseera.

translation.en: He cannot afford to postpone the February two thousand eleven elections.
translation.lug: Tasobola kwongezaayo kulonda kw'Omugwokubiri mu nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: The Uganda constitution empowers the president to appoint the Electoral Commision.
translation.lug: Ssemateeka ya Uganda ewa Pulezidenti obuyinza okulonda akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: Allowing opposition parties' proposal to have the Judicial Service Commission appoint the Electoral Commission requires constitutional amendment.
translation.lug: Okukkiriza ekiteeso ky'ebibiina ebivuganya gavumenti okuwa akakiiko k'abalamuzi okulonda akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kyetaagisa okukola ennongoosereza mu ssemateeka.

translation.en: Uganda has held five elections since it attained independence in one thousand nine hundred sixty two.
translation.lug: Uganda yaakabeera n'okulonda kwa mirundi etaano okuva lwe yafuna obwetwaze mu lukumi mu lwenda mu nkaaga mu ebiri.

translation.en: Uganda has held five elections since it attained independence in one thousand nine hundred sixty two.
translation.lug: Uganda yaakayimirizaawo okulonda kwa mirundi etaano okuva lwe yafuna obwetwaze mu lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu bbiri.

translation.en: The first post independence elections to be organised were by the Military Commission headed by Paulo Muwanga.
translation.lug: Okulonda okwasooka okutegekebwa oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obwetwaze kwali kw'akiiko k'amagye akaakulemberwa Paul Muwanga.

translation.en: Yoweri Museveni was the Minister of Defence in December one thousand nine hundred eighty.
translation.lug: Yoweri Museveni ye yali minisita w'ebyokwerinda mu Ntenvu mu lukumi mu lwenda mu kinaana.

translation.en: Vincent Sekkono was the secretary to the Electoral Commission chaired by Kikira, a former district commissioner.
translation.lug: Vincent Sekkono ye yali omuwandiisi w'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda akaali kakulirwa Kakira, eyali kamisona wa disitulikiti.

translation.en: Kikira was allegedly a Uganda People's Congress card holder and die hard.
translation.lug: Kikira kigambibwa nti yali muwagizi nnyo wa Uganda People's Congress era yalina kaadi yaayo.

translation.en: The commissioners were appointed with the approval of the Military Commission, making its members part of the electoral process.
translation.lug: Bakamisona balondebwanga oluvannyuma lw'okukakasibwa akakiiko k'amagye, ekifuuma bammemba baako ekitundu ku nteekateeka y'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: The election outcome surprisingly was disputed by Museveni who was a member of the Military Commission.
translation.lug: Ebyava mu kulonda kyewuunyisa Museveni eyali mmemba ku kakiiko k'amagye teyakkiriziganya nabyo.

translation.en: The one thousand nine hundred eighty one National Resistance Army freedom fighters war brought Museveni in power.
translation.lug: Olutalo lw'abalwanirizi b'eddembe aba National Resistance Army lukumi mu lwenda mu kinaana mu omu baaleeta Museveni mu buyinza.

translation.en: Museveni came into power in one thousand eighty six.
translation.lug: Museveni yajja mu buyinza mu lukumi mu kinaana mu mukaaga.

translation.en: The next three elections to be held in Uganda were under the one party Movement system of governance.
translation.lug: Okulonda okw'emirundi esatu okwaddirira okutegekebwa mu Uganda kwali wansi wa mugendo gwa bibiina.

translation.en: The next three elections in one thousand nine hundred ninety four were for constituent Assembly and for presidency.
translation.lug: Okulonda okw'emirundi esatu mu lukumi mu lwenda kyenda mu ena kwali wa konsituwenti asembule n'okwa pulezidenti.

translation.en: One thousand nine hundred ninety four elections were organised to elect members to draft the one thousand nine hundred ninety five constitution.
translation.lug: Okulonda kwa mirundi lukumi mu lwenda kyenda mu ena kwategekebwa okulonda bammemba okubaga ssemateeka wa lukumi mu lwenda kyenda mu etaano.

translation.en: Museveni appointed his Ntare School old boy, Besweri Akabway, the chairman of the election.
translation.lug: Museveni yalonda menne gwe yasomakonaye Ntale School, Besweri Akabway okuba ssentebe w'okulonda.

translation.en: Another election was organised in one thousand nine hundred ninety six to elect the president and Members of Parliament.
translation.lug: Okulonda okulala kwategekebwa mu lukumi mu lwenda kyenda mu mukaaga okulonda Pulezidenti n'ababaka ba Paalamenti.

translation.en: Since one thousand nine hundred eighty, another general election was organised in one thousand nine hundred ninety six.
translation.lug: Okuva mu lukumi mu lwenda kinaana, okulonda kwa bonna okulala kwategekebwa mu lukumi mu lwenda kyenda mu mukaaga.

translation.en: Akabway again presided over the election.
translation.lug: Akabway era ye yakulemberamu okulonda.

translation.en: Akabway, an economist accountant now working with the Uganda Revenue Authority, was replaced before the two thousand one elections.
translation.lug: Akabway, omukugu mu by'okubalirira kati akola ne Uganda Revenue Authority, yakyusibwa ng'okulonda kwa nkumi bbiri mu gumu tekunnatuuka.

translation.en: In two thousand one general elections, Haji Aziz Kasujja, a banker, was the chairman of the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Mu kulonda okwa bonna okwa nkumi bbiri mu gumu, Haji Aziz Kasujja, omukozi w'omu bbanka, ye yali ssentebe w'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: The presidential election result was contested by Museveni's closest rival Kizza Besigye.
translation.lug: Ebyava mu kulonda kw'obwapulezidenti byawakanyizibwa eyali amuvuganya Museveni ow'okulusegere, Kizza Besigye

translation.en: The Supreme Court ruled that there had been massive rigging of the elections.
translation.lug: Kkooti ensukkulumi yasala nti waaliwo okubba obululu kungi.

translation.en: In two thousand six, a lecturer of mechanical engineering, Dr Badru Kiggundu, was appointed Electoral Commission chairman.
translation.lug: Mu nkumi bbiri mu mukaaga, omusomesa w'ebya yinginiya, Dr Badru Kiggundu, yalondebwa ku bwa ssentebe bw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: Museveni appointed Dr Badru Kiggundu to organise the elections in two thousand six.
translation.lug: Museveni yalonda Dokita Badru Kiggundu okutegeka okulonda kwa nkumi bbiri mu mukaaga.

translation.en: Again the presidential election results were contested by Kizza Besigye.
translation.lug: Era ebyava mu kulonda kw'obwa pulezidenti byawakanyizibwa Kizza Besigye.

translation.en: Like in the two thousand one ruling, the Supreme Court upheld, a four to three majority ruling.
translation.lug: Nga mu nsala ya nkumi bbiri mu gumu, kkooti ensukkulumu yakola okusalawo ng'abalamu abana baagamba nti okulonda kwali kutuufu ate abalamuzi abasatu ne bagamba nti tekwali kutuufu.

translation.en: I would not be surprised if a pathologist is appointed to carry out a postmortem on the two thousand sixteen elections.
translation.lug: Siyinza kwewuunya nga omusawo ku bireeta n'ebiva mu ndwadde ng'alondeddwa okukola okunoonyereza ku kulonda kwa nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na mukaaga.

translation.en: Dr. Frank Nabwiso was the interparty cooperation secretariat.
translation.lug: Dr. Frank Nabwiso ye yali omuwandiisi w'omukago gw'ebibiina.

translation.en: Observers say the partisan and rather unilateral appointment of the national electoral body is what has denied Uganda's elections credibility.
translation.lug: Abatunuulizi b'ensonga bagamba okulondebwa okulonda abantu abalina ebibiina bye bawagira era abaagala okwesasuza abalala kye kigaanye okulonda kwa Uganda okuba okw'omuzinzi.

translation.en: We have no local source and have to import from Europe.
translation.lug: Tetuyina we tuggya bintu kuno era tuyina biggya Bulaaya.

translation.en: The cost of freight particularly by road from the port of Mombasa to Kampala makes nonsense.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gw'entambuza y'ebintu naddala ku kkubo okuva ku mwalo gw'e Mombasa okudda e Kampala teguwa makulu.

translation.en: There is a very urgent need to fastrack the development of an efficient railway system to link Kampala and the Port.
translation.lug: Waliwo obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola ku nkulaakulana y'entambula y'eggaali y'omukka okuyunga Kampala ku mwalo.

translation.en: Cost of energy is very high, fuel oil, diesel and Uganda main electricity company and these remain a major factor of production.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gw'ebikozesebwa guli waggulu nnyo, amafuta, ddizero era ekitongole kya Uganda eky'amasanyalaze ekikulu era nga zino z'ensonga ezisinga okutambuzibwako enfulumya y'ebintu.

translation.en: We have opened the appetite for quality beer in Uganda.
translation.lug: Tuguddewo obwagazi bw'omwenge gwa bbiya omulungi mu Uganda.

translation.en: The move by East African Breweries Limited to reestablish itself in Tanzania is expected to change the landscape in beer industry.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka ya East African Breweries Limited okweyubula mu Tanzania kusuubirwa okukyusa eby'endulumya y'omwenge gwa bbiya.

translation.en: Serengeti sells beer in Uganda.
translation.lug: Serengeti etunda omwenge gwa bbiya mu Uganda.

translation.en: What's the impact of East African Community Market on Parambot breweries?
translation.lug: Katale k'amawanga g'obuvanjuba bwa Afirika gulinza kukosa gutya Parambot breweries?

translation.en: The greatest benefit we hope to get from the East African Community is the larger market.
translation.lug: Ekisinga obunene kye tusuubira okuganyulwa mu katale k'amawanga gw'obugwanjuba ke katale akanene.

translation.en: I am self made with no mentor but I admire Sir Richard Branson and his virgin world companies.
translation.lug: Neerandiza nzekka awatali annungamya naye neegomba Sir Richard Branson ne kkampuni ze eza Virgin world.

translation.en: Executive Style Jerry Rajwayi is the General Manager at Parambot Breweries.
translation.lug: Omukungu Style Jerry Rajwayi ye ssenkulu wa Parambot Breweries.

translation.en: Top performing companies, organisations and individuals will be honoured on August thirteenth.
translation.lug: Kkampuni ezisinga okukola obulungi, ebitongole n'abantu ssekinnoomu bajja kusiimibwa nga kkumi na ssatu Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: Public Relations excellence awards are to be held at the Kampala Serena Conference Center.
translation.lug: Awaadi za kkampuni esinze okukolagana obulungi n'abantu zaakubeera ku Kampala Serena Conference center.

translation.en: The Public Relations Association of Uganda are open to business enterprises, associations, private institutions and government bodies.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya Public Relations Association of Uganda kiggule eri bannabizinesi, ebibiina by'obwegassi, ebitongole by'obwannannyini n'ebya bya gavumenti.

translation.en: The Public Relations Association of Uganda Golden Honors is to be given to individuals.
translation.lug: Okusiimibwa okwa zzaabu okw'ekibiina kya Public Relations Association of Uganda zaakuweebwa abantu ssekinnoomu.

translation.en: The Public Relations Association of Uganda Sheppard Honors is to be given to organisations which are best in Public relations profession in Uganda.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Public Relations Association of Uganda kyakulemberamu ebirabo eby'okuweebwa ebitongole ebisinga okukolagana obulungi n'abantu.

translation.en: Uganda Revenue Authority audited Crane Bank in August two thousand seven in regard to taxes.
translation.lug: Uganda Revenue Authority yabalirira bbanka ya Crane mu Gwomunaana mu nkumi bbiri mu musanvu ku byekuusa ku misolo.

translation.en: Uganda Revenue Authority charged tax on loans that were extended to companies processing and exporting fish and coffee.
translation.lug: Uganda Revenue Authority yawooza omusolo ku looni ezaaweebwa kkampuni ez'ongera omutindo n'okufulumya ebyennyanja n'emmwanyi wabweru w'eggwanga.

translation.en: Uganda Revenue Authority last week successfully argued the tax dispute case by Crane Bank.
translation.lug: Uganda Revenue Authority yawangula omusango gwa bbanka ya Crane ogw'emisolo wiiki ewedde.

translation.en: Crane Bank brought a case challenging the tax body over taxes charged on agricultural loans advanced to agroprocessors.
translation.lug: Bbanka ya Crane yawaaba omusango oguwakanya ekitongole ekiwooza ky'omusolo ku musolo oguwoozebwa ku looni z'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi ogussibwa ku basunsula ebyamaguzi.

translation.en: Agricultural loans from two thousand five to two thousand six amounted to three hundred ninety nine million shillings.
translation.lug: Ssente za looni ezigabibwa ku byobulimi okuva mu nkumi bbiri mu etaano okutuuka mu nkumi bbiri mu mukaaga zeeyongera okutuuka ku siringi za Uganda obukadde bisatu mu kyenda mu mwenda.

translation.en: British American Tobacco last week forecasted a six percent growth in sales for the second half of this year.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya British American Tobacco wiiki ewedde kyateebereza okweyongera mu bitundibwa mu kitundu ky'omwaka ekyokubiri omwaka guno.

translation.en: British American Tobacco posted nineteenth percent growth in pre-tax profits.
translation.lug: British American Tobacco yalaga okweyongera kw'amagoba ga bitundu kkumi na mwenda ku kikumi nga tegannaggyibwako musolo.

translation.en: British American Tobacco increased in the six months ending June thirtieth.
translation.lug: British American Tobacco yeeyongera mu myezi mukaaga okukoma nga kkumi na ssatu Ogwomukaaga.

translation.en: The cigarettes maker also expects the East African Common Market protocol to play a significant part in boosting earnings.
translation.lug: Abakozi ba ssigala nabo basuubira enteekateeka y'omukago gw'akatale k'amawanga g'obuvankuba bwa Afirika okubeere ogw'enkizo mu kutumbula ennyingiza zaabwe.

translation.en: The firm's Managing Director Gary Fagan said benefits would accrue to the harmonisation of tax regimes in East African partner states.
translation.lug: Omulungamya wa ffirimu Gary Fagan agamba nti emiganyulo gyandivudde ku kuteesaganya n'ensi za East Africa eziwooza emisolo.

translation.en: The Common Market Protocol went live on July one but has had limited impact on the firm's business.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka y'omukago gw'akatale k'amawanga g'obubuvankuba bwa Afirika yatandika nga lumu Ogwomukaaga naye eganyudde kitono amakolero.

translation.en: The Uganda Communications Commission last week launched the first Annual Communications Awards to recognize stakeholders in communications.
translation.lug: Uganda Communications Commission wiiki ewedde yatongoza Annual Communication awards ezaasookera ddala okusiima abakwatibwako mu byempuliziganya.

translation.en: David Ogong is the Director for Competition and Corporate affairs at Uganda's Communications Commissions.
translation.lug: David Ogongo y'akulira eby'okuvuganya n'ebyempuliziganya eby'ekikungu ku Uganda Communications Commission.

translation.en: The awards will be marked as a showcase for all that is best in Uganda's communications sector.
translation.lug: Ebirabo bijja kukozesebwa okulaga ekitongole kya Uganda ekisinze mu byempuliziganya.

translation.en: The awards will be an annual event starting this September.
translation.lug: Omukolo gw'ebirabo gujja kuba ku nkomerero y'omwaka okuva mu Gwomwenda guno.

translation.en: Uganda Communications Commission is to award the best sector performers.
translation.lug: Uganda Communications Commission ya kusiima ekitongole ekisinze.

translation.en: The awards were to boost connectivity of the East African region with the rest of the world.
translation.lug: Ebirabo bya kutumbula enkwatagana y'amawanga gw'obugwanjuba Afirika n'ensi yonna.

translation.en: Ajay Chitkara is the chief executive of Global Data Business Bharti Airtel.
translation.lug: Ajay Chitkara y'akulira enzirukanya y'emirimu mu Global Data Business Bharti Airtel.

translation.en: The cable system is expected to create a boost in the proliferation of broadband connectivity to all parts of Africa.
translation.lug: Omuyungano gwa terefayina gusuubirwa okulambula obwangu obw'ekika ekya waggulu mu kugatta ebitundu bya Africa byonna.

translation.en: The Eastern Africa Submarine System cable has received investment.
translation.lug: Eastern Africa Submarine System Cable efunye obuvujjirizi.

translation.en: The Super League received fifty three million shillings in gate collections throughout the two thousand eight and nine season.
translation.lug: Liigi y'oku ntikko omugatte yafunye obukadde bwa siringi ataano mu busatu ku miryango gy'ebisaawe mu sizoni ya nkumi bbiri mu munaana ne nkumi bbiri mu mwenda.

translation.en: The Ugandan football industry depends almost entirely on donations.
translation.lug: Omupiira mu Uganda kumpi gubeerawo ku buyambi.

translation.en: Sports Club Villa was docked nine points for failing to turn up for two league games.
translation.lug: Sports Club Villa yasaliddwako obubonero mwenda olw'okulemererwa okulabikako ku mipiira gya liigi ebiri.

translation.en: Sports Club Villa is Uganda's most successful football club of all time.
translation.lug: Sports Club Villa ye ttiimu ya Uganda esinga ebyafaayo ebirungi.

translation.en: The club had not paid players' allowances for six months, prompting a sit down strike.
translation.lug: Ttiimu yabadde tennawa bazannyi nsako yaabwe okumala emyezi mukaaga ekyaviiriddeko akeediimo.

translation.en: Coach Sula Kato was forced on one occasion to play seven men instead of eleven for failure to raise the numbers.
translation.lug: Omutendesi Sula Kato ekiseera ekimu yakakibwa okuzannyisa abazannyi musanvu mu kifo ky'ekkumi n'omu olw'okulemererwa okuweza ttiimu ennamba.

translation.en: Villa's most successful period in the mid one thousand nine hundred nineties was occasioned by the late Patrick Kawooya's bottomless pockets.
translation.lug: Ekiseera kya Villa mwe yasingira okutuukira ku buwanguzi wakati wa lukumi mu lwenda kyenda kyava ku kusaasaanya kw'ensimbi okw'omugenzi Patrick Kawooya.

translation.en: The now relegated Arua football club failed to turn up for three games in the last season.
translation.lug: Ttiimu ya Arua kati eyasaliddwako yalemereddwa okulabikako ku mipiira esatu sizoni ewedde.

translation.en: Federation of Uganda Football Association, Chief Executive Officer Edgar Watson argues that football has gone beyond just a game.
translation.lug: Akulira emirimu gy'ekikugu mu kibiina ekiddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere mu ggwanga Edgar Watson agamba nti omupiira gususse ku kubeera obubeezi ouzannyo.

translation.en: Moses Magogo is the secretary to the Uganda Super League Committee.
translation.lug: Moses Magogo ye muwandiisi w'akakiiko akaddukanya liigi y'omupiira gw'ebigere ey'oku ntikko mu Uganda.

translation.en: Ugandan football has to be packaged as a product.
translation.lug: Omupiira gwa Uganda gulina okukwatibwa ng'ekyamaguzi.

translation.en: Last January, Super League clubs and the Federation of Uganda Football Associations representatives penned the now famous Jinja Declaration.
translation.lug: Gatonnya awedde, ttiimu za liigi ey'oku ntikko n'abakiise b'ekibiina ekiddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere mu ggwanga baateeka omukono ku kiwandiiko kati ekimanyiddwa nga "Jinja Declaration"

translation.en: With the guidance of the international football federation, the Jinja declaration was penned.
translation.lug: Mu kuyambibwako international football federation, Jinja Declaration yateekebwako emikono.

translation.en: Uganda Super League Limited will take over the league from the Uganda Super League Committee of Federation of Uganda Football Association.
translation.lug: Uganda Super League Limited ejja kutwala mu maaso liigi okuva ku Uganda Super League Committee of Federation of Uganda Football Association.

translation.en: Federation of Uganda Football Association's annual meeting is to agree on new ways of making money.
translation.lug: Olusisinkano olwa buli mwaka olw'ekibiina ekiddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere mu ggwanga lwa kukkaanya ku ngeri empya ez'okukolamu ensimbi.

translation.en: It shall have seventeen shareholders in all, with the Federation of Uganda Football Association as a special shareholder.
translation.lug: Lwonna awamu lujja kubaamu abakwatibwako kkumi na musanvu n'ekibiina ekiddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere mu ggwanga ng'akwatibwako ow'enjawulo.

translation.en: Federation of Uganda Football Associations shall exercise some control, through licensing clubs that make it to the Super League.
translation.lug: Ekibiina ekiddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere mu ggwanga kijja kukozesa obumu ku buyinza bwakyo, okuyita mu kuwa layisinsi ttiimu ezaayiseemu okuzannya mu liigi y'omupiira ey'oku ntikko.

translation.en: Magogo is optimistic that this arrangement will open up new possibilities of raising finances.
translation.lug: Magogo mukakafu nnyo nti eteekateeka eno ejja kuteekawo engeri empya ez'okufunamu ensimbi.

translation.en: Magogo will raise finances to boost the local league and subsequently Ugandan football.
translation.lug: Magogo ajja kukungaanya ensimbi okutumbula liigi y'awaka n'omupiira gwa Uganda okutwalira awamu.

translation.en: Gateway television and the Federation of Uganda Football Associations entered an agreement in the 2007 to 2008 league season.
translation.lug: Terefayina ya Gateway n'ebibiina ebiddukanya omupiira mu Uganda bikoze endagaano mu liigi ya 2007 okutuuka 2008.

translation.en: Tororo District failed to hold its National Resistance Movement district elections on August second.
translation.lug: Disitulikiti y'e Tororo yalemererwa okuteekateeka okulonda kwayo okwa National Resistance Movement nga bbiri Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni wrote a letter on August sixteenth which observers say might haunt him after the two thousand eleven elections.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni yawandiika ebbaluwa nga kkumi na mukaaga abatunuulizi b'ensonga gye bagamba nti eyinza okumuleetera obuzibu oluvannyuma lw'okulonda kwa nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement Secretary-General was Amama Mbabazi.
translation.lug: Ssaabawandiisi wa National Resistance Movement yali Amama Mbabazi.

translation.en: Tororo municipality and West Budama were authorised to have separate National Resistance Movement teams.
translation.lug: Munisipaali y'e Tororo ne West Budama zaaweebwa olukusa okubeera ne ttiimu za National Resistance Movement ez'enjawulo.

translation.en: Museveni's letter did not address the core issues as explained by the Tororo District Woman Member of Parliament, Grace Obura.
translation.lug: Ebbaluwa ya Museveni teyayanjula nsonga nkulu ng'omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y'e Tororo mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga olukulu, Grace Obura bw'annyonnyola.

translation.en: Obura said she did not contest because she wanted to give a chance to others.
translation.lug: Obura yagamba nti teyavuganya kubanga yayagala okuwa abalala omukisa.

translation.en: Obura wanted to appease the animosity between the Iteso and Jopadhola over alleged inequality.
translation.lug: Obura yayagala okukkakkanya obukyayi wakati wa Iteso ne Jopadhola ku butali bwenkanya obugambibwa.

translation.en: Tororo Municipality delegates wanted to keep the position of National Resistance Movement district chairperson.
translation.lug: Ababaka ba Munisipaali y'e Tororo baayagala okukuuma ekifo kya ssentebe wa disitulikiti wa National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Violence erupted from delegates of West Budama.
translation.lug: Obutabanguko bwabalukawo okuva mu babaka ba West Budama.

translation.en: The incumbent was from Tororo Municipality and the position was expected to rotate to West Budama.
translation.lug: Omubaka aliko owa Munisipaali y'e Tororo n'ekifo byali bisuubirwa okukyuka okudda mu West Budama.

translation.en: At the centre of the chaos was West Budama South Member of Parliament, Emmanuel Otala.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa West Budama South mu paalamenti, Emmanuel Otala ye yavaako akavuyo.

translation.en: Emmanuel Otala, the junior minister for labour had a list of people he wanted to get posts.
translation.lug: Emmanuel Otala, minisita omubeezi ow'abakozi yalina olukalala lw'abantu be yayagala okufuna ebifo.

translation.en: The problem was about individuals and not communities as addressed by Museveni.
translation.lug: Obuzibu bwali ku bantu si ku bitundu nga Museveni bw'agamba.

translation.en: Not surprisingly, four days after Museveni's letter of August.
translation.lug: Mu buteewuunyisa, ennaku nnya oluvannyuma lw'ebbaluwa ya Museveni ey'ogwomunaana.

translation.en: Otala was involved in yet another fight.
translation.lug: Otala era yeenyiira mu kulwana okulala.

translation.en: This time it was in his West Budama constituency.
translation.lug: Ku mulundi guno kwali mu konsituwensi ye eya West Budama.

translation.en: Otala was detained by police after he beat up a journalist who recorded him allegedly bribing voters.
translation.lug: Otala yakwatibwa poliisi oluvannyuma lw'okukuba munnamawulire eyamukwata ku katambi ku bigambibwa nti yagulirira abalonzi.

translation.en: Otala fired several bullets during the fight.
translation.lug: Otala yakuba amasasi agawerako mu kulwanagana.

translation.en: The Jopadhola are mainly in West Budama and the Iteso in Tororo Municipality.
translation.lug: Abajapadola okusinga bali mu West Budama ate Abateeso mu Munisipaali y'e Tororo.

translation.en: President Museveni miscalculated, he thought segregating them, as in his August sixteen letter suggests, would solve the problem.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yabala bubi, yalowooza okubasosola kyandigonjodde ekizibu ng'ebbaluwa y'ogwomunaana nga kkumi na mukaaga bw'egamba.

translation.en: Similar dishonesty has failed to crush the violence in Butaleja district.
translation.lug: Obutakozesa mazima bwe bumu bulemesezza okufufuggaza obutabanguko mu disitulikiti y'e Butaleja.

translation.en: The move appears to be a continuation of Museveni's "ring fencing" strategy of political positions based on tribes.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka erabika nga kwe kugenda mu maaso kw'enkola ya Museveni ey'okwefuga ebifo by'obukulembeze nga yeesigamye ku mawanga.

translation.en: His July fifteenth two thousand nine letter was at the height of the Banyoro versus Bakiga or Bafuruki saga.
translation.lug: Ebbaluwa ye eya nga kkumi na ttaano Ogwomusanvu nkumi bbiri mu mwenda ye yali entikko y'embiranye wakati w'Abanyolo n'Abakiga oba akasambattuko k'Abafuruki.

translation.en: While touring the district in June, Museveni announced that he had approved the splitting of Bunyole County into two constituencies.
translation.lug: Bwe yali alambula disitulikiti mu gwomukaaga, Museveni yalangirira nti yali akakasizza okwawuzaamu essaza ly'e Bunyole mu konsituwensi bbiri.

translation.en: Dorothy Hyuha is the District Woman Member of Parliament, National Resistance Movement Deputy Secretary General and Minister without Portfolio.
translation.lug: Dorothy Hyuha ye mubaka wa disitulikiti omukyala mu paalamenti, amyuka ssaabawandiisi wa National Resistance Movement era ye minisita atalina mulimu gwa nkalakkalira.

translation.en: Despite being separated, Hyuha and Dombo are supporting candidates against each other and inciting violence.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko nti baayawulibwa, Hyuha ne Dombo bawagira abeesimbyewo abeevuganya wamu n'okukuma omuliro mu bantu.

translation.en: Dombo is supporting Celinah Nabandah against Hyuha for the District Woman Member of Parliament slot.
translation.lug: Dobo awagira Celinah Nabandah avuganya ne Hyuha ku ky'omubaka wa disitulikiti omukyala mu Paalamenti.

translation.en: Hyuha supported Imran Muluga against Dombo during the election.
translation.lug: Hyuha yawagira Imran Muluga eyali avuganya ne Dombo mu kalulu.

translation.en: On August second, Butaleja witnessed the most violent election in the district's history.
translation.lug: Nga bbiri Ogwomunaana, Butaleja yalaba okulonda okukyasize okuba okw'akavuyo mu byafaayo bya disitulikiti.

translation.en: Police fired in the air after a group of people attacked the district chairman, Richard Waya.
translation.lug: Poliisi yakuba amasasi mu bbanga oluvannyuma lw'ekibinja ky'abantu okulumba ssentebe ssentebe wa disitulikiti, Richard Waya.

translation.en: Dombo accused his opponent, Imran Muluga of conniving with Waya and Hyuha, to rig the elections.
translation.lug: Dombo yalumiriza gwe yali avuganya naye, Imran Muluga okwekobaana ne Waya ne Hyuha okubba obululu.

translation.en: Muluga allegedly hid over three hundred voters at his school.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa Muluga yakweka abalonzi abasoba mu bikumi ebisatu mu ssomero lye.

translation.en: Tororo Progressive Academy prevented other National Resistance Movement candidates from talking to them.
translation.lug: Tororo Progressive Academy yeewala abeesimbyewo ba NAtional Resistance Movement abalala okwogera nabo.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movements' internal elections and primaries point at trouble over the two thousand eleven elections.
translation.lug: Okulonda kwa National Resistance Movement okw'omunda n'obumyufu kusonga ku mitawaana egyali kulonda kwa nkumi bbiri kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: According to National Resistance Movement Electoral Commissioner, Lydia Wanyoto, the district elections drew over five hundred petitions.
translation.lug: Okusinziira kw'akulira ebyokulonda mu National Resistance Movement, Lydia Wanyoto, okulonda kwa disitulikiti kwalimu emisango gy'okujulira ku byava mu kulonda kwa disitulikiti egisukka ebikumi ebitaano.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement district elections drew over five hundred petitions amidst scenes of unprecedented rigging and violence.
translation.lug: Okulonda kwa National Resistance Movement okwa disitulikiti kwaleetawo emisango gy'okujulira egisoba mu bikumi ebitaano wakati mu kubba obululu n'obuvuyo ebyalabibwako.

translation.en: In Sembabule district, the elections were scuttled in the gunfire of bullets that left two injured.
translation.lug: Mu disitulikiti y'e Sembabule okulonda kwakolebwa mu bwangu n'okukubibwa kw'amasasi agaaleka nga babiri balumiziddwa.

translation.en: Area Members of Parliament Ssekikubo, Anifa Kawooya and Kutesa hurled before the party disciplinary committee.
translation.lug: Ababaka ba paalamenti ab'ekitundu Ssekikubo, Anifa Kawooya ne Kutesa baasindikibwa mu kakiiko k'ekibiina ak'empisa.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement Chief Whip is Daudi Migereko.
translation.lug: Nampala wa National Resistance Movement ye Daudi Migereko.

translation.en: He admitted that there could be big problems if the violence seen during the National Resistance Movement internal elections is not addressed.
translation.lug: Yakkiriza nti wayinza okubaawo obuzibu obunene singa obuvuyo obwalabibwa mu kulonda kwa National Resistance Movement kw'omunda tebukolebwako.

translation.en: Migereko said that the failure to handle violence would bring many problems to the country.
translation.lug: Migereko yagambye nti okulemererwa okukola ku buvuyo kuyinza okuleeta ebizibu eri eggwanga.

translation.en: According to reports, Migereko practically begged the district National Resistance Movement chairman in Jinja to put him on the district executive.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku alipoota, Migereko yasaba ssentebe wa National Resistance Movement mu Jinja okumuteeka ku kakiiko ka disitulikiti akakulembeze.

translation.en: Migereko said they were struggling to serve.
translation.lug: Migereko yagamba nti baali bafuba okuweereza.

translation.en: Ofwono Opondo is the National Resistance Movement's Deputy Spokesman.
translation.lug: Ofwono Opondo y'amyuka omwogezi wa Natonal Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Ofwono Opondo says that the candidates in predominantly National Resistance Movement areas look at winning the primaries as a must.
translation.lug: Opondo agamba nti abeesimbyewo mu bifo bya Natonal Resistance Movement ebyatiikirivu batunuulira okuwangula obumyufu ng'etteeka.

translation.en: Rubanda West Member of Parliament is Henry Banyenzaki.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Paalamenti owa Rubanda West ye Henry Banyenzaki.

translation.en: Professor Elijah Mushemeza was an aspirant for the National Resistance Movement Secretary General's job.
translation.lug: Pulofeesa Elijah Mushemeza yeetaba mu kuvuganya kw'omulimu gwa National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Professor Elijah Mushemeza sees the violence in the National Resistance Movement elections as due to greed.
translation.lug: Pulofeesa Elijah Mushemeza alaba obuvuyo mu kulonda kwa National Resistance Movement ng'obuva ku mulugube.

translation.en: He wrote an article in the Daily Monitor of August eleventh.
translation.lug: Yawandiika eggulire mu Daily Monitor owa nga kkumi na lumu mu Gwomunaana.

translation.en: Journalist Charles Onyango Obbo wrote in Daily Monitor of August eleventh.
translation.lug: Munnamawulire Charles Onyango Obbo yawandiika mu Daily Monitor owa nga kkumi na lumu ogwomunaana.

translation.en: National Resistance Movement has become a meal ticket.
translation.lug: National Resistance Movement efuuse ekintu omuntu ky'akozesa okufuna ensimbi.

translation.en: The general election of February eleventh, two thousand eleven is happening in National Resistance Movement today.
translation.lug: Okulonda kwa bonna okwa nga kkumi na lumu ogwokubiri nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu mu National Resistance Movement kwa leero.

translation.en: Onyango Obbo said that If you win a position in the party, you are assured of winning the election.
translation.lug: Onyango Obbo yagamba nti bw'owangula ekifo mu kibiina, oba mukakafu okuwangula okulonda.

translation.en: Onyango Obbo said that winning the election leads your allies to victory too.
translation.lug: Onyango Obbo yagambye nti okuwangula akalulu kireetera mikwano gyo nagyo obuwanguzi.

translation.en: National Resistance Movement member, Ikuya Magode says the violence shows the party has deviated from the principles of good governance.
translation.lug: Munnakibiina kya National Resistance, Ikuya Magode agamba nti obuvuyo bulaga nti ekibiina kivudde ku nnono zaakyo ez'obukulembeze obulungi.

translation.en: Their closeness to President Museveni is prone to violence.
translation.lug: Okusemberera kwabwe Pulezidenti Museveni kuvaako obuvuyo.

translation.en: This was the case in Wakiso district where Vice President Bukenya allegedly hid the voters from his challenger.
translation.lug: Embeera y'emu ye yali mu disitulikiti y'e Wakiso amumyuka wa Pulezident Bukenya agambibwa okukweka abalonzi okuva eri amuvuganya.

translation.en: National Resistance Movement Deputy Secretary-General Hyuha is largely unpopular but is determined to win using the party machinery.
translation.lug: Amyuka Ssaabawandiisi wa National Resistance Movement Hyuha si muganzi wadde naye mumalirivu okuwangula ng'akozesa ebintu by'ekibiina.

translation.en: In other areas such as Tororo, Buliisa, and Buganda, the fault lines could be a result of multi-ethnic composition.
translation.lug: Mu bitundu ebirala nga Tororo, Buliisa ne Buganda, enjawukana ziyinza okuba nga ziva ku kuvuganya kw'amawanga ag'enjawulo.

translation.en: Sembabule appears to combine all these elements.
translation.lug: Sembabule erabika okugatta ebintu bino byonna.

translation.en: Lwemiyaga Member of Parliament Ssekikubo and his supporters routinely clash with supporters of minister Kutesa.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa paalamenti w'e Lwemiyaga Ssekikubo n'abawagizi be buli kaseera bakuubagana ne n'abawagizi ba minisita Kutesa.

translation.en: Lwemiyaga Member of Parliament Ssekikubo and his supporters routinely clash with supporters of woman Member of Parliament Kawooya.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa paalamenti w'e Lwemiyaga Ssekikubo n'abawagizi be buli kaseera bakuubagana n'abawagizi b'omubaka omukyala wa paalamenti, Kawooya.

translation.en: All act with impunity because they are very close to President Museveni either by ethnicity or marriage and therefore seemingly untouchable.
translation.lug: Bonna beetwala nga tebabonerezebwa kubanga bali nnyo ku lesegere lwa Pulezidenti Museveni nga basinziira ku ggwanga oba ku bufumbo n'olw'ekyo ne balabika nga tebakwatibwako.

translation.en: The powerful Secretary to the Electoral Commission, Sam Rwakoojo is also from Lwemiyaga.
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi ow'amaanyi ow'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda Sam Rwakoojo naye ava Lwemiyaga.

translation.en: Although located in Buganda, Sembabule has a strong migrant community, mainly of Banyankole and Banyarwanda.
translation.lug: Newankubadde esangibwa Buganda, Sembabule erimu abasenze bangi okusingira ddala Abanyankole n'Abanyarwanda.

translation.en: Before two thousand six elections, Museveni rushed to Sembabule to stop the rift within the party that involved the same people.
translation.lug: Ng'okulonda kwa nkumi bbiri mu mukaaga tekunnabaawo Museveni yadduka e Sembabule okukomya enjawukana mu kibiina ezaalimu abantu be bamu.

translation.en: At that time, Museveni wanted Joy Kabatsi to step down for Kawooya on the District Woman Member of Parliament seat.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera ekyo, Museveni yayagala Joy Kabatsi alekere Kawooya ku kifo ky'omubaka wa disitulikit omukyala mu paalamenti.

translation.en: As usual, Kawooya was backed by Kutesa, while Kabatsi had the powerful Herman Ssentongo and Sekikubo.
translation.lug: Nga bulijjo, Kawooya yali awagirwa Kutesa ate Kabatsi yalina Herman Ssentongo ow'amaanyi ne Sekikubo.

translation.en: Museveni failed to reconcile them.
translation.lug: Museveni yalemererwa okubatabaganya.

translation.en: Elections in Uganda have frequently been mired in violence, manipulation, murder, bribery, threats, intimidation and vote-rigging.
translation.lug: Okulonda mu Uganda bulijjo kweyolekeddemu obuvuyo, okulwanagana, obutemu, okugulirira, okutiisa, okutiisibwatiisibwa n'okubba obululu.

translation.en: The failure by National Resistance Movement to hold peaceful internal elections is seen as a sign of violence in two thousand eleven.
translation.lug: Okulemererwa kwa Nationall Resistance Movement okuba n'okulonda okw'omunda okw'emirembe kalabibwa ng'akabonero ak'obuvuyo mu nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: Ofwono Opondo claimed it was in only four of the one hundred seventeen National Resistance Movement districts where the elections were held.
translation.lug: Ofwono Opondo yakkaatirizza nti kyabadde mu disitulikiti nnya zokka ku disitulikiti kikumi mu kkumi na musanvu okulonda kwa National Resistance Movement gye kwabadde.

translation.en: He mentions Sembabule, Bulisa, Tingey in Kapchorwa, West Budama, and Tororo.
translation.lug: Anokolayo Sembabule, Bulisa, Tingey mu Kapchorwa, West Budama ne Tororo.

translation.en: Many fear to imagine that the violence in National Resistance Movement will dispute out against the opposition.
translation.lug: Bangi batya okulowooza nti akavuyo mu National Resistance Movement kajja kusaasaanira mu b'oludda oluvuganya.

translation.en: In past elections, government authorities who are National Resistance Movement members, have unleashed terror on the opposition.
translation.lug: MU kulonda okuyise, Abakungu ba gavumeti bannakibiina kya National Resistance Movement bazze batuusa obulumbaganyi ku b'oludda oluvuganya.

translation.en: On February fifteenth, two thousand six Lieutenant. Ramadhan Magara shot at a crowd of then-presidential candidate Kizza Besigye's supporters.
translation.lug: Nga kkumi na ttano ogwokubiri nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na mukaaga Lotenanti Ramadhan Magara yakuba amasasi mu kibinja ky'abawagizi b'eyali avuganya ku bwa Pulezidenti mu biseera ebyo Kizza Besigye.

translation.en: Kizza Besigye's supporters were gathered at the Buganda kingdom palace at Bulange, Mengo when Lieutenant Ramadhan Magara shot at them.
translation.lug: Abawagizi ba Kizza Besigye baali bakungaanidde mu lubiri lwa Buganda e Bulange Mengo Lotenanti Ramadhan Magara we yabakubira amasasi.

translation.en: In two thousand six, Lieutenant Colonel Dick Bugingo, head of military police, slapped Major.
translation.lug: Mu nkumi bbiri mu mukaaga Lotenanti Kkano Dick Bugingo akulira poliisi ya miritale yakuba mmeeja oluyi.

translation.en: Rubaramira Ruranga is the head of election management for the Forum for Democratic Change.
translation.lug: Rubaramira Ruranga y'akkulira ebyokulonda mu Forum for Democratic Change.

translation.en: Bugingo was convicted of public assault but retained his position as commander of military police although he was later retired.
translation.lug: Bugingo yasingisibwa ogw'okutuusa ku buvune ku bantu naye yasigaza ekifo kye eky'obuduumizi bwa poliisi ya miritale newankubadde oluvannyuma yawummuzibwa.

translation.en: Fox Odoi was Museveni's former senior legal assistant.
translation.lug: Fox Odoi ye yali omuyambi wa Pulezidenti ow'oku ntikko mu by'amateeka.

translation.en: Fox Odoi pointed a gun at Forum for Democratic Change supporters in Tororo on voting day in two thousand six.
translation.lug: Fox Odoi yasonga emmundu mu bawagizi ba Forum for Democratic Change e Tororo ku lunaku lw'okulonda mu nkumi ebbiri mu mukaaga.

translation.en: Despite having photographs of Odoi pointing a gun at three men lying on the ground, police claimed a lack of sufficient evidence.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko okubeera n'ebifaananyi bya Odoi ng'asonze emmundu mu basajja basatu abeebase ku ttaka, poliisi yagambye nti terina bujulizi bumala.

translation.en: In two thousand six, Ali Kirunda Kivejinja of the National Resistance Movement was found to have used intimidation, violence and torture.
translation.lug: Mu nkumi bbiri mu mukaaga, Ali Kirunda Kivejinja owa National Resistance Movement yasangibwa nga yali akozesezza okutiisatiisa, obuvuyo n'okutulugunya.

translation.en: Ali Kirunda Kivejinja used intimidation, violence and torture against supporters of his Forum for Democratic Change rival Abdu Katuntu.
translation.lug: Ali Kirunda Kivejinja yakozesa okutiisatiisa, obuvuyo n'okutulugunya ku bawagizi b'owa Forum for Democratic Change Abdu Katuntu gwe yali avuganya.

translation.en: He was kicked out of parliament for election rigging but Museveni appointed him third Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Internal Affairs.
translation.lug: Yaggibwa mu Paalamenti olw'okubba obululu naye Museveni n'amulonda nga omumyuka wa Ssaabaminisita owookusatu era minisita w'ensonga ez'omunda.

translation.en: In two thousand one, Security minister Amama Mbabazi's agents shot a supporter of his challenger in Kinkizi West, James Garuga Musinguzi.
translation.lug: Mu nkumi bbiri mu gumu, abayambi ba minisita w'ebyokwerinda Amama Mbabazi baakuba omuwagizi w'amuvuganya amasasi mu Kinkizi West, James Garuga Musinguzi.

translation.en: Early warnings about violence in the two thousand eleven elections have been extensive.
translation.lug: Okulabulwa kw'amangu ku buvuyo mu kulonda kwa nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu kubadde kungi.

translation.en: Kizza Besigye was the leader of Uganda's main opposition party, Forum for Democratic Change.
translation.lug: Kizza Besigye ye yali omukulembeze w'ekibiina ekisinga amaanyi ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti ekya Forum or Democratic Change.

translation.en: The Chief Prosecutor of the International Criminal Court, Moreno Ocampo, warned that his court would pursue perpetrators of any election violence.
translation.lug: Akulira abawaabi mu kkooti y'ensi yonna, Moreno Ocampo, yalabula nti kkooti ye yali ya kulondoola abo bonna abaneenyigira mu mivuyo gy'okulonda.

translation.en: He said the court learnt from the deadly post-election violence in Kenya at the end of two thousand seven.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti kkooti yayigira ku byaddirira oluvannyuma lw'akalulu ak'amaanyi ennyo mu Kenya ku nkomerero ya nkumi bbiri mu musanvu.

translation.en: Beginning of two thousand eight and in Zimbabwe, the court drew a lesson from the post-election violence in Kenya.
translation.lug: Ku ntandikwa ya nkumi bbiri mu munaana era mu Zimbabwe, kkooti yafuna essomo okuva ku butabanguko obwatuukawo oluvannyuma lw'okulonda mu Kenya.

translation.en: The result of the presidential election in Kenya in December two thousand seven triggered tribal clashes leaving at least a thousand dead.
translation.lug: Ebyava mu kulonda kwa Puezidenti mu Kenya mu Ntenvu wa nkumi bbiri mu musanvu byaviirako okulwanagana wakati w'amawanga era ne kuleka abantu kumpi lukumi nga bafu.

translation.en: In Zimbabwe, violence erupted after opposition leader Morgan Tsvangirai beat incumbent Robert Mugabe in the presidential election by six per cent.
translation.lug: Mu Zimbabwe, obutabanguko bwabalukawo oluvannyuma lw'omukulembeze w'oludda oluvuganya Morgan Tsvangirai okuwangula Robert Mugabe eyali mu buyinza n'ebitundu mukaaga ku kikumi.

translation.en: Morgan Tsvangirai failed to secure an overall majority.
translation.lug: Morgan Tsvangirai yalemererwa okuwangula mu kalulu bonna.

translation.en: Tsvangirai pulled out of a second-round runoff, complaining of violence against his party's supporters, effectively handing outright victory to Mugabe.
translation.lug: Tsvangirai yakwata kyakubiri mu kalulu, yeemulugunya ku ffujjo eryakolebwa ku bawagizi b'ekibiina kye n'okuwa Mugabe obuwanguzi bwe.

translation.en: There are emerging indications that the case in Kenya in two thousand seven violence might follow the election.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebiraga nti embeera y'obutabanguko eyali e Kenya mu nkumi bbiri musanvu eyinza okubalukawo oluvannyuma lw'okulonda.

translation.en: Part of the problem is that any outcome of the two thousand eleven Presidential Election will not be unanimously accepted.
translation.lug: Ekintundu ku buzibu kiri nti byonna ebinaava mu kulonda kwa Pulezidenti okwa nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu tebijja kukkirizibwa.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission is discredited by alleged partiality in favour of the appointing authority, President Museveni.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda tebakalinaamu bwesige olw'ebigambibwa nti katiitiibya nnyo eyakalonda, Puezidenti Museveni.

translation.en: Women for Peace and National Alliance for Free and Fair Elections was formed to fight for the Electoral Commission to be reconstituted.
translation.lug: Ekibina kya Women for Peace and National Alliance and Fair Elections kyatondebwawo okulwanirira okuddamu okulonda kw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: Although Museveni raised similar concerns about the partiality of the electoral commission in one thousand nine hundred eighty.
translation.lug: Newankubadde Museveni yayogera ku nsonga ze zimu ku akakiiko k'ebyokulonda okutiitiibya omuntu omu mu lukumi mu lwenda kinaana.

translation.en: The Commission of Inquiry into Post Election Violence report in Kenya concluded that the post-election violence was a spontaneous violent reaction.
translation.lug: Akakiiko akaateekebwawo okunoonyereza ku mivuyo egyali mu kulonda kw'e Kenya kwawunzika nti okuyiwa omusaanyi okwaliwo ng'akalulu kawedde kwava ku nsonga ez'omunda mu Kenya.

translation.en: Uganda was still a British colony and proudly so.
translation.lug: Uganda lyali likyali ttwale lya Bungereza era nga likyenyumirizaamu.

translation.en: It was a Christian country, designed to be run by western-educated men and women.
translation.lug: Yali nsi y'Obukristo, eteekeddwateekeddwa okuddukanyizibwa abaami n'abakyala abasomye ebintu by'ekizungu.

translation.en: At independence in one thousand nine hundred sixty-two, Binaisa was one of a few Baganda elite of the period.
translation.lug: Ku lunaku lw'ameenunula mu lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu bbiri, Binaisa ye yali omu ku Baganda abatono abaali abayivu mu biseera ebyo.

translation.en: The Baganda put their Ganda identity, sentimental attachment and loyalty to the kingdom above their loyalty to Uganda, the country.
translation.lug: Abaganda baddira obuwulize bwabwe ne babussa eri Obwakabaka bwabwe okusinga bwe bakikola ku ggwanga.

translation.en: The prominent first Buganda public figures were Paulo Muwanga, Emmanuel Lumu, Benedicto Kiwanuka, Jaberi Bidandi Ssali, and Kintu Musoke.
translation.lug: Abaganda abasooka okumanyibwa ennyo baali Paulo Muwanga, Emmanuel Lumu, Benedicto Kiwanuka, Jaberi Bidandi Ssali ne Kintu Musoke.

translation.en: Many of the non-monarchical Baganda had typically studied in secondary schools or worked in districts outside Buganda.
translation.lug: Abanganda bangi abataali mu bwakabaka baali basomedde mu masomero ga sekendule oba ne bakolera wabweru wa disitulikiti eziri wabweru wa Buganda.

translation.en: Many Baganda often were married to non-Baganda, they usually studied in Kenya, India, Tanzania or Britain.
translation.lug: Abaganda bangi baateranga okufumbirwa nga abataali Baganda, baatera okusomera e Kenya, India, Tanzania oba e Bungereza.

translation.en: Binaisa attended King's College Budo, a secondary school that during colonial times was the training ground for many of Uganda's future leaders.
translation.lug: Binaisa yasomera ku King's College Budo, essomero lya ssekendule eryali ettendekero ly'abakulembeze ba Uganda ab'ebiseera by'omu maaso mu biseera by'abafuzi b'amatwale.

translation.en: Binaisa qualified as a lawyer in Britain in one thousand nine hundred fifty-five.
translation.lug: Binaisa yakuguka nga munnamateeka mu Bungereza mu lukumi mu lwenda ataano mu etaano.

translation.en: He returned to Uganda in the year one thousand nine hundred fifty-six and plunged into the nationalist politics of the period.
translation.lug: Yakomawo mu Uganda mu lukumi mu lwenda ataano mu mukaaga era n'ayingirirawo ebyobufuzi mu kaseera ako.

translation.en: He became Secretary-General of the newly formed Uganda National Congress.
translation.lug: Yafuuka Ssaabawandiisi wa Uganda National Congress eyali yaakatandikibwawo.

translation.en: He became attorney general during first Uganda's People's Congress government of the one thousand nine hundred sixties.
translation.lug: Yafuuka ssaabawolerereza wa gavumenti ya Uganda People's Congress eyasooka myaka gya lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga.

translation.en: Binaisa and two others over one night drafted a new constitution in the year one thousand nine hundred sixty-six.
translation.lug: Banaisa ne banne abalala babiri mu kiro ekimu baakola ssemateeka mu mwaka gwa lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu mukaaga.

translation.en: That constitution paved way for the transformation of Uganda into a republic and eventually the abolition of the historical, traditional kingdoms.
translation.lug: Ssemateeka oyo yatondawo oluwenda lw'okukyusa Buganda okufuuka ettwale eritatambulira ku bufuzi bwa bwakabaka n'oluvannyuma ekyavaamu okuwera kw'obukulembeze obw'ennono.

translation.en: This was the constitution that made Prime Minister Milton Obote the president and gave him what many viewed as dictatorial powers.
translation.lug: Ono ye ssemateeka eyafuula ssaabaminisita Milton Obote okufuuka Pulezidenti era n'emuwa amaanyi abamu ge baalaba nga agw'obwannakyemalira.

translation.en: Binaisa fled into exile during the regime of Idi Amin Dada who was president from 1971 to 1979.
translation.lug: Binaisa yawanganguka ku mulembe gwa Idi Amin Dada eyali Pulezidenti okuva mu 1971 okutuuka mu 1979.

translation.en: This period of waiting and hoping that the military government of President Idi Amin would be overthrown in a coup yielded nothing.
translation.lug: Ekiseera kino kyali kya kulindirira n'okusuubira nti gavumenti bamukwatammundu eya pulezidenti Idi Amin nti eyinga okumaamulwako mu ngeri yonna esoboka.

translation.en: Finally, after clashes along the Uganda-Tanzania border in late one thousand nine hundred seventy-eight, Tanzania invaded Uganda.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma, oluvannyuma lw'okulwanagana ku nsalo ya Uganda-Tanzania, Tanzania yalumba Uganda owaka gwa lukumi mu lwenda nsanvu mu munaana bwe gwali guggwako.

translation.en: In March, the Tanzanian government organised a conference in the town of Moshi that brought together over twenty groups of exiled Ugandans.
translation.lug: Mu Gwokusatu, gavumenti ya Tanzania yateekateeka olukungaana mu kibuga Moshi olwagatta ebibinja bya Bannayuganda ebyasukka mu makumi abiri abaali mu buwanganguse.

translation.en: Moshi Unity Conference soon revealed something disturbing.
translation.lug: Olukungana lw'obwegassi olw'e Moshi lwavaamu ebibala.

translation.en: The extent of disunity, fighting, interest and power play among Uganda's political, intellectual and military elite.
translation.lug: Eddaala ly'enjawukana, okulwanagana, okweyagariza n'okulwanira obuyinza mu bannabyabufuzi ba Uganda abayivu era bannamagye.

translation.en: The conference formed the Uganda National Liberation Front and elected Yusufu Lule, a former Principal of Makerere University College.
translation.lug: Olukungana lwatondawo Uganda National Liberation Front era ne lulonda Yusufu Lule eyaliko omukulu wa Makerere University College.

translation.en: It was becoming apparent that the Amin government was about to collapse before the advancing Tanzanian army and armed Ugandan forces.
translation.lug: Kyali kitandise okulabibwa nti gavumenti ya Amin yali enaatera okugwa oluvannyuma lw'okulumbibwa kw'amagye ga Tanzania n'ebibinja bya Bannayuganda ebirwanyi.

translation.en: When President Lule was voted out of office in June one thousand nine hundred seventy-nine, Binaisa was installed.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Lule bwe yaggyibwa mu woofiisi mu Gwomukaaga gwa lukumi mu lwenda nsanvu mu mwenda, Binaisa yateekebwako.

translation.en: President Lule was in office for only sixty-eight days.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Lule yali mu woofiisi okumala ennaku nkaaga mu munaana zokka.

translation.en: Binaisa rose to the presidency at a time of much national uncertainty.
translation.lug: Binaisa yajja ku bwa Pulezidenti mu kiseera ekizibu ennyo mu ggwanga.

translation.en: He was a man the general public knew in one thousand nine hundred seventy-nine.
translation.lug: Yali musajja abantu bonna gwe baali bamanyi mu lukumi mu lwenda nsanvu mu mwenda.

translation.en: Alarm spread through Uganda when Binaisa was named President.
translation.lug: Uganda yawaawaala nga Binaisa alangiriddwa nga pulezidenti.

translation.en: Lule had been from the old intellectual and social tradition that viewed Uganda as a conservative Christian nation.
translation.lug: Lule yali ava mu Old Intellectual and Social Tradition abaalaba Uganda ng'eggwanga ly'Obukrisitaayo eritayagala nkyukakyuka.

translation.en: Uganda was mapped after British tradition.
translation.lug: Uganda yeetengerera oluvannyuma lw'obufuzi bw'Abangereza.

translation.en: Binaisa was part of that tradition but he also had the same radical socialist and pan-African outlook that Obote had.
translation.lug: Binaisa yali kitundu ku nfuga naye era ng'alina endowooza y'okubeera mu ggwanga eritaliimu bantu oba ggwanga erisukkulumye ku malala n'okwagala ennyo Afirika nga Obote ze yalina.

translation.en: Many Baganda did not support Obote's aligning Uganda with what they regarded as the Communist, atheist Soviet bloc countries.
translation.lug: Abaganda bangi tebaawagira Obote ku ky'okuteeka Uganda mu luse lw'amawanga agalimu okuba ng'ebintu ebikozesebwa bya kitundu kyonna, ekibinja ekyali kikulemberwa Russia.

translation.en: Once Binaisa became president, he was occupying State House in preparation for the return of Obote.
translation.lug: Binaisa bwe yafuuka Pulezidenti, yali mu maka g'obwa pulezidenti nga yeetegekera kudda kwa Obote.

translation.en: Binaisa did not have real powers.
translation.lug: Binaisa teyalina buyinza bwe nnyini.

translation.en: Like Lule, Binaisa proved to be an interim president.
translation.lug: Okufaanaganako ne Lule, Binaisa yalabika nga Pulezidenti ow'ekiseera.

translation.en: He might have been the first East African head of state to occupy the office in preparation for another.
translation.lug: Ayinza okuba nga ye mukulembeze w'omu mawanga ga East Africa eyali agenze mu woofiisi ng'eteekerwateekerwa mulala.

translation.en: Many political analysts, politicians and the news media concluded that their worst nightmare was about to come to pass.
translation.lug: Abatunuulizi b'eby'obufuzi bangi, bannabyabufuzi n'emikutu gy'amawulire gigamba nti ekirooto ekyabwe eky'entiisi kinaatera okujja.

translation.en: Obote was being prepared for a second term as president.
translation.lug: Obote yali ateekebwateekebwa okuba pulezidenti omulundi ogwokubiri.

translation.en: It could be argued with hindsight now that the instalment of Binaisa as president was the start of the civil war.
translation.lug: Kiyinza okulabibwa kati nga kimaze okubaawo nti okuteekako Binaisa nga Pulezidenti nti ye yali entandikwa y'obutabanguko.

translation.en: The civil war would follow the one thousand nine hundred eighty general elections.
translation.lug: Obutabanguko bwandiddiridde okulonda kwa bonna okwa lukumi mu lwenda kinaana.

translation.en: Obote was hated by most Baganda and resented by many non-Uganda People's Congress politicians.
translation.lug: Obote yali yakyayibwa Abaganda era nga tayagalibwa bannabyabufuzi abataali bannakibiina ba Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: Obote had become the most divisive figure in Uganda's post-independence history, more divisive even than Amin.
translation.lug: Obote yali ayawuddemu nnyo abantu nga Uganda efunye obwetwaze okusinga ne Amin.

translation.en: Binaisa must have known this.
translation.lug: Binaisa alabika nga kino yali akimanyiiko.

translation.en: Powerful former freedom fighters like David Oyite Ojok, Yoweri, former Ugandan president Godfrey Binaisa and his wife Tomoko Yamamoto.
translation.lug: Abaaliko abalwanirizi b'eddembe ab'amaanyi nga David Oyite Ojok, Yoweri, eyaliko Pulezidenti wa Uganda, Godfrey Binaisa ne mukyala we Tomoko Yamamoto.

translation.en: August thirteenth to nineteenth two thousand ten, Museveni had hope of gaining and protecting power.
translation.lug: Okuva nga kkumi na ssatu okutuuka nga kkumi na mwenda Ogwomunaana nkumi bbiri mu kkumi, Museveni yalina essuubi ly'okufuna n'okukuuma obuyinza.

translation.en: Museveni's only hope of gaining and protecting power would be to appeal to the influence of Tanzania's President Julius Nyerere.
translation.lug: Essuubi lya Museveni lyokka ery'okufuna n'okukuuma obuyinza lyandibadde mu kusaba kuyambibwako Pulezidenti wa Tanzania, Julius Nyerere.

translation.en: Being from the fore mentioned generation of nationalistic minded Baganda, Binaisa sought to forge a sense of national unity and goodwill.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba yali ava mu mulembe gw'abogeddwako ogwa bamwoyogwaggwanga abalowooza ng'Abaganda, Binaisa yagezaako okutondawo obwasseruganda n'enkolagana ey'eggwanga lyonna.

translation.en: He relied on goodwill and hoped for goodwill to prevail in the chaotic wake of the end of the Amin regime.
translation.lug: Yeesigama ku kukolera awamu era n'asuubira nti okukolaganira awamu kujja kugenda mu maaso kko n'obutabanguko okusobola okukomya obufuzi bwa Amin.

translation.en: Binaisa felt that the only healing Uganda could hope for was holding elections on September one thousand nine hundred eighty.
translation.lug: Binaisa yawulira nga Uganda eyali etandise okudda engulu ekyali kirina okugiwonya kwe kutegeka okulonda mu Gwomwenda gwa 1980.

translation.en: September one thousand nine hundred eighty elections were held under common front in which all shades of political opinion could be represented.
translation.lug: Okulonda kw'Ogwomwenda gwa lukumi mu lwenda kinaana kwaliwo wansi w'emikago ng'endowooza z'abantu zonna zikiikiriddwa.

translation.en: The Moshi conference had been dominated by arguments among politicians, these same politicians rejected the idea of parties under one umbrella.
translation.lug: Olukungana lw'e Moshi lwali lujjuddemu endowooza za bannabyabufuzi, bannabyabufuzi bano be bamu baagana ekirowoozo ky'ebibiina okubeera mu mukago ogumu ogubigatta.

translation.en: The umbrella idea was a pioneer in Ugandan politics of the idea of cooperation across party lines.
translation.lug: Ekirowoozo ky'omukago kwali kutandikawo endowooza y'ebibiina okukolaganira awamu mu byobufuzi bwa Uganda.

translation.en: A forerunner to the post in 1986 in Uganda and the Inter-Party Cooperation today.
translation.lug: Akabonero ku kifo mu 1986 mu Uganda n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina byobufuzi leero.

translation.en: He attempted to reshuffle his cabinet in May one thousand nine hundred eighty.
translation.lug: Yagezaako okukyusa ebifo mu baminisita be mu Gwokutaano gwa lukumi mu lwenda kinaana.

translation.en: Yoweri Museveni Minister of Defence and Vice Chairman of Military Commission of Uganda National Liberation Front appointed Army Chief of Staff.
translation.lug: Yoweri Museveni minisita w'ebyokwerinda era amyuka ssentebe w'akakiiko k'amagye aka Uganda National Liberation Front yalonda omuduumizi omukulu ow'amagye.

translation.en: David Oyite Ojok as ambassador to Algeria resulted in his removal from office.
translation.lug: David Oyite Ojok ng'omubaka wa Uganda mu Algeria kyamuviirako okumuggya mu woofiisi.

translation.en: Many Ugandan politicians and opposition figures have discovered over the past thirty years that in Uganda the military has the final word.
translation.lug: Bannabyabufuzi mu Uganda bangi n'abooludda oluvuganya gavumenti bakizudde mu myaka asatu nti Uganda nti amagye ge galina ekigambo ekisembayo.

translation.en: He was to discover as Lule, that Uganda remains a state where the military has the final word.
translation.lug: Ye yalina okuzuula nga Lule nti Uganda esigala ensi militale mw'erina ekigambo ekisembayo.

translation.en: Even after the fall of Amin's regime, a wave of violent robberies, murders of prominent Ugandans and shooting at night suddenly erupted.
translation.lug: N'oluvannyuma nga Amin amaze okuvaako, omuyaga gw'obutabanguko gweyongera, abatemu abatemula bannayuganda abamanyifu n'okukuba abantu amasasi mu kiro byabalukawo.

translation.en: It must have shocked and puzzled many of the idealistic educated Ugandans when shooting at night suddenly erupted.
