translation.lug: Kiyinza okuba nga kya ntiisa n'okutabula Bannayuganda abayivu bangi ng'okukuba abantu amasasi ekiro kubaluseewo.

translation.en: Since one thousand nine hundred seventy-one, the darkest and most barbaric deeds in the country's history had been perpetrated by Amin.
translation.lug: Okuva mu lukumi mu lwenda nsanvu mu gumu ebikolwa ebibi era eby'edda byayolesebwa Amin mu byafaayo by'eggwanga.

translation.en: The first reaction to the post Amin violence was that these were remnants of Amin's army and State Research Bureau.
translation.lug: Ebyasooka okukolebwa ku butabanguko obwaddirira nga Amin avuddeko kyali nti akabinja k'amagye ga Amin akaasigalira ne State Research Bureau.

translation.en: To this day, the two year period in Ugandan history remains a closed chapter.
translation.lug: Okutuuka ku lunaku luno, akaseera k'emyaka ebiri mu byafaayo bya Uganda tekaliddamu.

translation.en: The murders of prominent Ugandans in one thousand nine hundred seventy nine were intended to portray Binaisa as incapable of managing security.
translation.lug: Abatemu abaatemula Bannayuganda abamanyifu mu lukumi mu lwenda kyenda mu musanvu baali bagenderedde okulaga nti Binaisa teyalina busobozi kukwasaganya byakwerinda.

translation.en: Gunpoint of prominent Ugandans was to portray Binaisa as too weak to contain the deteriorating security believed some analysts and historians.
translation.lug: Abatunuuli b'ensonga ne bannabyafaayo abamu basuubira nti okuteeka bannayuganda abamanyifu ku mudumu gw'emmundu kyali kigendereddwa kulaga nti Binaisa yali munafu nnyo okukuuma ebyokwerinda ebyali bisereba.

translation.en: Others claimed that these acts of violence were by the Uganda Peoples' Congress or parts of the army loyal to Obote.
translation.lug: Abalala baategeeza nti ebikolwa bino eby'obutabanguko byali bikolebwa Uganda People's Congress oba ebitundu ku magya agali gakkiririza mu Obote.

translation.en: The acts of violence were to emphasize the point that without Obote, Uganda could not hope to stabilize.
translation.lug: Ebikolwa eby'obutabanguko bino byali bya kukkaatiriza nsonga nti, Obote w'atali, Uganda teyinza kutebenkera.

translation.en: A bulky, simple man, Binaisa had an alert mind, was intelligent, humorous and very much the British educated African.
translation.lug: Omusajja amanyi ebintu ebingi, omwangu, Binaisa yalina obwongo obutegeera amangu, ow'essanyu era ng'ayagala nnyo Abafirika abaasomera e Bungereza.

translation.en: Binaisa is quoted as having expressed distaste for Idi Amin partly because Amin spoke broken English.
translation.lug: Binaisa yawulirwa ng'agamba nti tayagalira ddala Idi Idi Amin kubanga Amin yayogera Olungereza olumenyefu.

translation.en: Binaisa, in the remarks about Amin, betrayed the mentality of the earlier Ugandan elite, influenced and mesmerized by British culture.
translation.lug: Binaisa, ng'ayogera ku Amin, yalyamu olukwe endowooza ya Bannayuganda abaasooka okusoma, abeesigamye era ne bajjuzibwa obuwangwa bw'Abangereza.

translation.en: Binaisa was of that era.
translation.lug: Binaisa yali wa biseera ebyo.

translation.en: Amin once said the reason so many intellectuals in Uganda were so bitterly opposed to him was that he was a Muslim.
translation.lug: Amin lumu yagamba nti ensonga lwaki abayivu bangi mu Uganda baamuwakanya nnyo lwa nsonga nti yali Musiraamu.

translation.en: He would have added key details to our understanding of Uganda's chaotic history.
translation.lug: Yaandigasseeko ebyongera okutunnyonnyola ku byafaayo by'obutabanguko bwa Uganda.

translation.en: Having returned to Uganda in two thousand one, he had been reduced to a figure of fun in the eyes of Ugandans.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okukomawo mu Uganda mu nkumi bbiri mu gumu, yali asigadde ku ddala lya Bannayuganda kumutunulako butunuzi.

translation.en: He married a Japanese woman, Tomoko Yamamoto, as one of many coupled wedded via satellite link-up by the Unification Church.
translation.lug: Yawasa omukyala Omujapaani, Tomoko Yamamoto, ng'ogumu ku migogo gy'abaagalana egyagattibwa ku Unification Church okuyita ku mayengo ga seetirayiti.

translation.en: He delivered a speech at the one thousand nine hundred seventy-nine Non Aligned Movement summit in Havana.
translation.lug: Yogera ku lukungaana lwa Non Aligned Movement mu Havan mu lukumi mu lwenda nsanvu.

translation.en: News magazine photos at the time published photographs of journalists asleep in a heap as the Ugandan president spoke.

translation.en: In that speech, he praised the restoration of peace and the rule of law to Uganda by the Tanzanian army.
translation.lug: Mu kwogera kwe, yatendereza okuzzibwawo kw'emirembe n'obukulembeze obutambulira ku mateeka mu Uganda ebyaleetebwa amagye ga Tanzania.

translation.en: He stated that Tanzanian soldiers were now even dating or marrying Ugandan girls, much to the amusement of the assembled delegates.
translation.lug: Yategeeza nti abasirikale ba Tanzania akaseera kano boogerezeganya oba okuwasa abawala Abannayuganda, ekyasanyusa abakiise abaali mu lukiiko.

translation.en: Had he not been appointed president, he would have remained unclear in the pages of Ugandan history.
translation.lug: Singa teyalondebwa nga Pulezidenti, yandisigadde nga tategeerekese mu bulungi mu mpapula z'ebyafaayo bya Uganda.

translation.en: He was one of many well educated, internationally connected Ugandan intellectuals of no particular distinction.
translation.lug: Yali omu ku bayivu abangi, yakwataganya bannayuganda abayivu bangi mu bitundu eby'enjawulo.

translation.en: An elderly man pays final respects to the late Godfrey Lukongwa Binaisa at Parliament on August tenth.
translation.lug: Omusajja omukadde akuba eriiso evvannyuma ku mugenzi Godfrey Lukonga Binaisa ku Paalamenti nga kkumi Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: The casket bearing the body of the late Godfrey Lukongwa Binaisa was carried out of Parliament on August tenth.
translation.lug: Essanduuke erimu omubiri gw'omugenzi Godfrey Lukongwa Binaisa yali efulumizibwa Paalamenti nga kkumi Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: The presidency of Godfrey Lukwongwa Binaisa has been the subject of much controversy.
translation.lug: Obukulembeze bwa Godfrey Lukwonga Binaisa bubaddemu nnyo emivuyo.

translation.en: In Uganda since independence, Professor Mutibwa characterises the Binaisa presidency as one of "confusion, destruction and corruption.

translation.en: The role Binaisa played in evading the one thousand nine hundred sixty-two constitution remains controversial.
translation.lug: Omulimu ogwakolebwa Binaisa kulumbagana ssemateeka wa lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu ebiri gusigala nga tegutegeerekeka.

translation.en: Fred Guwedeko in his serialised biographical account portrays Binaisa as opportunistic in his political views.
translation.lug: Fred Guwedeko ku bimwogerwako alaga nti Binaisa yali nakigwanyizi mu ndowooza ze ez'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: His fellow lawyer Peter Mulira wondered whether he was committed to his legal profession.

translation.en: Binaisa is no longer around to defend himself.
translation.lug: Binaisa taakyaliwo kwewozaako.

translation.en: It is important for Ugandans to appreciate the circumstances at the time he inherited the highest office in the land.
translation.lug: Kya mugaso nnyo Bannayuganda okusiima embeera mwe yagendera mu woofiisi enkulu mu ggwanga.

translation.en: It is important for Ugandans to appreciate the context of the environment they operated under.
translation.lug: Kya makulu Bannayuganda okutegeera embeera gye baakoleramu.

translation.en: In one thousand nine hundred seventy-nine, Uganda's economy was in ruins; the country was under an increasingly unpopular occupational force.

translation.lug: Kahinde Otafiire yanenyezeddwa olw'obutagoberera mateeka n'alonda akakiiko abakulembeze akapya aka Uganda Wildlife Authority ejjudde ebizibu.

translation.en: Moses Mapesa said the board members lacked professional experience and competence to the management of protected areas as required.
translation.lug: Moses Mapesa yagambye akakiiko akafuzi tekalina bukugu n'obutamanya kya kukola okuddukanya ebifo ebikuumibwa nga bwe kyetagisa.

translation.en: Kirunda's lawyer Muzamir Kibeedi told the Registrar of the Court, Deo Nizeyimana, on September 13, his client needed time to sort out his finances.
translation.lug: Muzamir Kibeedi, puliida wa Kirunda yagambye omuwandiisi wa kkooti, Deo Nizeyimana, nga 13 Ogwomwenda nti omuntu we yali yeetaaga obudde okukola ku by'ensimbi ze.

translation.en: Nizeyimana warned that a warrant of arrest would be issued if the minister failed to pay on the agreed date.
translation.lug: Nizeyimana yalabudde nti ekibaluwa ki bakuntumye kijja kuyisibwa singa minisita agaana okusasulira ku nnaku z'omwezi ezikkiriziganyiziddwako.

translation.en: In the USA elections, President Obama's counterpart Hillary Clinton was subjected to doubt and was blamed for her husband's immorality.
translation.lug: Mu kulonda kwa USA, eyali avuganya Pulezidenti Obama, Hillary Clinton yali abuusibwabuusibwa era yanenyezebwa olw'obusiiwuufu bw'enpisa za bba.

translation.en: The workshop was organized by the Forum for Women in Democracy on September 2 at Ankrah Foundation Hotel in Mukono.
translation.lug: Omusomo gwategekeddwa Forum for Women in Democracy nga 2 Ogwomwenda ku Ankrah Foundation Hotel e Mukono.

translation.en: Every thing and every body in the Movement has changed except its chairman, President Museveni.
translation.lug: Buli kintu ne buli muntu mu mugendo akyuse okuggyako ssentebe waakyo, Pulezidenti Museveni.

translation.en: In 1981 it became a rebel group under the banner of National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Mu 1981, kyafuuka ekibinja ky'abayeekera mu linnya lya National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Kahinda Otafiire, Chrispus Kiyonga, Winnie Byanyima, Kizza Besigye, Jack Sabiiti, Kirunda Kivejinja, Jim Muhwezi, held different positions.
translation.lug: Kahinda Otafiire, Chrispus Kiyonga, Winnie Byanyima, Kizza Besigye, Jack Sabiiti, Kirunda Kivejinja, Jim Muhwezi, baalina ebifo eby'enjawulo.

translation.en: It absorbed other political groups changing into today's Forum for Democratic Change.
translation.lug: Kyegattibwako ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebyakyuka leero nga kati biyitibwa Forum for Democratic Change.

translation.en: Doctor Kizza Besigye was a retired Minister for Internal Affairs and Museveni's personal doctor during the bush war.
translation.lug: Doctor Kizza Besigye yali yawummula ku bwa minisita w'ensonga z'omunda era nga musawo wa Museveni mu lutalo ly'ekiyeekera.

translation.en: The members include; Beti Kamya, James Musinguzi, Atanasius Rutaro, Winnie Byanyima, former army commander Major General Mugisha Muntu.
translation.lug: Bammemba kuliko; Beti Kamya, James Musinguzi, Atanasius Rutaro, Winnie Byanyima, eyali omuduumizi w'amagye mmeeja genero Mugisha Muntu.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement released the anger on Ssemogerere.
translation.lug: National Resistance Movement yaggyayo obukambwe ku Ssemwogerere.

translation.en: Many National Social Security Fund projects have failed in the past.
translation.lug: Pulojekiti za National Social Security Fund ziremereddwa gye emabega.

translation.en: They wanted to see the big National Resistance Movement and the National Social Security Fund project fall.
translation.lug: Baali baagala kulaba nga ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement ekinene ne pulojekiti ya National Social Security Fund nga bigwa.

translation.en: Jim Crow talked about the brutality of working conditions in Britain during the 19th century.
translation.lug: Jim Crow yayogera ku mbeera y'obukambwe eyali ekolerwamu mu Bungereza mu kyasa kye 19.

translation.en: Two weeks ago, it continued to haunt the party up to September 12 when it elected its national leadership at Nambole Stadium.
translation.lug: Wiiki bbiri emabega, kyayongera okulaga obusungu ng'ekibiina okutuuka nga 12 Ogwomwenda bwe kyalonda obukulembeze bwakyo obw'oku ntikko ku kisaawe e Namboole.

translation.en: The AlShabaab are estimated to be in thousands.
translation.lug: Aba Alshabaab basuubirwa okuba mu nkumi.

translation.en: In light of the foregoing, how prepared is the security to stop this AlShabaab from their terror campaign?
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku bye tugambiddwa, ebyokwerinda byetegeze kyenkana ki okukomya obulumbaganyi bwa Alshabaab buno?

translation.en: The East African countries need to work out a regional security arrangement for joint operations.
translation.lug: Ensi za East Afirika zeetaaga okukola enteekateeza ez'awamu ku byokwerinda zibeere okukolera ku nsonga zaago awamu.

translation.en: This is because since the Uganda Police Defence Force deployed in Somalia, its hardline militants have publicly sworn to create chaos in Uganda.
translation.lug: Kino kyava olw'okuba nti Uganda Police Defence Forece eyateekebwa e Somalia, abatujju bano baalayira mu lwatu okuteekawo obusambattuko mu Uganda.

translation.en: Therefore, our security agencies were well aware of what was likely to happen only that they did not know exactly how, when, where.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo, ebitongole byaffe ebikuumaddembe byali bimanyi bulungi ku ki ekyali kiyinza okuddirira lwakuba nti byali tebinanyi ddala butya, ddi era wa?

translation.en: The government needs to take up this opportunity to mobilize people not only to ensure their personal security but also to raise their awareness.
translation.lug: Gavumenti erina okukozesa omukisa guno okukunga abantu baleme kukoma ku bukuumi bwabwe obwa ssekinoomu wabula n'okubeera obulindaala.

translation.en: We need to be active participants in keeping our country safe both for ourselves and future generations.
translation.lug: Tulina okwenyigira mu kukuuma eggwanga lyaffe nga teririimu buzibu ku lwaffe n'emirembe egirijja.

translation.en: Fortunately, as our five-car convoy snaked along, we had a police escort car with siren to cut through the mass of slow moving evening traffic.
translation.lug: Kya mukisa mulungi, oluseregende lwaffe olw'emmotoka ettaano lwasobodde okuwaguza, twabadde n'emmotoka ya poliisi erawuna okusobola okuyita mu jjaamu eyabadde omungi.

translation.en: The road is in the Ankole Masaka cattle corridor, which is a semi desert, with very little rain and lots of dust.
translation.lug: Oluguudo luli mu kitundu ekigatta Ankole ku Masaka gye balunda ennyo ente, ekirimu ekyeya, kirimu enkuba ntonno nnyo n'enfuufu nnyingi.

translation.en: We were hurrying to an interview with President Yoweri Museveni and that made us VIPs.
translation.lug: Twali twanguwa okukola yitaaviyu ne Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni era ekyo kyatufudde abakungu.

translation.en: Usually, journalists would not travel 400km just to attend a press conference.
translation.lug: Bulijjo, bannamawulire tebatera kutambula kkiromita 400 okubeera mu lukiiko lwa bannamawulire.

translation.en: The attacks were at Kyadondo Rugby grounds and an Ethiopian Restaurant in Kampala.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwali ku Kyadondo Rugby grounds ne ku Ethiopian restaurant mu Kampala.

translation.en: On the morning after the attack, Museveni visited both places to view the carnage.
translation.lug: Kumakya oluvannyuma lwobulumbaganyi, Museveni yakyaala mu bifo byombi okulaba abattidwa.

translation.en: He also visited Mulago Hospital to sympathize with the injured being treated there and console the bereaved.
translation.lug: Era yakyalako mu ddwaliro ly'e Mulago okusaasira ku baali baakoseddwa abaali bali mu kujjanjabibwa n'okukubagiza abaali bafiiriddwako abantu baabwe.

translation.en: Why the President chose to have journalists ferried all the way from Kampala to tiny Ntungamo on the border with Rwanda, I will never know.
translation.lug: Sirimanya lwaki Pulezidenti yasalawo okutikka bannamawulire ku kiddyeri okuva e Kampala okugenda e Ntungamo ku nsalo ya Rwanda?

translation.en: Journalists were put into several vans to head to Ntungamo.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire baateekebwa mu mmotoka ez'enjawulo okugenda e Ntungamo.

translation.en: The journey was supposed to start at 1pm but began at 4:30pm instead and lasted six hours.
translation.lug: Olugendo lwali luteekeddwa kutandika ku ssaawa musanvu ez'omu ttuntu naye lwatandika ku ssaawa kkumi n'ekitundu ez'akawungenzi era ne lumala essaawa mukaaga.

translation.en: After clearing the Masaka Mbarara, with its mounds of murram and dust we hit the Mbarara Ntungamo stretch.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okutereeza oluguudo lwa Masaka Mbarara, olujjuddemu entuumu za mmalamu n'enfuufu twatuuka ku luguudo lw'e Mbarara Ntungamo.

translation.en: We were running late and the event organizer, Uganda Media Centre boss Fred Opolot, kept leaning out of his dust-covered luxury Toyota Prado.
translation.lug: Twali tukeereye era omutegesi w'omukolo, akulira essengejjero ly'amawulire Fred Opolot, yagenda nga mu maaso n'okwesigama Toyota Prado ye eyali ejjudde enfuufu.

translation.en: But the Coaster van carrying most journalists could not move any faster and Opolot soon sped off, probably to calm down the President.
translation.lug: Naye emmotoka ya mminibbaasi eyali erimu bannamawulire abasinga yali tesobola kudduka nnyo era Opolot yavaayo mangu okukkakkanya Pulezidenti.

translation.en: The president's Ntungamo country home is on a murram road.
translation.lug: Amaka gw'Obwapulezidenti ag'e Ntungamo gali ku luguudo lwa mmalamu.

translation.en: It was freezing cold when we arrived after 10pm and people fell over each other to grab a cup of hot tea.
translation.lug: Obude bwali bunnyogovu nnyo we twatuukira ku ssaawa nnya ez'ekiro abantu n'ebagwira okufuna ekikopo kya ccaayi ayokya.

translation.en: Unlike, the Kampala crowd who, coming from a warmer place, wore no warm clothes, Museveni had on a checked black and white shirt .
translation.lug: Obutafaananako, abantu b'omu Kampala abava mu kifo ebirimu ebbugumu tebaayabala engoye zibuguma, Museveni yali ayambadde ebibomboola ebiddugavu n'essaati enjeru.

translation.en: "Two points," the president started as soon as the last journalists were ready.
translation.lug: Ensonga bbiri, Pulezidenti yatandika amangu ddala nga bannamawulire abaasembayo beetegese.

translation.en: Opolot allowed one question for each journalist, except Al Jazeera who had requested a short one on one interview.
translation.lug: Opolot yakkiriza ekibuuzo kimi okuva eri buli munnamawulire, okuggyako Al jazeera eyali esabye okukola yintaaviyu ey'omu kw'omu.

translation.en: When asked, Museveni said he was very angry about the bomb attacks which he blamed on the Somali radical Islamists group, AlShabaab. AlShabaab are angry that UPDF, under AU Mission in Somalia are propping up the regime, with Ethiopian support, outed them from power in 2006.
translation.lug: Bwe yabuuzibwa, Museveni yagamba nti yali munyiivu nnyo n'obulumbaganyi bwa bbomu bwe yateeka ku kibinja kya bamukwatammundu Abasiraamu abava e Somalia, Alshabaab. Alshabaab nnyiivu nnyo olwa UPDF wansi w'omukago gwa AU e Somalia oguwagira obukulembeze obuliko, n'obuwagizi bwa Ethiopia, obwabaggya mu buyinza mu 2006.

translation.en: The African Union peace and United Nations Security Council took the decision to send peacekeepers to Somalia.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya African Union Peace and United Nations Security Council kyakola okusalawo okusindika abakuumaddembe e Somalia.

translation.en: Uganda and Burundi are the only countries to send troops there although many promised.
translation.lug: Uganda ne Burundi z'ensi zokka ezirna okusindika amagye wadde nga nnyingi zaasuubiza.

translation.en: Now AlShabaab wants to bomb them out of Somalia.
translation.lug: Kati Alshabaab eyagala kubakuba bave mu Somalia.

translation.en: But Museveni said he would instead push to change the African Union Mission to Somalia mandate.
translation.lug: Naye Museveni yagamba nti yali ajja kugenda mu maaso n'okukyusa ebigendererwa bwa African Union mu Somalia.

translation.en: We were in Mogadishu doing our small bit of guarding the sea port, presidential palace and airport.
translation.lug: Twali mu Mogadishu nga tukuuma omwalo, olubiri lwa Pulezidenti n'ekisaawe ky'ennyonyi.

translation.en: Museveni said withdrawing troops from Somalia is illogical because it would mean surrendering the African continent to terrorists.
translation.lug: Museveni yagamba nti okuggyayo amagye mu Somalia kya bwewussa kubanga kitegeeza okuwaayo ssemazinga wa Afirika eri abatujju.

translation.en: He explained that he decided to send Uganda troops to Somalia because he knew the character of the terrorists .
translation.lug: Yannyongodde nti yasalawo okusindika amagye ga Uganda mu Somalia kubanga yali amanyi eneeyisa y'abattuju.

translation.en: The president blamed the July 11 terror attacks in Kampala on the AlShabaab militants.
translation.lug: Obulumabaganyi obwakolebwa mu Kampala nga 11 Ogwomusanvu Pulezidenti abussa ku bamukwatammundu ba Alshabaab.

translation.en: The Inspector General of Police Kale Kayihura responds to questions from journalist during the press briefing with the President .
translation.lug: Omuduumizi wa police Kale Kayihura addamu ebibuuzo bya bannamawulire mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire ne Pulezidenti.

translation.en: There were problems noted on the July 23rd to 29th 2010.
translation.lug: Waaliwo ebizibu ebyazuulibwa nga 23 okutuuka nga 29 Ogwomusanvu, 2010.

translation.en: Watching him speak, I thought of the many people who oppose Museveni on Somalia.
translation.lug: Bwe nnamulaba ng'ayogera, nnalowooza ku bantu bangi abawakanya Museveni ku Somalia.

translation.en: Dr Kizza Besigye, the leader of Uganda's biggest opposition party, says Uganda has no business being in Somalia.
translation.lug: Dr.Kizza Besigye, omukulembeze w'ekibiina ky'oludda oluvuganya ekisinga obunene agamba Uganda terina nsonga ya kubeera mu Somalia.

translation.en: He says African countries like Nigeria and Malawi that promised troops have not sent them.
translation.lug: Agamba ensi za Afirika nga Nigeria ne Malawi ezaasuubiza amagye tezinnagasindika.

translation.en: The Uganda Police Defence Force has been fighting all along, Ugandans are not told the truth that we are fighting on one side of civil war.
translation.lug: Uganda Police Defence Forece ebaade obudde bwonna erwanagana, Bannayuganda tebagambibwa kituufu nti tulwanira ku ludda lwe lumu n'abantu ba bulijjo mu lutalo.

translation.en: I concluded that Museveni is better off using the chance for hosting the African Union to convince African leaders to choose a better strategy.
translation.lug: Mmaliriza nga ngamba nti kisingako Museveni okukozesa omukisa gw'okukyaza African Union okumatiza abakulembeze b'amawanga ga Afirika okulonda engeri ennungi.

translation.en: One way would be to get more African Union states to send troops under African Union Mission to Somalia.
translation.lug: Engeri emu yandibadde ya kufuna ensi z'amawanga ga Afirika amagatte okusindika amagye mu Somalia wansi w'omukago gwa African Union.

translation.en: Merely relying on Inter Governmental Authority Development might mean Uganda will remain in Somalia alone.
translation.lug: Okwemalira obwemalizi ku Inter Government Authority Development kiyinza okutegeeza nti Uganda ejja kusigala mu Somalia yokka.

translation.en: Inter Governmental Authority Development comprises seven countries; Somalia, Djibouti, Ethiopia, Uganda, Kenya, Sudan and Eritrea.
translation.lug: Inter Governmental Authority Development ekolebwa ensi musanvu; Somalia, Djibouti, Ethiopia, Uganda, Kenya, Sudan ne Eritrea.

translation.en: Inter Governmental Authority Development wants the troops increased from the current six thousand three hundred to twenty thousand.
translation.lug: Inter Governmental Authority eyagala abajaasi bongerebweko okuva ku baliyo akakaaga mu ebisatu okutuuka ku mitwaalo ebiri.

translation.en: Eritrea, one of the three countries free to send troops to Somalia, is suspended.
translation.lug: Eritrea, emu ku nsi essatu ezirina eddembe okusindika amagye e Somalia, yawerebwa.

translation.en: Sudan has never shown any interests in taking its soldiers to Somalia.
translation.lug: Sudan telagangako bwagazi mu kusindika magye mu Somalia.

translation.en: If Uganda manages to get the African Union Mission to Somalia mandate changed but other African Union countries fail to send more troops.
translation.lug: Singa Uganda ekyusa ekiruubirirwa kya African Union mu Somalia naye ensi endala ne ziremererwa okusindika amagye amalala.

translation.en: He explained that he had a house in Ntungamo because his ancestors were born in the present Ntungamo and Rukungiri districts.
translation.lug: Yannyonnyodde nti yalina ennyumba e Ntungamo kubanga bajjajja be baazaalibwa mu disituliki kati Ntungamo ne Rukungiri.

translation.en: The journalists were told they would sleep in Mbarara, about 66kms away, and we immediately went back to our vehicles
translation.lug: Bannamawulire baagambibwa nti bandisuze e Mbarara, kkiromita nga 66 okuva mu kifo we baali, era ne tuddayo mangu mu mmotoka zaffe.

translation.en: Most journalists, however, decided to drive through the night and were in Kampala at about 7pm.
translation.lug: Wabula, bannamawulire abasinga baasalowo okuvuga mu kiro era ssaawa yagenda okuwera emu eyoolweggulo nga batuuse mu Kampala.

translation.en: The journalists arrived at 7:30 pm the next day.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire baatuka enkeera ku ssaawa emu n'ekitundu ey'akawungeezi.

translation.en: On the journey back, along the bumpy and dusty road, I kept thinking how Museveni is a resolute man who will not flinch from a fight.
translation.lug: Mu lugendo nga bakomawo, mu nguudo ez'ebinnya n'enfuufu, nalowoozanga ku ngeri Museveni gyali omusajja omumalirivu ataliva ku kulwana.

translation.en: But I was keenly aware that even powerful countries, like the USA, that have in the past attempted to pacify Somalia, have failed and fled.
translation.lug: Naye nali nkimanyi nti n'ensi ez'amaanyi nga USA, ezaagezaako emabega okuzza emirembe mu Somalia zaalemwa ne zivaayo.

translation.en: It is too early to tell what Museveni and Uganda's road to Somalia might be like, but it is certainly bumpier than mine to Ntungamo.
translation.lug: Obudde bukyali okutegeera ki Museveni n'olugendo lw'e Somalia bwe lwandibadde, naye lwa binnya ng'olwange nga ngenda e Ntungamo.

translation.en: Brian Bwesigye, on July 11th will go down in the history books as the day Uganda was thrown into a somber mood of shock, bitterness and panic.
translation.lug: Brian Bwesigye, nga 11 Ogwomusanvu lujja kugenda mu bitabo by'ebyafaayo ng'olunaku Uganda lwe yagenda mu mbeera enzimbu ey'ekyekango, enkaawu era ey'okupapa.

translation.en: The twin bomb attacks in Kampala did not only turn an otherwise merry night into a tragic night of death and suffering.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwa bbomu ebbiri mu Kampala tezaafuuka bufuuzi ekiro ekyali ekirungi okufuuka eky'enjega y'okufa n'okubonaabona.

translation.en: The AlShabaab, an Islamic extremist organization soon after claimed responsibility for the attacks that left 76 people dead.
translation.lug: Akabinja ka bamukwatammundu Abasiraamu aka Alshabaab oluvannyuma keewaana nga bwe kaali kakoze obulumbaganyi obwaleka abantu 76 nga bafu.

translation.en: The attacks reignited the debate on Uganda's deployment of its troops for the African Union peace mission in Somalia.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwavaako okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku Uganda okutwala amagye gaayo ku kigendererwa kya African Union eky'okukuuma emirembe mu Somalia.

translation.en: AlShabaab has warned Uganda and Burundi that there will be reprisals in Kampala and Bujumbura.
translation.lug: Alshabaab erabudde Uganda ne Burundi nti wajja kubaawo okuwoolera mu Kampala ne mu Bujumbura.

translation.en: AU Mission in Somalia with UN mandate to protect the Somalia Transitional Federal Government and the shaky peace process in Somalia.
translation.lug: Ekyigendererwa kya AU mu Somalia ku kiragiro kya UN okukuuma Somalia Transitional Federal Government n'emirembe egyali giyuugayuuga mu Somalia.

translation.en: AlShabaab, an extremist military organization linked to AlQaeda, the world's most deadly terror group, controls a larger part of Somalia.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka za bamukwatammundu ba Alshabaab zaamanyibwako Alqaeda, akabinja k'abayeekera akasinga okuba ak'obulabe mu nsi yonna akafuga ekitundu kya Somalia ekinene.

translation.en: The forces that are currently in Somalia are understrength and underequipped the United Nations and European Union, among others.
translation.lug: Amagye agaali mu Somalia kati galina amaanyi era galina buli ekyetaagisa okuva mu United Nations and European Union, n'endala.

translation.en: The hostile environment in which the forces operate creates insecurity for the troops.
translation.lug: Embeera enzibu amagye mwe gakolera eteekawo obutali butebenkevu eri amagye.

translation.en: AlShabaab has killed dozens of African Union Mission to Somalia soldiers and injured many others.
translation.lug: Alshabaab esse abaserikare abasindikibwa African Union Mission bangi era ne balumya bangi.

translation.en: Yet the troops face significant constraints on their ability to operate as the United Nations authorized mandate.
translation.lug: Ate amagye gasanga obuzibu mu kusobola okutuukiriza emirimu gyago ng'ekiragiro United Nations bwe kigamba.

translation.en: This strategy puts the African Union Mission to Somalia troops in a delicate and vulnerable situation.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka eno eteeka ekigendererwa kya African Union eky'okusindika amagye mu Somalia mu bulabe era mu lusuubo.

translation.en: AlShabaab fighters dress like civilians and use weapons that inflict mass casualties at once.
translation.lug: Abalwanyi ba Alshabaab bambala ng'abantu ba bulijjo era bakozesa ebyokulwanyisa ebirumya abantu bangi omulundi gumu.

translation.en: African Union Mission to Somalia is thus a crippled mission that cannot defeat AlShabaab.
translation.lug: Ekyigendererwa kya African Union e Somalia kigootaanye nti tekisobola kuwangula Alshabaab.

translation.en: Thus, as AlShabaab attacks Uganda for deploying troops in Somalia, Ugandan soldiers in Mogadishu have no mandate to fight the armed militia.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo, nga Alshabaab bw'erumba Uganda olw'okutwala amagye mu Somalia, abajaasi ba Uganda mu Mogadishu tebalina kiragiro kyonna kulwana ne bamukwatammundu.

translation.en: Therefore this calls for a rethink of Uganda's security and foreign policy on Somalia.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo kino kyetaagisa ebyokwerinda bya Uganda okuddamu okulowooza n'ensonga z'ebweru ku Somalia.

translation.en: From the outpouring emotion and reaction among the Ugandan public, two important opinions on what citizens want the country to do come up.
translation.lug: Okuva ku mbeera embi bannayuganda gye balimu n'ebiva mu bantu, ensonga bbiri ez'omugaso bannansi ze baagala eggwanga liveeyo nazo.

translation.en: One, that Uganda should hunt down AlShabaab so as to disable them and save the world from terror attacks.
translation.lug: Ekisooka, nti Uganda erina okuyigga Alshabaab esobole okubalemesa n'okutaasa ensi okuva mu bulumbaganyi bw'abatujju.

translation.en: Another is that Uganda should withdraw from Somalia and beef up its national security.
translation.lug: Endala eri nti Uganda erina okuva mu Somalia enyweze ebyokwerinda byayo.

translation.en: If we have no peace and security in Uganda, the citizens have a right and duty to ask their state to withdraw its forces and maximize security here.
translation.lug: Bwe tuba nga tetulina mirembe na bukuumi mu Uganda, bannansi balina eddembe n'omulimu okusaba gavumenti okuggyayo amagye gaayo okunyweza wano obukuumi.

translation.en: We can contemplate a mission to hunt down AlShabaab when we are assured of our own security.
translation.lug: Tusobola okulowooza ku kigendererwa ky'okuyigga Alshabaab nga tumaze kunyweza ebyokwerinda by'eggwanga lyaffe.

translation.en: Eritrea, one of the three countries free to send troops to Somalia, is suspended.
translation.lug: Eritrea, emu ku nsi ezirina eddembe okusindika amagye e Somalia, yawerebwa.

translation.en: Sudan has never shown any interests in taking its soldiers to Somalia.
translation.lug: Sudan telaganga bwagazi mu kusindika magye gaayo mu Somalia.

translation.en: If Uganda manages to get the African Union Mission to Somalia mandate changed but other African Union countries fail to send more troops.
translation.lug: Singa Uganda ekyusa ekiruubirirwa kya African Union mu Somalia naye ensi endala ne ziremererwa okusindika amagye amalala.

translation.en: He explained that he had a house in Ntungamo because his ancestors were born in the present Ntungamo and Rukungiri districts.
translation.lug: Yannyonnyodde nti yalina ennyumba e Ntungamo kubanga bajjajja be baazaalibwa mu disituliki kati Ntungamo ne Rukungiri.

translation.en: The journalists were told they would sleep in Mbarara, about 66kms away, and we immediately went back to our vehicles
translation.lug: Bannamawulire baagambibwa nti bandisuze e Mbarara, kkiromita nga 66 okuva mu kifo we baali, era ne tuddayo mangu mu mmotoka zaffe.

translation.en: Most journalists, however, decided to drive through the night and were in Kampala at about 7pm.
translation.lug: Wabula, bannamawulire abasinga baasalowo okuvuga mu kiro era ssaawa yagenda okuwera emu eyoolweggulo nga batuuse mu Kampala.

translation.en: The journalists arrived at 7:30 pm the next day.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire baatuka enkeera ku ssaawa emu n'ekitundu ey'akawungeezi.

translation.en: On the journey back, along the bumpy and dusty road, I kept thinking how Museveni is a resolute man who will not flinch from a fight.
translation.lug: Mu lugendo nga bakomawo, mu nguudo ez'ebinnya n'enfuufu, nalowoozanga ku ngeri Museveni gyali omusajja omumalirivu ataliva ku kulwana.

translation.en: But I was keenly aware that even powerful countries, like the USA, that have in the past attempted to pacify Somalia, have failed and fled.
translation.lug: Naye nali nkimanyi nti n'ensi ez'amaanyi nga USA, ezaagezaako emabega okuzza emirembe mu Somalia zaalemwa ne zivaayo.

translation.en: It is too early to tell what Museveni and Uganda's road to Somalia might be like, but it is certainly bumpier than mine to Ntungamo.
translation.lug: Obudde bukyali okutegeera ki Museveni n'olugendo lw'e Somalia bwe lwandibadde, naye lwa binnya ng'olwange nga ngenda e Ntungamo.

translation.en: Brian Bwesigye, on July 11th will go down in the history books as the day Uganda was thrown into a somber mood of shock, bitterness and panic.
translation.lug: Brian Bwesigye, nga 11 Ogwomusanvu lujja kugenda mu bitabo by'ebyafaayo ng'olunaku Uganda lwe yagenda mu mbeera enzimbu ey'ekyekango, enkaawu era ey'okupapa.

translation.en: The twin bomb attacks in Kampala did not only turn an otherwise merry night into a tragic night of death and suffering.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwa bbomu ebbiri mu Kampala tezaafuuka bufuuzi ekiro ekyali ekirungi okufuuka eky'enjega y'okufa n'okubonaabona.

translation.en: The AlShabaab, an Islamic extremist organization soon after claimed responsibility for the attacks that left 76 people dead.
translation.lug: Akabinja ka bamukwatammundu Abasiraamu aka Alshabaab oluvannyuma keewaana nga bwe kaali kakoze obulumbaganyi obwaleka abantu 76 nga bafu.

translation.en: The attacks reignited the debate on Uganda's deployment of its troops for the African Union peace mission in Somalia.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwavaako okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku Uganda okutwala amagye gaayo ku kigendererwa kya African Union eky'okukuuma emirembe mu Somalia.

translation.en: AlShabaab has warned Uganda and Burundi that there will be reprisals in Kampala and Bujumbura.
translation.lug: Alshabaab erabudde Uganda ne Burundi nti wajja kubaawo okuwoolera mu Kampala ne mu Bujumbura.

translation.en: African Union Mission in Somalia with UN mandate to protect the Somalia Transitional Federal Government and the shaky peace process in Somalia.
translation.lug: Ekyigendererwa kya AU mu Somalia ku kiragiro kya UN okukuuma Somalia Transitional Federal Government n'emirembe egyali giyuugayuuga mu Somalia.

translation.en: AlShabaab, an extremist military organization linked to AlQaeda, the world's most deadly terror group, controls a larger part of Somalia.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka za bamukwatammundu ba Alshabaab zaamanyibwako Alqaeda, akabinja k'abayeekera akasinga okuba ak'obulabe mu nsi yonna akafuga ekitundu kya Somalia ekinene.

translation.en: It has thus attacked African Union Mission to Somalia troops and warned it will continue to attack the citizens of the contributing states.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo erumbye amagye agaatwali African Union mu Somalia era n'erabula nti ejja kwongera okukola obulumbaganyi ku bannansi b'ensi eziriyo.

translation.en: The forces that are currently in Somalia are understrength and underequipped the United Nations and European Union, among others.
translation.lug: Amagye agaali mu Somalia kati galina amaanyi era galina buli ekyetaagisa okuva mu United Nations and European Union, n'endala.

translation.en: The hostile environment in which the forces operate creates insecurity for the troops.
translation.lug: Embeera enzibu amagye mwe gakolera eteekawo obutali butebenkevu eri amagye.

translation.en: AlShabaab has killed dozens of African Union Mission to Somalia soldiers and injured many others.
translation.lug: Alshabaab esse abaserikare abasindikibwa African Union Mission bangi era ne balumya bangi.

translation.en: Yet the troops face significant constraints on their ability to operate as the United Nations authorized mandate.
translation.lug: Ate amagye gasanga obuzibu mu kusobola okutuukiriza emirimu gyago ng'ekiragiro United Nations bwe kigamba.

translation.en: This strategy puts the African Union Mission to Somalia troops in a delicate and vulnerable situation.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka eno eteeka ekigendererwa kya African Union eky'okusindika amagye mu Somalia mu bulabe era mu lusuubo.

translation.en: AlShabaab fighters dress like civilians and use weapons that inflict mass casualties at once.
translation.lug: Abalwanyi ba Alshabaab bambala ng'abantu ba bulijjo era bakozesa ebyokulwanyisa ebirumya abantu bangi omulundi gumu.

translation.en: African Union Mission to Somalia is thus a crippled mission that cannot defeat AlShabaab.
translation.lug: Ekyigendererwa kya African Union e Somalia kigootaanye nti tekisobola kuwangula Alshabaab.

translation.en: Thus, as AlShabaab attacks Uganda for deploying troops in Somalia, Ugandan soldiers in Mogadishu have no mandate to fight the armed militia.
translation.lug: Noolwekyo, nga Alshabaab bw'erumba Uganda olw'okutwala amagye mu Somalia, abajaasi ba Uganda mu Mogadishu tebalina kiragiro kyonna kulwana ne bamukwatammundu.

translation.en: Therefore this calls for a rethink of Uganda's security and foreign policy on Somalia.
translation.lug: Noolwekyo kino kyetaagisa ebyokwerinda bya Uganda okuddamu okulowooza n'ensonga z'ebweru ku Somalia.

translation.en: From the outpouring emotion and reaction among the Ugandan public, two important opinions on what citizens want the country to do come up.
translation.lug: Okuva ku mbeera embi bannayuganda gye balimu n'ebiva mu bantu, ensonga bbiri ez'omugaso bannansi ze baagala eggwanga liveeyo nazo.

translation.en: One, that Uganda should hunt down AlShabaab so as to disable them and save the world from terror attacks.
translation.lug: Esooka, nti Uganda erina okuyigga Alshabaab esobole okubalemesa n'okutaasa ensi okuva mu bulumbaganyi bw'abatujju.

translation.en: Another is that Uganda should withdraw from Somalia and beef up its national security.
translation.lug: Endala eri nti Uganda erina okuva mu Somalia enyweze ebyokwerinda byayo.

translation.en: If we have no peace and security in Uganda, the citizens have a right and duty to ask their state to withdraw its forces and maximize security here.
translation.lug: Bwe tuba nga tetulina mirembe na bukuumi mu Uganda, bannansi balina eddembe n'omulimu okusaba gavumenti okuggyayo amagye gaayo okunyweza wano obukuumi.

translation.en: We can contemplate a mission to hunt down AlShabaab when we are assured of our own security.
translation.lug: Tusobola okulowooza ku ngeri y'okuyigga Alshabaab nga tumaze kunyweeza eby'okwelinda byaffe.

translation.en: Further, African Union Mission to Somalia as it stands today has a limited mandate and resources.
translation.lug: Okwongerako, ekya African Union nga bwe kiri kati kiriko obukwakkulizo n'ebikozesebwa.

translation.en: Mukwaya is a National Resistance Movement scare monger Professor.
translation.lug: Mukwaya yaasaasaanya olugambo mu National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: He says the Inter Party Cooperation should break up and the individual parties find their own candidates.
translation.lug: Agamba nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gulina okuvaawo ebibiina byenoonyeze abaneesimbawo ku bwabyo.

translation.en: He says the Inter Party Cooperation should break up and the individual parties field their own candidates.
translation.lug: Agamba nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gulina okuvaawo ebibiina byenoonyeze abaneesimbawo ku bwabyo.

translation.en: He speculates that even after winning power, the Inter Party Cooperation would disintegrate into warring camps.
translation.lug: Ateebereza nti n'oluvannyuma lw'okuwangula obuyinza, omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi    gujja kusasika guveemu enkambi ezeemulugunya.

translation.en: What is at issue in the next election, is not which party is more united.
translation.lug: Nsonga eri mu kulonda okujja, ebibina si gye bisimbyeko amakanda.

translation.en: Mukwaya must have read Niccolo Machiavelli's discourses.
translation.lug: Mukwaya alabika yasoma ku biwandiiko bya Niccolo Machiavelli.

translation.en: Over the last five years, Uganda has begun to look more like a monarchy than a republic.
translation.lug: Okumala emyaka etaano egiyise, Uganda etandise okulabika ng'ensi etambulizibwa ku nfunga ey'ennono okusinga ku bukulembeze obulondebwa.

translation.en: To me this is the most important goal for voters in 2011.
translation.lug: Ku nze kino kye kiruubirirwa ky'abalonzi ekisinga omugaso mu 2011.

translation.en: Therefore, whether the Inter Party Cooperation will collapse or not is irrelevant to the 2011 elections and thereafter.
translation.lug: Noolwekyo, newankubadde omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gujja kusasika oba nedda, gwetaagisa mu kulonda kwa 2011 n'okugenda mu maaso.

translation.en: If Inter Party Cooperation collapses, it will be replaced by new groups to please an energized electorate.
translation.lug: Singa omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gusasika, gujja kusikizibwa ekibinja ekipya okuzzaamu abalonzi amaanyi.

translation.en: In 2002, Kenya rejected Daniel Arap Moi's monarchical rule, ushering in the Rainbow Coalition.
translation.lug: Mu 2002, Kenya yagaana enfuga ya Daniel Arap Moi ey'ensikirano, ekyaleetawo omukago gw'ebibiina eby'enjawulo.

translation.en: In 2007, the political class tried to steal power back from the commoners.
translation.lug: Mu 2007, ebibiina byobufuzi byagezaako okubba obuyinza okuva mu bantu ba bulijjo.

translation.en: The result was an even weaker political class, which finally caved in, paving the way for the 2010 constitutional amendments.
translation.lug: Ekyavaamu kyali kibinja ky'ebyobufuzi ekyajjawo oluvannyuma, ekyaleetawo oluwenda olw'okukyusa ssemateeka mu 2010.

translation.en: Voters should shun these scare tactics by the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Abalonzi balina okwewala obukodyo bw'okutiisibwatiisibwa National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: The message was sent using Jessica Banturaki's email.
translation.lug: Obubaka bwaweerezebwa nga bakozesa mmeyiro ya Jessica Banturaki.

translation.en: Ugandan terror concessions are strange looking at the Middle East, especially the Palestine Israel suicide bombing incidents.
translation.lug: Obutujju obukolebwa ku Uganda bufaananako obwo obuli mu Middle East okusingira ddala ku bbomu ezikubwa mu Palestine, Israel.

translation.en: Take an example of Timothy, the 1995 Oklahoma bombing.
translation.lug: Twala ekyokulabirako kya Timothy, bbomu ezaakubwa e Oklahoma mu 1995.

translation.en: Despite commending Rwandans and their leaders ,the western world is speculating on what will happen in Rwanda in 2017.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeeko okunenya Abanyalwanda n'omukulembeze waabwe, ensi z'abazungu ziteebereza ku ki ekinatuuka e Rwanda mu 2017.

translation.en: They are always predicting bad scenarios like President Kagame will change the constitution to allow him seek a third term.
translation.lug: Babeera bateebereza ku mbeera embi okugeza Pulezidenti Kagame ajja kukyusa ssemateeka okumukkiriza okwesimbawo ekisanja ekyokusatu.

translation.en: The three men who remained on the ballot were not considered real alternatives to Mr. Kagame.
translation.lug: Abasajja abasatu abaasigala ku kakonge tebaatwalibwa kuba basika ba mwami Kagame.

translation.en: Frank Habineza, his deputy and his green party were not even known in that party and they don't know the reality of this country.
translation.lug: Frank Habineza, omumyuka we n'ekibiina kye ekya green party baali tebamanyikiddwa na mu kiiina era baali tebamanyi mbeera eggwanga gye lyalimu.

translation.en: This is what happened in the recent elections in Rwanda and it happens everywhere in the world.
translation.lug: Kino kye kyatuuka mu kulonda okwakaggwa mu Rwanda era kituuse buli wamu mu nsi.

translation.en: It's an insult to Rwandans to say that after Paul Kagame, Rwanda will no longer exist.
translation.lug: Kuba butawa kitiibwa Banyalwanda okugamba nti oluvannyuma lwa Paul Kagame, bajja kusaanawo.

translation.en: Joseph Habineza, the Minister of Sports and Culture Republic of Rwanda People should not worry about Kagame's legacy.
translation.lug: Joseph Habineza, Minisita w'ebyemizannyo n'ebyobuwangwa mu Rwanda agamba nti Bannalwanda tebalina kweraliikirira ku lugendo lwa Kagame.

translation.en: When asked why he carried out the bombing, he said for the same reason that takes you to Iraq.
translation.lug: Bwe yabuuzibwa lwakyi yatega bbomu, yagamba nti olw'ensonga y'emu ebatwala mu Iraq.

translation.en: Now when I see our Hassan Luyimas here shedding tears and apologizing, I wonder why these are behaving differently from the usual terrorists.
translation.lug: Kati bwe ndaba Hassan Luyimas waffe wano ng'akaaba amaziga n'okwetonda, neewuunya lwakibano beeyisa mu ngeri ey'enjawulo etali ya batujju ba bulijjo.

translation.en: We have got less than two hundred days to 2011 elections but the Uganda opposition has failed to convince the voters.
translation.lug: Ennaku ze tusigazzaayo teziwera na 100 okutuuka ku kulonda kwa 2011 naye oludda oluvuganya lukyalemeddwa okukakasa abalonzi.

translation.en: Mao's Democratic Party and Bidandi Ssali's party are fighting the Interparty Cooperation.
translation.lug: Democratic party ya Mao n'ekibiina kya Bidandi Ssali balwanyisa omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: I suggest that the Inter Party Cooperation ignores Mao and Bidandi and start selling their policies to the masses.
translation.lug: Nteesa nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi guve ku Mao ne Bidandi gutandike okutunda ebirowoozo byago eri bantu.

translation.en: The opposition should, for instance, have a policy on Universal Primary and Secondary Education .
translation.lug: Oludda oluvuganya lulina, okugeza, okubeera n'enkola za bonnabasome wa Pulayimale n'owa Sekendule.

translation.en: When President Museveni introduced Universal Primary Education in 1997 after the 1996 elections, it won him a lot of support,
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni bwe yatandikawo bonnabasome wa Pulayimale mu 1997 oluvannyuma lwa 1996, kyamuwa obuwanguzi bungi.

translation.en: In 2006, when he went back to the population, he reminded them of the Universal Primary Education.
translation.lug: Mu 2006, bwe yaddayo mu bantu, yabajjukiza bonnabasome owa Pulayimale.

translation.en: Museveni promised the peasants Universal Secondary Education if they voted him.
translation.lug: Museveni yasuubiza abantu ba wansi bonnabasome owa singa bamulonda.

translation.en: I don't know what Museveni will promise the voters in 2011 but he always has something up his sleeve to give them.
translation.lug: Simanyi ki Museveni ky'ajja kusuubiza balonzi mu 2011 naye abaawo ne ky'abateekeddeteekedde.

translation.en: Abbey Kibirige Semuwemba is reporting from the United Kingdom.
translation.lug: Abbey Kibirige Semuwemba asaka amawulire okuva e Bungereza.

translation.en: African tribalism makes people to compliment Andrew Mwenda.
translation.lug: Obuwangwa bw'Abafirika buleetera abantu okwogera ku Andrew Mwenda.

translation.en: I want to add one important point that is if you study European history.
translation.lug: Njagala okwongerako ensonga enkulu emu bwe kiba ng'osoma European History.

translation.en: To the very best of my understanding, Rwanda had a very strong feudal structure at the onset of European colonization.
translation.lug: Mu kutegeera gwange, Rwanda yalina enkola y'obwannannyini ku ttaka ennungi ng'abafuzi b'amatwale baakajja.

translation.en: However, the invading Europeans were already well beyond feudalism.
translation.lug: Wabula, Abazungu abajja baali bamalirivu okwonoona enkola y'obwannannyini ku ttaka.

translation.en: The demise of feudalism in Europe brought up much of the territorial nationalism.
translation.lug: Okuggyawo obwannannyini ku ttaka mu Bulaaya kyaleetaawo okulwanira amatwale.

translation.en: David hatred is created by circumstances, not foreign powers alone.
translation.lug: Obukyayi bwa David butondebwawo mbeera si mawanga g'ebweru gokka.

translation.en: For example some Banyoro in Mubende and Kiboga were forcibly converted into Baganda during the colonial occupation.
translation.lug: Okugeza Abanyoro abamu e Mubende n'e Kiboga baakakibwa okufuuka Abaganda ng'afuzi b'amatwale bazze.

translation.en: We see it everyday on the streets of Kampala.
translation.lug: Tokyiraba buli lunaku ku nguudo za Kampala.

translation.en: Ethnic divisions are not new in most of Africa except Ethiopia and Liberia which were never colonized.
translation.lug: Enjawukana mu mawanga si mpya mu Afrika okuggyako mu Ethiopia ne Liberia zitaafugibwako bafuzi ba matwale.

translation.en: OchetoI can forgive you for not reading the feeling among Rwandans correctly.
translation.lug: Ochetol asobola okukusonyiwa olw'obutategeera bulungi ki Abanyalwanda kye baali bategeeza.

translation.en: But if Kagame even holds such a view, he would be living in denial.
translation.lug: Naye singa Kagame alina ekirowoozo ng'ekyo, yandibadde agaanibwa.

translation.en: Mwenda says history is not shaped by literature.
translation.lug: Mwenda agamba ebyafaayo tebifugibwa byawandiikibwa.

translation.en: Do the Hutu and Tutsi of Rwanda nurse ancient hatred?
translation.lug: Abahutu n'Abatuusi b'e Rwanda beevuma ekyo ekyaliwo emabega?

translation.en: Money was spent by a United Kingdom charity organization renovating Saint Kizito Mpungwe Primary school in Jinja district.
translation.lug: Ssente zaasaasaanyizibwa ekitongole kya Bungereza ekigabi kyobuyambi okuddaabiriza Saint Kizito Mpungwe Primary School mu disitulikiti y'e Jinja.

translation.en: The money which the Chief Administrative Officer of Oyam district are accused of misappropriating.
translation.lug: Ssente omukulu wa disitulikiti y'e Oyam zaagambibwa okukozesa ku bintu ebirala.

translation.en: Uganda owes tobacco farmers in Arua district an amount of money from leaf tobacco commodities
translation.lug: Kkampuni ya ttaaba mu disitulikiti ya Arua ebanja Uganda ssente eziva mu bintu ebikolebwa mu bikoola bya taaba.

translation.en: Five hundred and thirty seven assorted weapons were recovered from poachers in Nebbi district.
translation.lug: Ebyokulwanyisa ebikumi bitaano mu asatu mu musanvu byaggyiddwa ku bayizzi mu disitulikiti y'e Nebbi.

translation.en: One hundred homes were flooded in the city suburb of Busabala in Masajja zone after a heavy afternoon downpour.
translation.lug: Amaka kikumi gajjudde amataba mu kitundu ky'enzigotta eky'e Busabala mu zooni y'e Masajja oluvannyuma lw'enkuba okutonya emisana.

translation.en: The much awaited curiosity about Tiger Woods relationship with Elin Nordegren had finally come to a halt.
translation.lug: Okwagala okumanya okw'amaanyi ku nkolagana ya Tiger woods ne Elin Nordegren kumaze ne kuggwa.

translation.en: Nakasi says, "I have managed to get one man sentenced for raping a child".
translation.lug: Nakasi agamba nti, Nsobodde okusibya omusajja omu olw'okukabassanya omwana.

translation.en: The Isis-WICCE has released a report of stories of how sexual violence has affected women in Uganda, Liberia and Zimbabwe.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'amawanga amagatte ekitaba abakyala kifulumizza alipoota eraga engeri okukabassanya gye kukosezzaamu abakyala mu Uganda, Liberia ne Zimbabwe.

translation.en: According to the February 2010 study by Isis-Women's International Cross Cultural Exchange and researchers from Coventry University.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza kw'Ogwokubiri 2010 kw'ekitongole ky'ensi yonna ekitaba abakyala wamu n'okunoonyereza okuva ku ssettendekero ya Coventry.

translation.en: Dominica Banire from Zimbabwe Women and AIDS Support Network says;
translation.lug: Dominica Banire okuva mu Zimbabwe Women and AIDS Support Network egamba;

translation.en: "If one is tested positive and the other is negative, men tend to blame women for bringing the virus".
translation.lug: Singa omu azuulibwamu akawuka ate omulala nga takalina, abasajja bamanyi okunenya abakyala olw'okuleeta akawuka.

translation.en: The Nakasi story is a case of a much broader miracle widely spread in nearly all conflict-ridden countries on the continent.
translation.lug: Emboozi ya Nakasi y'emu ku ky'amagero ekisaasanidde kumpi mu mawanga gonna agalimu abusambatuko ku ssemazinga.

translation.en: Rukiga Makuma says the July 19-21 African Union summit in Kampala was hijacked by the July 11 terror attacks by the Al-Shabaab Islamic militants.
translation.lug: Rukiga Maluma agamba nti olukugaana lw'amawanga ga Afirika amagatte olw'Ogwomusanvu okuva nga 19-21 lwataataaganyizibwa obulumbaganyi bwa bamukwatammundu Abasiraamu aba Al-Shabaab.

translation.en: The summit which had been themed on "Maternal, infant and child development in Africa" was changed.
translation.lug: Olukugaana olwali ku mulamwa "Okuzaala, abaana abawere n'enkuza y'abaana mu Afirika" yakyusibwa.

translation.en: In order to first discuss the Al-Shabaab latest terror missions.
translation.lug: Okusobola okusooka okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nnumba za Al-Shabab azaakaggwa.

translation.en: It transpired at the summit that of the many challenges facing Africa, the search for peace and security remains the most pressing.
translation.lug: Kyagwawo ku lukkungaana nti ku kusomooza okungi Afirika kw'esanga, okunoonya eddembe n'obukuumi kisigala nga kye kisinga obukulu.

translation.en: The August 31 2009 three cities declaration constrains states to deal with the burden of conflicts and violence on the continent.
translation.lug: Okulangirira kw'ebibuga ebisatu nga 31 Ogwomunaana 2009 kikaka amawanga okukola ku kizibu ky'obukuubagano n'obutabanguko ku ssemazinga.

translation.en: This done by committing resources.
translation.lug: Kino ekikolebwa ng'oteemamu ebintu.

translation.en: The lastest victim of the conflict troubling many parts of Africa is Uganda which lost 74 people in the July 11 bomb blasts.
translation.lug: Akyasembyeyo okukosebwa obutabanguko mu bitundu bya Afirika ebingi ebisoomoozebwa ye Uganda eyafiirwa abantu 74 mu kubwatuka kwa bbomu nga 11 Ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: It also had dozens of others wounded.
translation.lug: Era yafuna ne ddaziini z'abalala abali ku bisago.

translation.en: All the African Union leaders condemned the Al-Shabaab acts.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze b'amawanga agali mu mukago ogutaba amawanga ga Afirika baavumirira ebikolwa bya Al-Shabaab.

translation.en: Eriya Kategeya, Uganda's first Deputy Prime Minister, said the government was preparing to send more soldiers to Somalia.
translation.lug: Eriya Kategaya, omumyuka wa ssaabaminisita wa Uganda asooka, yagamba gavumenti yali eteekateeka kusindika basirikale balala e Somalia.

translation.en: This is to strengthen the peace keeping forces in Somalia.
translation.lug: Kino kya kwongera maanyi magye agakuuma eddemba mu Somalia.

translation.en: Guinea and Djibouti also pledged to send soldiers to Somalia to reinforce the Ugandan and Burundian peace contingent.
translation.lug: Guinea ne Djibouti nago gaasubizza okusindika abasirikale e Somalia okuyambako amagye ga Uganda ne Burundi okukuuma emirembe.

translation.en: Museveni, who described the Al-Shabab as agents of mindless cowardly Middle East terrorism.
translation.lug: Museveni, eyannyonyola abayeekera ba Al-Shabab ng'ababaka b'abayeekera b'omu Middle East abatiitiizi.

translation.en: He said they and their foreign backers would be defeated.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti bbo n'abagwira okuva mu mawanga g'ebweru bajja kuwangulwa.

translation.en: "Who are they and whose interest do they represent?" , Museveni charged.
translation.lug: Museveni yabuuzizza, be b'ani era batuukiriza bigendererwa by'ani?

translation.en: The Al-Shabaab attacks showed, as Rose Asha Migiro the United Nations Deputy Secretary General said that no country is immune to terrorism.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwa Al-Shababa bwalaga, nga Rose Asha Migiro amyuka wa ssaabawandiisi w'amawanga amagatte yagambye nti tewali ggwanga litasobola kulumbibwa batujju.

translation.en: Migiro thus called upon the AU states to implement the UN Counter terrorism strategy.
translation.lug: Migiro n'olw'ekyo yakubira amawanga ga AU omulanga okuteekawo enkola za UN ezirwanisa obutujju.

translation.en: Implement it with a global response rooted in the rule of law and respect for human rights.
translation.lug: Kiteeke mu nkola n'okkukiriziganya kw'ensi yonna mu tteeka n'okussa ekitiibwa mu ddembe ddembe ly'obuntu

translation.en: However, as united as the African Union leaders were on terror, so were they on shielding African leaders indicted on terrorism.
translation.lug: Naye nga obumu abakulembeze b'amawanga ga Africa amagatte bwe baalina ku butujju, era bwe baakolanga okubikkirira bakulembeze ba Afirika abavunaanibwa obutujju.

translation.en: Mutharika, for example, argued that the arrest warrant by the ICC against Sudan President Omar Bashir undermines African solidarity.
translation.lug: Okugeza, Mutharika yagamba nti ekiwandiiko kya ICC ekiragira okukwata pulezidenti wa Sudan Omar Bashir kityoboola omwoyo gw'Abafirika obuteelyamu lukwe.

translation.en: it also undermines peace and security that Africans fought so hard to get.
translation.lug: Era kityoboola eddembe n'obutebenkevu abaddugavu bye baalwanirira ennyo okufuna.

translation.en: The African Union leaders agreed to oppose Bashir's accusation.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze b'amawanga amagatte aga Afirika bakkaanya okuwakanya okuvunaanibwa kwa Bashir.

translation.en: Sam Tulyamuhika, developed Al-Shabaab terror attacks hijack African Union summit agenda 19 news analysis.
translation.lug: Sam Tulyamuhika, ye yapanga olukwe lw'obulumbaganyi bwa Al-Shabaab okutaataaganya enteekateeka z'olukugaana lw'amawanga ga Africa amagatte olw'ekkumi n'omwenda ng,amawulire bwe googera.

translation.en: This remains a serious gap on the African Union's commitment to rid Africa of dictators and conflict.
translation.lug: Guno gusigala nga muwaatwa minene eri obumalirivu bw'ekibiina ky'amawanga ga Africa amagatte okumalawo bannakyemalira n'obukuubagano mu Africa .

translation.en: On maternal and child development in Africa, Thoraya Obaid, the Executive Director of the UNPF said poverty, illiteracy are major hindrances.
translation.lug: Ku kuzaala n'okukuza omwana mu Afirica,Thoraya Obaid, ssenkulu wa UNPF yagamba obwavu, obutasoma miziziko minene.

translation.en: Obaid argued that, most women who die while giving birth do not seek proper healthcare either because they cannot afford the cost.
translation.lug: Obaid yagamba nti abakyala abasinga abafa nga bazaala tebafuna bujjanjabi bulungi oba kubanga tebasobola kusasula bisale.

translation.en: Or because they do not consider it important.
translation.lug: Oba kubanga tebakitwala nga kya mugaso.

translation.en: Bience Gawanas, Africa Union's commissioner for social affairs said, every pregnant woman is likely to die during child birth.
translation.lug: Bience Gawanas, omubaka akola ku ensonga z'abantu mu kibiina ky'amawanga ga Africa amagatte yagamba, buli mukyala w'olubuto alinga ow'okufa ng'azaaala

translation.en: A woman in Sub-Saharan Africa has 1 out of 16 chances to die during pregnancy or childbirth.
translation.lug: Omukyala mu Sub-Saharan Africa alina alina omukisa gumu ku kkumi na mukaaga okufa ng'ali lubuto oba ng'azaala.

translation.en: This is compared to 1 out of 4,000 chance in developed countries.
translation.lug: Kino kigeraageranyizibwa n'omukisa gumu ku nkumi ennya mu mawanga agaakulaakulana.

translation.en: Sub-Saharan Africa has the highest risk of maternal mortality among the poor and rich countries.
translation.lug: Ekitundu kya Africa ekiri wansi w'eddungu Saharah kye kisingamu abaana abafa nga bawere mu nsi enjavu n'engagga.

translation.en: In September 2001, a total of 147 heads of state endorsed Millennium Development Goals 4 and 5.
translation.lug: Mu Gwomusanvu 2001, omugatte gw'abakulembeze b'amawanga 147 baasemba ebiruubirirwa by'enkulaakulana by'ensi yonna ekyokuna n'ekyokutaano.

translation.en: That bleeding is one of the top causes of maternal death and can be caused by failure of the uterus to contract before, during or after child birth.
translation.lug: Okuvaamu omusaayi okwo kwe kuviirako bamaama okufa nga bazaala era nga kisobola okuleetebwa kw'okulemererwa kwa nnabaana okugaziwa nga tannazaala n'okufunda oluvannyuma lw'okuzaala.

translation.en: Byamugisha cheered the African Union for giving maternal and infant mortality top priority on the summit agenda.
translation.lug: Byamugisha yawagira ekibiina ky'amawanga ga Afirica amagatte okukulembeza eky'abamaama abafa nga bazaala n'abaana abawere abafa ku nteekateeka y'olukugaana.

translation.en: The Minister of Gender, Labour and Social Development Gabriel Opio told the summit that the government would commit $30 million.
translation.lug: Minisita w'ekikula, abakozi n'enkulaakulana y'abantu Gibriel Opio olukugaana nti gavumenti yandiwaddeyo obukadde bwa ddoola 30.

translation.en: This would be for reproductive health.
translation.lug: Kino kyandibadde kya kutumbula byabulamu bya kuzaala.

translation.en: The AU theme predicted a future when the African woman nolonger has to die during childbirth because there is not enough health care for her.
translation.lug: Omulamwa gwa AU gwateebereza ebiseera by'abakazi ba Afirika eby'omu maaso nga tewali mukazi afa ng'azaala olw'obutabeerawo bujjanjabi bwe bumala.

translation.en: Al-Shabaab terror attacks hijack African Union summit agenda.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi bwa Al-Shabaab bugootaanya enteekateeka y'olukuggaana lw'amawanga ga Afirica amagatte.

translation.en: Many in the crowd recall that Butambala County was previously under Mpigi district but is now Gomba district.
translation.lug: Abantu bangi bajjukira nti emabegako essaza ly'e Butambala lyali mu disitulikiti y'e Mpigi naye kati ye disitulikiti y'e Gomba.

translation.en: Two disastrous events in the last twelve months have shaken the centuries old kingdom.
translation.lug: Ebintu eby'obulabe bibiri mu myezi kkumi n'ebbiri egiyise biyuuguumizza Obwakabaka obumaze ebyasa .

translation.en: The September 2009 riots over the blocking of the kabaka from travelling to Kayunga a province of his kingdom.
translation.lug: Okwegugunga bw'Ogwomwenda oluvannyuma lwa Kabaka okugaanibwa mu ssaza lye ery'e Kayunga.

translation.en: This touched off a deadly riot and led to the closure of the kingdom's radio station CBS.
translation.lug: Kino kyaviirako obwegugungo obw'obulabe ekyaviirako n'okuggalawo kw'omukutu gwa leediyo ya CBS.

translation.en: Kingdom spokesman, Charles Peter Mayiga says there is little for Buganda to celebrate.
translation.lug: Omwogezi w'Obwakabaka, Charles Peter Mayiga agamba nti tewali nsonga nnene ereetera Buganda okujaguza.

translation.en: Considering the obstacles they have faced from the central government.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku miziziko gye bafunye okuva mu gavumenti ya wakati.

translation.en: Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II was crowned on July 31, 1993.
translation.lug: Kabaka Ronald Mwenda Mutebi II yattikirwa nga 31 Ogwomunaana, 1993.

translation.en: This was twenty-seven years after Buganda kingdom was suspended along with other kingdoms in Uganda by President Milton Obote.
translation.lug: Wano gyali emyaka abiri mu musanvu okuva Obwakabaka bwa Buganda lwe bwali bwawerebwa Pulezident Milton Obote wamu n'Obwakabaka obulala mu Uganda.

translation.en: Since his installation at Naggalabi, Budo, Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II has largely had cold relations with the NRM government.
translation.lug: Okuva lwe yatikkirw e Naggalabi, Budo, Kabaka Ronald Mwenda Mutebi II abadde takwataganira ddala ne gavumenti ya NRM

translation.en: This government which is curiously led by his former friend Yoweri Museveni.
translation.lug: Gavumenti eno efugibwa eyali mukwano gwe Yoweri Museveni.

translation.en: Mayiga says, the government owes Buganda kingdom about Shs 20 billion in rental debts for the use of land and facilities.
translation.lug: Mayiga agamba, Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bubanja gavumenti obuwumbi obuli mu 20 ku kukozesa ettaka n'ebintu ebirala .

translation.en: This claim is linked to the unresolved question involving the historical 9000 square miles of land.
translation.lug: Bagamba nti kiva ku kubuuzo ekitannagonjoolwa ekizingiramu mmayiro z'ettaka akenda.

translation.en: This was vested in the hands of the Buganda Land Board at independence.
translation.lug: Lino lyateekebwa mu mikono gya Buganda Land Board okuva ku meenunula.

translation.en: Mengo officials harbor the view that the solution to Uganda's political problems is the restoration of a federal system of governance.
translation.lug: Abakungu b'e Mengo bagamba nti eddagala ekinagonjoola ebizibu ky'ebyobufuzi bya Uganda kwe kuzzaawo enfuga ya federo.

translation.en: This is a demand government has clearly been cold about.
translation.lug: Lino bbanja gavumenti ly'ebadde tefiirako ddala.

translation.en: The closest the two sides came to a solution was in 2005.
translation.lug: Enjuyi ebbiri zaatuuka ku nzikiriziganya mu 2005.

translation.en: This was when a high powered Buganda delegation led by then Katikkiro Joseph Mulwanyammuli Ssemogerere.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo olukiiko lw'abakungu b'Obwakabaka abaateekebwamu ennyo amaanyi katikkiro Joseph Mulwanyammuli Ssemwogerere.

translation.en: The Buganda legislative body, the Lukiiko, threw it out arrogantly and Mulyanyamuli went with it.
translation.lug: Olukiiko lwa Buganda lwakisuula ebbali Mulwanyammuli n'agenda nakyo.

translation.en: Mulwanyammuli is now back to torture Museveni through his association with the Inter party co-operation and Ssuubi 2011.
translation.lug: Mulwanyammuli kati akomyewo okutulugunya Museveni ng'ayita mukukolagana n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ne Ssuubi 2011.

translation.en: Mayiga was part of the Buganda negotiation team that agreed to the regional ranking.
translation.lug: Mayiga yali kitundu ku ttiimu ya Buganda eyakola enteeseganya n'ekkiriziganya ku kusengeka ebitundu.

translation.en: He now says the kingdom could not stant the requirement to have an elected Katikkiro.
translation.lug: Kati agamba nti Obwakabaka tebusobola kutuukiriza bisaanizo bya kulonda Katikkiro.

translation.en: This was one incurable weakness since they wanted the current situation to remain whereby the Kabaka names the Katikkiro.
translation.lug: Guno bwali bunafu bwa maanyi kubanga baali baagala embeera eriwo esigalewo nga Kabaka y'alonda Katikkiro.

translation.en: The government argues that an unelected Katikiro defeats the democratisation crusade.
translation.lug: Gavumenti egamba nti Katikkiro atannalondebwa alemesa demokolasiya okukola.

translation.en: This is because it removes the people of their right to elect their leaders.
translation.lug: Kino kiri bwe kiti kubanga kiggyako abantu eddembe lyabwe okulonda abakulembeze baabwe.

translation.en: They argue further that a Katikkiro appointed by the Kabaka is hard to hold accountable.
translation.lug: Bongererako nti Katikkiro alondeddwa Kabaka kizibu a kuvunaana.

translation.en: Because the Baganda treat their Kabaka with near faultlessness.
translation.lug: Kubanga Abaganda tatwaka Kabaka waabwe ng'atakola nsobi.

translation.en: Mayiga also said that the regional ranking agreement did not provide resources for the regional government.
translation.lug: Mayiga naye yagamba nti enzikiriziganya y'ensengeka y'ebitundu teyateerawo gavumenti za bitundu bintu.

translation.en: The Buganda demand for Ebyaffe, a demand for government to honour this suggestion is fueled by the kingdom's claim.
translation.lug: Buganda esaba ebyaffe, ebbanja lya gavumenti ly'erina okukolako erikumibwamu okwemulugunya kw'Obwakabaka.

translation.en: Many Baganda believe the claim, including those who support the NRM such as former Luwero chairperson, Abudul Naduli, a Luwero veteran.
translation.lug: Abaganda abasinga bakkiriza me byogerebwa omuli abo abawagira NRM okugeza eyaliko ssentebe w'e Luwero Abudul Nadduli, eyazirwano w'e Luwero .

translation.en: According to Nadduli, it was president Museveni's promise to restore the kingdom to its former status after he overthrew the UPC government.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Nadduli, kyali kisuubizo kya Pulezidenti Museveni okuzzaawo Obwakabaka mu mbeera gye bwalimu oluvannyuma lw'okuggyako gavumenti ya UPC.

translation.en: Nadduli, on the other hand adds that he is satisfied with what the NRM government has provided to the Buganda kingdom.
translation.lug: Nadduli, ku ludda olulala ayongerako nti mumativu n'ekyo gavumenti ya NRM oky'ewadde Obwakabaka bwa Buganda.

translation.en: He argues that by allowing the coronation in 1993, recognising the kingdom in the 1995 constitution and granting the regional rank.
translation.lug: Agamba nti okukiriza amattikira mu 1993, okuzzaawo Obwakabaka mu ssemateeka wa 1995 n'okubuwa ekifo we ligwa.

translation.en: However, they have occasionally appeared to make acknowledgement to the Central Government.
translation.lug: Newankubadde, ebiseera ebisnga balabise nga basiima gavumenti eya wakati.

translation.en: Kingdom officials have been discouraged from openly campaigning against the ruling party in 2001 and again in 2006 national election.
translation.lug: Abakungu b'Obwakabaka babadde bagaanibwa okukuba kakuyege mu lwatu atali ku ludda lw'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza mu 2011 era ne mu kulonda kwa bonna mu 2006.

translation.en: When tough talking Katikkiro Daniel Muliika was relieved of his duties as prime minister of Buganda after less than one year in office.
translation.lug: Katikkiro omukambwe Daniel Muliika bwe yali aggyiddwako obuvunaanyizibwa bwe obwa Katikkiro wa Buganda nga tannaweza mwaka mu woofiisi.

translation.en: For now, Kabaka Mutebi's predicament has atleast not yet deteriorated to the extent of his father's, Sir Edward Mutesa 1.
translation.lug: Kati, embeera ya Kabaka Mutebi ey'obuswavu waakiri tennatuuka ku ssa lya kitaawe, Sir Edward Muteesa 1.

translation.en: Mutesa was exiled to London twice; from 1953 to 1955 and again in 1966 until his death in 1969.
translation.lug: Muteesa yawaggaangusibwa mu London emirundi ebiri; okuva mu 1953 okutuuka 1955 era ne mu 1966 okutuuka mu 1969.

translation.en: Initially, he had problems with the British and later with Apollo Milton Obote.
translation.lug: Okusookera, yalina obuzibu n'Abangereza oluvannyuma ne Apollo Milton Obote.

translation.en: In the seventeen years he has reigned, Mutebi, like his father, has repeatedly come head-to-head with the government.
translation.lug: Mu myaka ekkumi n'omusanvu gye yali abazeeko, nga kitaawe, yavuganyanga ne gavumenti emirundi mingi.

translation.en: As the Baganda celebrate, they will be eyeing the February 2011 national elections.
translation.lug: Ng'Abaganda bwe bajaguza, bajja kuba batunuulidde okulonda kwa bonna mu 2011.

translation.en: They will be hoping to possibly squeeze some rights out of Museveni's government.
translation.lug: Bajja kuba basuubira okukamula ekituufu mu gavumenti ya Museveni.

translation.en: A number of aggressive operations against ADF operations in and around Kampala and a number of key collaborators have been captured.
translation.lug: Ebikwekweto ebyentiisa ebiwerako byakolebwa ku ADF mu Kampala era abakolagana nabo bangi bakwatiddwa.

translation.en: Some killed and others are still on the run.
translation.lug: Abamu battibwa n'abalala bakyayiggibwa.

translation.en: Those who escaped arrest are suspected to have moved to their hideouts in Eastern DRC, Nairobi and others have gone into hibernation.
translation.lug: Abo abataakwatibwa basuubirwa okubeera mu buvanjuba bwa DRC, Nairobi ate abalala bakyekukumye.

translation.en: The aim of this presentation is to update you on the current Justice Action and Truth operations carried out against ADF terrorism.
translation.lug: Ekiruubirirwa ky'omusomo kwe kubamanyisa ebipya ku bikolwa by'obwenkanya ebiriwo n'ebikwekweto eby'amazima ebikolebwa ku bayeekera ba ADF.

translation.en: National Resistance Movement and Rwandan Patriotic Front had a bias to violence as a means of resolving political problems.
translation.lug: National Resistance Movement ne Rwandan Patriotic Front baalina tebaagala kukozesa mivuyo ng'engeri y'okugonjoolamu ebizibu by'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: Museveni was wrong in sending troops to Somalia.
translation.lug: Museveni yali mukyamu okusindika amagye e Somalia.

translation.en: Mwenda are you assuming that a war is fought with clear objectives and ideologies that everyone can easily identify?
translation.lug: Mwenda, osuubira nti olutalo lulwanibwa n'ebiruubirirwa ebimanyiddwa buli omu byangu bya kuzuula?

translation.en: Do you think that Museveni can clearly state why he sent his troops to Somalia?
translation.lug: Olowooza nti Museveni asobola okwogera lwaki yasindika amagye ge mu Somalia?

translation.en: The stability of Somalia is not clear from Museveni's intentions.
translation.lug: Obutebenkevu bwa Somalia tebumanyiddwa bulungi okuva ku igendererwa bya Museveni.

translation.en: However, the Somali disaster has become more internationalised because of its Al Qaeda connections.
translation.lug: Newankubadde, obuzibu bwa Somalia buufuse bwa nsi yonna olw'okwegatta ku Al Qaeda.

translation.en: Museveni is there for his personal gains.
translation.lug: Museveni aliwo ku lw'ebigendererwa bye ng'omuntu.

translation.en: He's basically exploiting the need for Americans to fight anti-Americanist jihadists.
translation.lug: Ky'akola kwe kukozesa obwetaavu bw'Abamerika okulwanisa anti-Americanist jihadists.

translation.en: Principally Al Qaeda that has found and enjoyed the sympathy with Al Shabaab.
translation.lug: Gye buli kati Al Qaeda eyatandikibwawo enyumiddwa enkwatagana ne Al Shabaab.

translation.en: By taking a pro western position, the Western powers respond by not influencing the change of power against its Uganda personal leadership.
translation.lug: Mu kubeera ku ludda lw'Abazungu, ensi z'Abazungu zisalawo obutafaayo ku kukyusa obuyinza ku bukulembeze bwa Uganda.

translation.en: All that stuff about Somalis interests is breathtaking to the political survival of Museveni's rule.
translation.lug: Ebyo byonna ebikwata ku nsonga za Somalia byennyamiza ku kubaawo kw'obukulembeze bwa Museveni.

translation.en: Ocheto said Somalis must solve their problems themselves.
translation.lug: Ocheto yagamba nti Abasomaaliya balina okwemalira ebizibu byabwe bo bennyini.

translation.en: Why should Ugandans die for a cause that is not theirs?
translation.lug: Lwaki Bannayuganda bafa ku nsonga ezitali zaabwe?

translation.en: We did it without assistance, so the Somalis need to do it themselves.
translation.lug: Twakikola nga tetuyambiddwako sso Abasomaaliya nabo beetaaga okukyekolera bbo bennyini.

translation.en: Our young men should not die in Somalia fighting America's wars by proxy.
translation.lug: Abasajja baffe abato tebalina kufiirwa mu Somalia nga balwana entalo nga bakiikiridde Amerika.

translation.en: I do not see why we are being bombed in this country by a war in another country whose causes are unknown to Ugandans.
translation.lug: Siraba lwaki tukubibwa bbomu mu nsi eno olw'olutalo lw'omu nsi endala ng'ebyaluleeta tezimanyikiddwa Bannayuganda.

translation.en: Is there peace in Somalia?
translation.lug: Mu Somalia waliyo emirembe?

translation.en: Moslems in Somalia are fighting to install an Islamic republic strictly adhering to the Sharia law.
translation.lug: Abasiraamu mu Somalia okuteekawo nfuga ya Busiraamu etambulira ku nkola ya Sharia.

translation.en: Seezi Sewagaba asked, If that is what they want, who are we as Ugandans to say no to that?
translation.lug: Seezi Sewagaba yabuuza, bwe kiba ng'ekyo kye baagala, ffe b'ani nga Bannayuganda okugaana ekyo?

translation.en: Volkswagen launched a prototype for a new vehicle lovingly called the Bio-Bug that runs on processed sewage.
translation.lug: Volkswagen yatongoza ekika ky'emmotoka empya eyitibwa Bio-Bug ng'etambulira ku kazambi omukolerere.

translation.en: Autoblog Green's Frank Filipponio points out, making methane, clean enough to power an engine over the long term has been a serious challenge.
translation.lug: Autoblog Green‚Äôs Frank Filipponio anokolayo, okukola methane, omuyonjo ekimala okutambuza yingini okumala ebbanga eddene kubadde kusoomooza kunene.

translation.en: Geneco, a subsidiary of the British sewage treatment company Wessex Water, appears to have made a breakthrough.
translation.lug: Geneco, ettabi lya kkampuni ya Bungereza erongoosa kazambi eya Wessex Water, erabika okuba ng'etuuse ku buwanguzi.

translation.en: The subsidiary worked with Volkswagen on a vehicle type, which just made its poo-powered debut in Bristol.
translation.lug: Ettabi lyakola ne Volkswagen ku kika ky'emmotoka, ekyagifuula kkampuni ekola amafuta mu kazambi mu Bristol.

translation.en: According to the Geneco, first the methane is produced from sewage through anaerobic digestion by bacteria.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Geneco, okusooka methane akolebwa mu kazambi nga ayita mu kuvunza kazambi n'obuwuka.

translation.en: Joseph Lutaaya tried to covert us to his way of thinking.
translation.lug: Joseph Lutaaya yagezaako okutukweka engeri gy'alowoozaamu.

translation.en: Fillipponio reports that a four cylinder engine runs on the biogas and speeds about 114 miles per hour.
translation.lug: Fillipponio agamba nti yingini eya sirinda ennya eddukira ku biogas ku sipiidi ya mmayiro 114 buli ssaawa.

translation.en: Geneco says that 70 households' worth of human waste is enough to power the vehicle for a year.
translation.lug: Geneco agamba nti obukyafu bw'amayumba 70 bumala okutambuza emmotoka okumala omwaka.

translation.en: Volkswagen makes human waste-powered car.
