translation.lug: Volkswagen ekola emmotoka ezitambulira ku kazambi.

translation.en: You were born in independent African states because of their sacrifice.
translation.lug: Wazaalibwa mu nsi za Afirika ezirina ezeefuga olw'okwewaayo kwazo.

translation.en: President Obama held a meeting with African youth leaders at the White House.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Obama yatuuzizza olukiiko lw'abakulembeze b'abavubuka mu White House.

translation.en: Ocheng paid eight billion to the Uganda Revenue Authority.
translation.lug: Ocheng yasasudde obukadde munaana mu Uganda Revenue Authority.

translation.en: I recently spoke to the Shadow Finance Minister Oduman Okello about the contested taxation of the Heritage oil deal.
translation.lug: Emabegako nayogedde ne minisita w'ekisiikirize ow'ebyensimbi Oduman Okello ku nsonga y'okussa emisolo ku ddiiru ya Heritage oil.

translation.en: We have recalled our ambassador to Rwanda for consultations.
translation.lug: Tuzzeemu okuyita omubaka waffe mu Rwanda okumwebuuzaako.

translation.en: We have not broken diplomatic relations with Rwanda.
translation.lug: Tetumenyewo nkolagana ne Rwanda.

translation.en: Ayanda Ntsaluba is the director general of the South African foreign ministry.
translation.lug: Ayanda Ntsaluba ye ssenkulu wa South African Foreign ministry.

translation.en: We want an independent National Resistance Movement Electoral Commission, otherwise members will lose confidence in the party.
translation.lug: Twagala akakiiko k'ebyokulonda aka National Resistance Movement akeetengeredde, ekitali ekyo bammemba bajja kuggya obwesige mu kibiina.

translation.en: Chris Baryomunsi Member of Parliament Kinkizi East was arrested for violence during last week's National Resistance Movement elections.
translation.lug: Chris Baryomunsi omubaka wa paalamenti owa Kinkizi East yakwatiddwa olw'obuvuyo obwaliwo wiiki ewedde mu kulonda kwa National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: He led Uganda at a time when there was so much instability.
translation.lug: Yakulembedde Uganda mu biseera we waaliwo obutali butebenkevu bungi.

translation.en: Apollo Nsibambi is Uganda's longest serving prime minister.
translation.lug: Apollo Nsibambi ye ssaabaminisita wa Uganda akyasinze okulwako ennyo.

translation.en: There is a need to put in place means to come in light of increasing tension particularly in the run to the 2011 elections.
translation.lug: Waliwo obwetaavu bw'okuteekawo obutangaavu ku nsonga y'obunkenke obweyongera naddala mu kwesimbawo kw'akalulu ka 2011.

translation.en: Bishop Zac Niringiye is the chairman of the African Review Mechanism.
translation.lug: Omwepiskoopi Zac Niringiye ye ssentebe wa African Review Mechanism.

translation.en: I assume that what President Museveni addressed was true.
translation.lug: Nsuubira nti Pulezidenti Museveni bye yayogedde byabadde bituufu.

translation.en: I don't know anything about Charles Taylor.
translation.lug: Sirina kye mmanyi kyonna ku Charles Taylor.

translation.en: I have never heard of him and the country Liberia till now.
translation.lug: Simuwulirangako n'eggwanga Liberia okutuusa kati.

translation.en: British supermodel Naomi Campbell appeared before the Hague War Crimes Court in a case against Charles Taylor.
translation.lug: Nalulungi wa British Naomi Campbell yalabiseeko mu kkooti Hague War Crimes ku musango ogwamuwawaabirwa Charles Taylor.

translation.en: The Englishmen, the Serbs and the Russians were not attacked, the great majority are black Africans.
translation.lug: Abangereza, Abasaabiya n'Abalasiya tebaalumbibwa, abasinga obungi baddugavu Abafirika.

translation.en: Alfred Noble would not be noticed as a stranger in this place.
translation.lug: Alfred Noble teyandisobodde kumanyibwa nga mulabe mu kifo kino.

translation.en: And many agree that we should really call it racial discrimination, which is not a fear of dreadlocks but of Africans.
translation.lug: Era bangi bakkiriza nti mu butuufu tulina kukiyita busosoze mu mawanga, ekitali kutya dreadlocks naye Abafirika.

translation.en: Zimbabwean director Farai Sevenzo discussed about the attacks on Africans in South Africa.
translation.lug: Ssenkulu wa Zimbabwe Farai Sevenzo yayogedde ku bulumbaganyi ku Bafirika mu South Africa.

translation.en: Generally, most Africans seem to carry a carefree attitude towards work, characterized by lateness, untidiness and a lack of commitment.
translation.lug: Okutwaliza awamu, Abafirika abasinga balabika nga abatafaayo eri okukola, omuli okutuuka ekikeerezi, obugyama n'obutaba bamalirivu.

translation.en: Tokunboh Adeyemo wrote that in Africa, where people are demanding to work, essential equipments are inadequate and infrastructure is poor.
translation.lug: Tokunboh Adeyemo yawandiika nti mu Afirika, abantu gye basaba okukola, ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo bitono n'ebintu ebikozesebwa eby'awamu biri mu mbeera mbi.

translation.en: George Bush is talking to key Republicans about Iraq, as quoted by Bob Woodward.
translation.lug: George Bush ayogera eri bannalipaabulikaani ab'enkizo ku Iraq, nga Bob Woodward bw'agamba.

translation.en: The late military leader Idi Amin's family received money from Saudi Arabia for his 1970s' shift of loyalty from Israel.
translation.lug: Famire y'omugenzi eyali akulira amagye Idi Amin yafuna ssente okuva e Sauidi Arabia olw'okuwuliriza n'ava mu Israel mu 1970.

translation.en: The district of Pallisa received money from the Community Agricultural and Infrastructure Improvement program to construct markets and roads.
translation.lug: Disitulikiti y'e Pallisa yafuna ssente okuva mu Community Agricultural and Infrastructure Improvement program okuzimba obutale n'enguudo.

translation.en: Makerere University Vice Chancellor Venansius Baryamureeba allegedly destroyed 140 million monetary worth of property on a plot.
translation.lug: Amyuka ssenkulu wa Makerere University Venansius Baryamureeba kigambibwa nti yayonoonera obukadde bwa ssente 140 ku ppoloti.

translation.en: The former president Godfrey Binaisa ruled Uganda for three hundred twenty eight days.
translation.lug: Eyaliko Pulezidenti Godfrey Binaisa yafuga Uganda okumala ennaku bisatu mu abiri mu munaana.

translation.en: More than one hundred Ugandan soldiers were killed in the African Union mission in Somalia.
translation.lug: Abasirikale ba Uganda abasoba mu kikumi battibwa mu nteekateeka ya African Union mu Somalia.

translation.en: Two rival groups of Sam Kutesa and Theadore Sekikubo of the National Resistance Movement fought in Sembabule last week.
translation.lug: Ebibiina bibiri ebiri ku mbiranye, ekya Sam Kuteesa n'ekya Theadore Sekikubo owa National Resistance Movement byalwanaganira e Sembabule wiiki ewedde.

translation.en: The vice president of Uganda Gilbert Bukenya alias Mahogany was summoned last week to the NRM disciplinary committee.
translation.lug: Amyuka Pulezidenti wa Uganda Gilbert Bukenya era amanyikiddwa nga Mahogany yayitiddwa wiiki ewedde mu kakiiko akakwasisa empisa mu NRM.

translation.en: The family of the late former Ugandan president Idi Amin Idi may soon receive two hundred billion shillings from the Saudi Arabian government.
translation.lug: Famire y'omugenzi eyaliko Pulezidentiwa Uganda Idi Amin eyinza okufuna mu bwangu obuwumbi bwa siringi bibiri okuva mu gavumenti ya Saudi Arabia.

translation.en: The proteinaceous nature of snake venom was established by Napoleon Bonaparte's brother, Lucien in 1843.
translation.lug: Ekirungo ekizimba omubiri ekiri mu kawuuwo k'omusota kyazuulibwa muganda wa Napoleon Bonaparte, Lucien mu 1843.

translation.en: Albert Calmette demonstrated that it was possible to hyperimmunize an animal against snakebite.
translation.lug: Albert Calmette yalaze nti kyali kisoboka okugema ekisolo okulemwa okubojjebwa omusota.

translation.en: Two ferries are being built to improve transport to the Kalangala islands.
translation.lug: Ebidyeri abiri bizimbibwa okutumbula entambula ku bizinga by'e Kalangala.

translation.en: Rafael Baku hands over a copy of the Executive Summary of measures to control exam malpractices to UNEB chairman.
translation.lug: Rafael Baku awaayo kkopi y'ekifunze omuli enkola ezinaakozesebwa mu kwewala okubba ebigezo eri Ssentebe wa UNEB.

translation.en: On August 5, there was a press release by Lutalo Bossa at Media Centre.
translation.lug: Nga 5 Ogwomunaana, waaliwo ekiwandiiko ekiweebwa bannamawulire okukolamu amawulire, bya Lutalo Bossa ku Media Centre.

translation.en: Perhaps, to understand Binaisa better Ugandans have to go to his roots.
translation.lug: Oboolyawo, okutegeera obulungi Binaisa Bannayuganda balina okuddirayo ddala ku mirandira gye.

translation.en: His father Canon Binaisa travelled on foot all over Uganda and as far as Congo and Sudan.
translation.lug: Taata we Canon Binaisa yatambula ku bigere mu Uganda n'atuuka ne mu Congo ne Sudan.

translation.en: His mother Nalongo Naoeme a daughter of a chief, was an enterprising woman being one of the first students at Gayaza High School.
translation.lug: Maama we Nalongo Naoeme, muwala w'omwami, yali mukyala w'amaanyi nnyo nga y'omu ku bayizi abasooka mu Gayaza High School.

translation.en: Binaisa's life was filled with many ups and down but as often he told us that our grannies were fighters.
translation.lug: Obulamu bwa Binaisa bwali bujjuddemu ebiwonvu n'ebikko naye era yateranga okutugamba nti bajjajjaffe baali balwanyi.

translation.en: He now belongs to the good Lord and his angels.
translation.lug: Mu kaseera kano ali ne Katonda ne Bamalayika be.

translation.en: The writer is a nephew of President Binaisa.
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi kizibwe wa Pulezidenti Binaisa.

translation.en: He is a consultant in management and a head of the department at the Uganda Management Institute.
translation.lug: Yeebuuzibwako ku nzirukanya y'emirimu era y'akulira ekitongole ekiddukanya emirimu mu ttendekero lya Uganda Management Institute.

translation.en: The truth about Binaisa and his presidency Martin.
translation.lug: Amazima ku Binaisa n'obwapulezidenti bwe Martin.

translation.en: This is an innovative health insurance scheme designed by the government of Rwanda to get the poorest citizens to access medical care.
translation.lug: Buno buyiiya bwa yinsuwa y'ebyobulamu eyateekebwawo gavumenti ya Rwanda okusobozesa bannansi abaavu okufuna obujjanjabi.

translation.en: Every Rwandan citizen pays Rwandan Franc 1,000 per year for this insurance.
translation.lug: Buli Munyarwanda asasulira yinsuwa ye ssente za Rwanda Franc lukumi buli mwaka.

translation.en: The poorest citizens of Rwanda get a certificate of inability to pay from their local village.
translation.lug: Bannansi ba Rwanda bafuna satifikeeti eziraga nti tebalina busobozi kusasula ku kyalo kwe babeera.

translation.en: The ease with which Mutabazi shakes off his figures is impressive and partly a common feature of Rwandan society.
translation.lug: Obwangu Mutabazi kw'avvuunukirako obuzibu busanyusa era nga kitera okweyolekera e Rwanda.

translation.en: Kagame's 93% win marks a new era Perfect finish.
translation.lug: Obuwanguzi bwa Kagame obw'ebitundu kyenda mu ssatu ku kikumi bulaga obuwanguzi obuggya.

translation.en: Many people are wearing Kagame and his party campaign gifts.
translation.lug: Abantu bangi bambala ebirabo bya Kagame n'ekibiina kye bye baafuna mu kunoonya akalulu.

translation.en: However, a one 52 year old man who is known as Jack Mutabazi a resident and peasant of rural Bugesera, stands out.
translation.lug: Wabula, omusajja omu ow'emyaka ataano mu ebiri amanyiddwa nga Jack Mutabaazi omutuuze era omulimi ku kyalo Bugesera, avuddeyo.

translation.en: He is emotionally involved in cheering Kagame dancing, jumping up and down, and singing at the top of his voice.
translation.lug: Obwongo bwe n'ebirowoozo bye abitadde ku kusuuta Kagame ng'azina, abuukabuuka wamu n'okuyimba mu ddoboozi ery'omwanguka.

translation.en: Mutabazi later tells me he is Hutu and lived through the racial killing.
translation.lug: Mutabazi oluvannyuma antegeeza nti Muhutu era yasimattuka ekiseera ky'okuttibwa okw'obusosoze mu mawanga.

translation.en: Mutabazi tells me that he is a health mobiliser.
translation.lug: Mutabazi angamba nti mukwanaganya wa byabulamu.

translation.en: You do not understand what Kagame has done for us ordinary Rwandans.
translation.lug: Totegeera kiki Kagame ky'atukoledde ffe Abanyarwanda ab'eddaala erya wansi.

translation.en: I had taken note of 32 year old Beatrice Nyirimana, who had been dancing with a wild dance.
translation.lug: Nali mmaze okukenga Beatrice Nyirimana ow'emyaka asatu mu ebiri eyali amaze ekiseera ng'azina amazina mu ngeri ey'okwefukula.

translation.en: A reprimand was given and the domestic violence ended after reporting her husband to local authorities.
translation.lug: Okulabulwa okuva mu boobuyinza kwaweebwa era okutulugunyizibwa mu maka ne kukoma oluvannyuma lw'okuwawaabira bba eri aboobuyinza mu kitundu.

translation.en: People in Rwanda feel shy or afraid or both to talk about their background.
translation.lug: Abanyalwanda bawulira ensonyi oba okutya sinakindi byombi okwogera ku buvo bwabwe.

translation.en: She says passionately at the top of her voice that she supports Mzee Kagame because he has liberated women from oppression.
translation.lug: Ayogera n'okwagala era ng'aleekaanira waggulu nti awagira muzeeyi Kagame kubanga anunudde abakyala okuva mu kulinnyirirwa.

translation.en: Nyirimana immediately turned to her friend who was laughing shyly next to her.
translation.lug: Nyirimana amangu ddala yakyukira mukwano gwe eyali amuliraanye ng'aseka yeebwalabwala.

translation.en: Nyirimana's husband later abandoned her but not before he sold their family land.
translation.lug: Bba wa Nyirimana oluvannyuma yamusuulawo naye yasooka kutunda ttaka lyabwe okwali amaka.

translation.en: Through the government's land program, Nyirimana was given a plot of land for free.
translation.lug: Nyirimana yaweebwa ettaka ery'obwerere ng'ayita mu nteekateeka ya gavumenti.

translation.en: "Mzee is for women's rebalation," she says with satisfaction and goes back to singing, Kagame is ours; we are going to vote for him.
translation.lug: Muzeeyi aliwo ku lwa bakyala, bw'agamba n'obumativu era addamu okuyimba nti Kagame waffe; tugenda kumuwa akalulu.

translation.en: Nyirimana's eagerness is a feeling I have encountered at all Kagame gatherings ordinary men, women and youths singing and dancing wildly.
translation.lug: Obwagazi bwa Nyirimana kintu kye nzudde ku nkugaana za Kagame zonna ng'abasajja, abakyala n'abavubuka bayimba n'okuzina nga beetinkuula.

translation.en: For those who covered the campaign, it was not surprising that Kagame got 93 percent of the vote.
translation.lug: Eri abo abaakwatanga amawulire mu kunoonya akalulu, kyali tekyewuunyisa nti Kagame yafuna ebitundu kyenda mu bisatu ku kikumi eby'obululu.

translation.en: But his opponents could hardly get a crowd of 500 at their gatherings.
translation.lug: Naye banne abamuvuganya kyalinga kizibu okufuna abantu ebitaano mu nkungaana zaabwe.

translation.en: Kagame's were running above 100,000.
translation.lug: Aba Kagame baali basoba mu mutwalo gumu.

translation.en: A crowd attends a Railway Protection Force campaign gathering addressed by the incumbent, President Paul Kagame.
translation.lug: Ekibinja ky'abantu kyali ku lukungaana lw'enteekateeka y'okutaasa oluguudo lw'eggali y'omukka olw'akubirizibwa Pulezidenti aliko Paul Kagame.

translation.en: But for many women the love and adoration of Kagame is clearly recognised.
translation.lug: Naye okwagala n'okuyaayaanira Kagame kweyolekera ddala butereevu mu bakazi bangi.

translation.en: Given the general perceptions about extreme unfriendliness between Hutus and Tutsis.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku ndowooza ey'awamu ku butabeererako baamukwano wadde wakati w'Abahutu n'Abatuusi.

translation.en: The story of deeply rooted ancients hatreds among African ethnic groups is one of those grand distortions of our history.
translation.lug: Emboozi y'obukyayi ey'edda ennyo mu mawanga ga Afirika kimu ku ebyo ebisinze okutaataaganya ebyafaayo byaffe.

translation.en: Rwandan politics appears to shake that.
translation.lug: Ebyobufuzi bya Rwanda birabika okumalawo ekyo.

translation.en: At many of his campaign gatherings, I have heard Kagame say: "There are no hutus, tutsis and twa in Rwanda", we are all Rwandans.
translation.lug: Mu kampeyini ze ezisinze, mpulidde Kagame ng'agamba nti tewali Bahutu, Batuusi n'Abatwa mu Rwanda, ffenna tuli banyarwanda.

translation.en: Previous regimes in Rwanda had promoted the ideas of Hutu power with unequalled effectiveness and had succeeded beyond measure.
translation.lug: Emirembe egizze gibaawo mu Rwanda gyali gitaddewo embeera y'okusukkulumya Abahutu nga kyali kyekubidde ne kibalema okukwasaganya.

translation.en: Post racial killing, Rwanda has been trying to burry these ethnic demons.
translation.lug: Ekittabantu ekizze kibaawo, Rwanda ezze ng'egezaako okuziika emizimu gino.

translation.en: Rwanda's challenge is to sustain this momentum to the next generations.
translation.lug: Okusoomoozebwa kwa Rwanda kwe kukuuma embeera eno okutuuka mu mujiji oguddako.

translation.en: What seems important is, many analysts of Rwanda will tell you that the society here has a strong tendency to buy into what its rulers tell it to do.
translation.lug: Ekiringa eky'omugaso kiri nti abatunuulizi b'ensonga mu Rwanda bajja kukugamba nti abatuuze wano balina enkola ennungi ey'okukkaanya n'ebyo abafuzi bye babagamba okukola.

translation.en: Even though such cultural concept can be misleading, it may hold some water in this Central African nation.
translation.lug: Wadde nga ebintu byobuwangwa biwabya, kiyinza okuba n'omulamwa mu ggwanga lino eriri mu masekkati ga Afirika.

translation.en: The effectiveness with which the state that Kagame over threw mobilised ordinary civilians to pick machetes.
translation.lug: Obwangu bwa gavumenti Kagame gye yaggyako okukunga abantu ba bulijjo okukwata ebyokulwanyisa.

translation.en: Rwandan society has proved to have an unusual respect to power and if this history holds true, it can also work the other way.
translation.lug: Abantu ba Rwanda balabise nga bagondera abantu abali mu buyinza mu ngeri etali ya bulijjo era singa ekyafaayo kino kiba kituufu, kisobola n'okukola mu ngeri endala.

translation.en: Therefore, as ordinary people cheer Kagame's insistence on a common Rwandan identity;
translation.lug: Nolwekyo, abantu aba bulijjo batendereza nnyo okubaawo kwa Kagame ku lw'okubaawo kw'omunnansi wa Rwanda owa bulijjo.

translation.en: Is it a reflection of the success of Railway Protection Force's ideology?
translation.lug: Kiraga obuwanguzi bw'ekirowoozo kya Railway Protection Force?

translation.en: However, it is not only Kagame who is surprising in this election.
translation.lug: Wabula Kagame yekka si yeyeewuunyisa mu kulonda kuno.

translation.en: The interesting person is the candidate for the opposition Social Democratic Party.
translation.lug: Omuntu asingako amaanyi ye yeesimbyewo ku ludda oluvuganya olulwanirira eddembe lyabantu .

translation.en: Jean Damascene Ntawukuriryayo is a prominent Hutu politician.
translation.lug: Jean Damascene Ntawukuriryayo munnabyabufuzi Omuhutu amanyikiddwa.

translation.en: He is also the deputy speaker of the chamber of deputies, a moderate and a well educated man with a Doctor of Philosophy.
translation.lug: Era y'amyuka omwogezi wa chamber of deputies, omusajja ow'ekigero era omuyigirize ayina ne ddigiri y'obwa dokita.

translation.en: Ntawukuriryayo was in Rwanda in the early 1990s and belongs to the few moderates who did not participate in the racial killing.
translation.lug: Ntawukiriryayo yali mu Rwanda mu myaka gya lukumi mu lwenda era ali omu ku batono abateetaba mu kittabantu eky'amawanga.

translation.en: Manase Nshutu told me, being tall gave Ntawukuriryayo a "tutsi look".
translation.lug: Manase Nshutu yangambye, Ntawukiriryayo okubeera omuwanvu kyamufaananya Omutuusi.

translation.en: It is possible this stereotyping gave Ntawukuriryayo an insight into the dangers of ethnic politics.
translation.lug: Kisoboka nti okunafuya abakyala kuno kwabaguliza Ntawukuriryayo ku buzibu byobufuzi bw'amawanga.

translation.en: Ntawukuriryayo served as minister in the Kagame led federation government.
translation.lug: Ntawukirirwayo yaweerezaako nga minisita mu gavumenti ya Kagame ey'ekiseera.

translation.en: Railway Protection Force is the one claiming kudos for mutual health.
translation.lug: Railway Protection Force ye yeemulugunya ku kusiimibwa ku by'obulamu ebirungi

translation.en: Ntawukuriryayo says, "people tend to associate all government success with Railway Protection Force".
translation.lug: Ntawukiriryayo agamba nti, abantu batera okukozesa obuwanguzi bwa gavumenti bwonna n'enteekateeka y'okutaasa oluguudo lw'eggwanga.

translation.en: His campaign manager, Stanislus Kamanzi is a Member of Parliament and a knowledgeable Rwandan.
translation.lug: Akulira kampeyini ze, Stanislaus Kamanzi mubaka wa paalamenti era Omunyalwanda omugezi.

translation.en: He is currently Minister for Environment and Lands in Kagame's government of national unity.
translation.lug: Kati ye minisita w'obutonde bw'ensi n'ettaka mu gavumenti ya Kagame ey'obumu.

translation.en: According to Kamanzi, Personal and Social Development aims to identify key areas where it can make quick wins.
translation.lug: Okusinziira Ku Kamanzi, ekibiina ekifa ku nkulaakulana y'omuntu ssekinnoomu n' eyawamu kiruubirira okuzuula ebitundu gye kisobola okufuna amangu obuwanguzi.

translation.en: It is rare to find a campaign in Africa that is fought purely on issues and not racial identity.
translation.lug: Tekisangikasangika okusanga kampeyini mu Afirica ezitambuzibwa nga teziriimu mivuyo egitali gya mawanga.

translation.en: This way, Request For Proposal has created such hopeless fear in Rwandans.
translation.lug: Mu ngeri eno, embeera eno etaddewo okutya n'obutaba na ssuubi mu Banyarwanda.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission members are still appointed by the head of the ruling party.
translation.lug: Bammemba b'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda era bakyalondebwa akulira ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza.

translation.en: According to the Independent issued in August 13-19, 2010, the NDC of the UPM nominated Yoweri Museveni as its presidential candidate.
translation.lug: Okusinzira ku Independent eyafulumizibwa nga 13 Ogwomunaana okutuuka nga 19, 2010 NDC ya UPM yasemba Yoweri Museveni okuvuganya ku bwa Pulezidenti.

translation.en: Museveni has been the Movement's temporary chairman since its establishment.
translation.lug: Museveni abadde ssentebe wa Movementi ow'ekiseera okuva lwe yatandikibwawo.

translation.en: Museveni's nomination was effected when the Conference passed a resolution proposed by Erisa Kironde.
translation.lug: Okusembebwa kwa Museveni kwaliwo olukiiko bwe lwayisa ekiteeso ekyaleetebwa Erisa Kironde.

translation.en: Kironde explained that candidates were required by law to name their Presidential candidates.
translation.lug: Kironde yannyonnyola nti abakiise baali basabibwa mu mateeka okwogera gwe bawagira ku bwa Pulezidenti.

translation.en: In Museveni's closing remarks, he apologised.
translation.lug: Museveni yeetonze ng'amaliriza.

translation.en: Joseph has been idle for weeks.
translation.lug: Joseph abadde talina ky'akola okumala wiiki eziwera.

translation.en: Museveni urged the Uganda Peoples Congress to desist from cheating in the forthcoming elections.
translation.lug: Museveni yakuutira Uganda People's Congress okwewala okubba obululu mu kulonda okujja.

translation.en: He repeated the Uganda Patriotic Movement stand that only one ballot box should be used.
translation.lug: Yaddamu ebigambo Uganda Patriotic Movement kw'eyimiridde nti akasanduuko kamu kokka ke kajja okweyambisibwa mu kulonda.

translation.en: A call to protest the December tenth elections has come from Uganda's ex-president and a Democratic Party member.
translation.lug: Okukunga kw'okwekalakaasa ku kolonda okwa nga kkumi Ntenvu kwakolebwa eyavuganyaako ku bwa Pulezidenti bwa Uganda era mmemba wa Democratic party.

translation.en: Yusuf Lule issued a statement from Nairobi and telexed to Uganda newspapers.
translation.lug: Yusuf Lule yafulumiza ekiwandiiko e Nairobi era ne kyeyolekera mu mpapula z'amawulire z'e Uganda.

translation.en: According to political observers, the statement is a direct turn down to what Lule said.
translation.lug: Okusinzira batunuulizi b'ebyobufuzi, ekiwandiiko kino kyali kisambajja butereevu ebyo Lule bye yali ayogedde.

translation.en: Lule said that the time had come for Ugandans to review of the current situation in the country and put things right.
translation.lug: Luke yagamba nti ekiseera kyali kituuse Bannayuganda okuddamu okwetegereza embeera eriwo mu ggwanga era batereeze ebintu.

translation.en: Ugandans have waited for these elections for eighteen years.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda balindiridde okulonda kuno okumala emyaka kkumi na munaana.

translation.en: It would not be wise for people to be rushed into voting by the Military Commission.
translation.lug: Tekyandibadde kya magezi abantu okupapizibwa akakiiko k'amagye okulonda.

translation.en: Lule said that Ugandans must unite against electoral manipulations.
translation.lug: Luke yagamba nti Bannayuganda balina okwegatta okulwanyisa emivuyo egy'etobese mu kulonda.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress said it would win these elections.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress yagambye nti yandiwangula okulonda kuno.

translation.en: If Ugandans go to these elections, they will be playing in the hands of those who want legitimacy for dictatorship.
translation.lug: Singa Bannayuganda beetaba mu kulonda kuno, bajja kuba bazannyira mu mikono gy'abo abaagala okutongoza obwa nnakyemalira.

translation.en: A lot has taken place in Uganda since the assumption of power in May this year by the Military Commission.
translation.lug: Bingi bituuseewo mu Uganda okuva akakiiko k'amagye lwe kaakwata obuyinza mu Gwokutaano gw'omwaka guno.

translation.en: While advising the population, Paulo Semogerere said that who ever goes to the elections under these conditions is deceiving himself.
translation.lug: Bwe yabadde ayogerako eri abantu, Paulo Ssemwogerere yagambye nti oyo yenna eyeetaba mu kalulu wansi w'obukwakkulizo buno nti abeera yeerimba.

translation.en: Leaders of the Democratic Party, the Conservative Party and the Uganda Patriotic Movement should not be tricked into any argument.
translation.lug: Abakulembeze ba Democratic party, Conservative Party ne Uganda Patriotic Movement tebalina kulimbibwa mu byogerebwa.

translation.en: The ballot boxes are not the only ways in which the Uganda Patriotic Movement would fix the elections.
translation.lug: Obusanduuko bw'obululu si ze ngeri zokka Uganda Patriotic Movument z'eyinza okukumpanyaamu obululu.

translation.en: The 3 parties should stick to their common stand after they walked out of the National Conference on Communication on September 16, 1980.
translation.lug: Ebibiina bisatu birina okunywerera ku kigendererwa eky'awamu kye baatuukako mu lukiiko ttabamiruka olwa nga 16, Ogwomwenda 1980.

translation.en: The measures already taken assure Uganda Patriotic Movement every opportunity to claim victory.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka zaawa dda Uganda Patriotic Movement emikisa gyonna okutwala obuwanguzi.

translation.en: The public in Uganda is warned against the danger ahead, they might discover too late that they have been cheated.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda baalabuddwa ku buzibu bwe boolekedde, bayinza okukizuula nga buyise nti babbiddwa.

translation.en: The minority group used the techniques which were adopted by Dr Obote and his Uganda Patriotic Movement party to control the majority.
translation.lug: Akabinja akatono kaakozesa obukodyo obwakozesebwa Dr Obote n'ekibiina kye ekya Uganda Patriotic Movement okufuga abangi.

translation.en: Why does Obote want me out of parliament?
translation.lug: Lwaki Obote ayagala nve mu Paalamenti?

translation.en: I will defeat anybody that Uganda Patriotic Movement puts up as a candidate aganist me.
translation.lug: Nja kuwangula omuntu yenna Uganda Patriotic Movement gw'enensimbako okunvuganya.

translation.en: Museveni said this was due to the disruptive intruders from some of the neighbouring countries.
translation.lug: Museveni yayogedde bino olw'abantu abayingira mu bumenyi bw'amateeka nga bava mu nsi ez'oku muliraano.

translation.en: There are some criminals in nothern Uganda who are still keeping Amin's guns.
translation.lug: Waliwo abazzi b'emisango abamu mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda abakyalina emmundu za Amin.

translation.en: There are criminal and primitive dictators within the Uganda National Liberation Front.
translation.lug: Waliwo abazzi b'emisango ne bannakyemalira abakyalemedde ku nkola ez'edda mu Uganda National Liberation Front.

translation.en: Museveni recalled that the recent invasion in Arua had resulted into death of many Ugandan soldiers.
translation.lug: Museveni yajjukidde nti obulumbaganyi obwakabaawo mu Arua nti bwali buviiriddeko okufa kw'abajaasi ba Uganda bangi.

translation.en: This story is reproduced from the Weekly Topic newspaper edition of 21st November 1980 a few days before the December 1980 elections.
translation.lug: Emboozi eno eggyiddwa mu ggulire lya Weekly Topic olufulumya olwa nga 21, Museenene 1980 eng'ebula ennaku ntono okutuuka ku kulonda kw'omu Ntenvu 1980.

translation.en: The article is reproduced for comparison of the current electoral situation then and today.
translation.lug: Emboozi eno yaddamu okufulumizibwa okusobola okugeraageranya embeere y'ebyobufuzi eyaliwo mu biseera ebyo n'eriwo kati.

translation.en: According to the independent issued on August 13-19, 2010, Haggai Matsiko reported that Museveni is one of the presidential candidates.
translation.lug: Okusinzira ku Independent eyafulumizibwa nga 13 Ogwomunaana okutuuka nga 19, 2010, Haggai Matsiko yategeeza nti Museveni y'omu ku beesimbyewo ku bwa Pulezidenti.

translation.en: Kahwa said Baguma cannot win Matia.
translation.lug: Kahwa yagamba nti Baguma tasobola kuwangula Matia.

translation.en: It is unlikely for one not to notice the all-powerfulness of the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Kya kusaalirwa omuntu obutasobola kulaba maanyi ga National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Kenneth Akugizibwe a secondary teacher says all people in their village know only National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Kenneth Akugizibwe omusomesa wa sekendule agamba nti abantu mu kyalo kyabwe bamanyi National Resistance Movement yokka.

translation.en: Many residents in Kaluguuza accept political opinions, but as a result of high poverty and ethnic tensions.
translation.lug: Abatuuze bangi mu Kaluguuza ng'oggyeko endowooza zaabwe mu byobufuzi, naye olw'obwavu n'okutya kw'amawanga.

translation.en: However, George Bizibu, a councilor for Mataale sub county says the problem is that "people have monetized politics".
translation.lug: Wabula, George Bizibu, kansala w'eggombolola y'e Mataale agamba nti ekizibu kiri ku bantu okutwala ebyobufuzi ng'omulimu ogulina okuvaamu ensimbi.

translation.en: Non-government organizations like Action Aid, World Voices Uganda and others have offered sentization programs.
translation.lug: Ebitongole by'obwannakyewa nga Action Aid, World Voices Uganda n'ebirala bitaddewo enteekateeka z'okusomesa abantu.

translation.en: Action Aid has worked in Bunyoro for nine months on activities to arm citizens with knowledge, skills and attitudes.
translation.lug: Action Aid ekoledde mu Bunyoro okumala emyezi mwenda ng'ekola emirimu egiwa abantu amagezi, obukugu n'okukyusa ku ngeri gye balabamu ebintu.

translation.en: On July 21, Action Aid took journalists to Kibaale and they looked into the issues of citizens participation and responsibility.
translation.lug: Mu 21 Ogwomusanvu, Action Aid yatwala bannamawulire e Kibaale ne batunula mu ngeri z'okwetabyamu abatuuze n'obuvunaanyizibwa.

translation.en: The journalists spoke with district leaders, opinion makers, and ordinary citizens so as to assess how deep democracy is in Kibaale.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire baayogerako n'abakulembeze ba distulikiti, abakola okusalawo n'abantu ba bulijjo okusobola okupima eddaala lya demokolasiya mu Kabale.

translation.en: In the run-up to the elections, National Resistance Movement has made efforts to tighten its already firm gap on the region.
translation.lug: Mu kweteekerateekera akalulu, National Resistance Movement ekoze enteekateeka okunyweza obuwagizi bw'erina mu kitundu.

translation.en: Nsambu John, the District Internal Security Officer says that Opposition parties are minor.
translation.lug: Nsambu John, omukungu w'ebyokwerinda munda mu agamba nti ebibiina ebiri ku ludda oluvuganya birina obuwagizi butono.

translation.en: They must first seek permission from Joseph.
translation.lug: Balina kusooka kusaba olukusa okuva ewa Joseph.

translation.en: Kibaale residents have also been affected by years of ethnic tensions between the indigenous Banyoro and the majority Bakiga.
translation.lug: Abatuuze b'e Kibaale nabo bakoseddwa omwaka gw'obunkenke bw'amawanga wakati w'Abanyolo abazaaliranwa n'Abakiga abasinga obungi.

translation.en: The Bakiga are immigrants.
translation.lug: Abakiga basenze.

translation.en: George Namyaka, a Munyoro, admits that he is a comprise candidate after being imposed on the electorate that had chosen a Mukiga.
translation.lug: George Namyaka, Omunyoro, akkiriza nti muntu aliwo obubeezi oluvannyuma lw'okussibwa ku kakiiko akaali kalonze Omukiga.

translation.en: Namyaka was appointed by President Yoweri Museveni at the helm of ethnic tensions between the Banyoro and Bakiga.
translation.lug: Namyaka yalondebwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni wakati mu bunkenke bw'amawanga obuyitirivu wakati w'Abanyoro n'Abakiga.

translation.en: The district was further divided into five constituencies; Buyaga East and Buyaga West, Bugangaizi West and Bugangaizi East, and Buyanja.
translation.lug: Disitulikiti yagenda mu maaso n'okugabanyizibwamu mu konsituwensi endala ttaano; Buyaga ey'obuvanjuba, Buyaga ey'obugwanjuba, Bagangaizi ey'obugwanjuba, Bagangaizi ey'obuvanjuba ne Buyanja.

translation.en: Last year, Kibaale district was among the worst performers.
translation.lug: Omwaka oguwedde, Kibaale yali emu ku zi distulikiti ezaasinga okukola obubi.

translation.en: The district National Agricultural Advisory Service coordinator was recently arrested for embezzling funds.
translation.lug: Omukwanaganya w'ekibiina ky'abalimi mu disitulikiti yakwatibwa gye buvuddeko olw'okubulankanya ensimbi.

translation.en: Empty pockets speak loudest in Kibaale gaping the inability to read and write, poverty and ethnic tensions.
translation.lug: Obwavu obungi ennyo mu Kabaale bwongedde ku butamanya kusoma na kuwandiika, obwavu n'obunkenke bw'amawanga.

translation.en: According to the independent issued on August 13-19, 2010, Mubatsi reported that the Lango sub region lies near the swampy Lake Kyoga.
translation.lug: Okusinzira ku Independent eyafulumizibwa nga 13 Ogwomunaana okutuuka nga 19, 2010, Mubatsi yategeeza nti eggombolola ya Lango eri kumpi n'ekitoogo ky'ennyanja Kyoga.

translation.en: A study conducted from 1994 to 2005 among some districts in Uganda revealed that Apac had the highest number of infective mosquito bites.
translation.lug: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa mu disitulikiti ezimu okuva mu 1994 okutuuka mu 2005 kwalaga nti Apac ye yali esingamu omuwendo gw'ensiri ezirwaza omusujja.

translation.en: According to the Ministry of Health in Uganda, approximately three hundred twenty children and women die of malaria.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku minisitule y'ebyobulamu mu Uganda, kumpi abaana bisatu mu abiri n'abakyala bafa omusujja gw'ensiri.

translation.en: A Member of Parliament from Apac described the malaria burden in his area as a big disaster.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Paalamenti okuva mu Apac yayogera ku musujja gw'ensiri mu kitundu kye ng'obuzibu obunene.

translation.en: The malaria related deaths are more than any other epidemic that has hit Apac district.
translation.lug: Okufa okwekuusa ku musujja gw'ensiri kusinga ebirwadde ebirala byonna ebirumba disitulikiti ya Apac.

translation.en: Maruzi County member of parliament, David Ebony told The independent that every family has been affected.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Paalamenti ow'essaza ly'e Maruzi, David Ebony yategeezezza The Independent nti buli maka gakoseddwa.

translation.en: Most of the people in Northern Uganda are poor.
translation.lug: Abantu abasinga obungi mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda baavu.

translation.en: Michael Okia, the senior entomologist at Uganda's Ministry of Health, offers explanations why Apac bears such an over balanced malaria burden.
translation.lug: Michael Okia, Omukugu mu kwekkaaya ebiwuka mu minisitule y'ebyobulamu annyonnyola nti mu Apac waliyo omusujja gwa Malaria mungi.

translation.en: Finally, Apac's hot temperatures allow malaria infected mosquitoes to reproduce quickly.
translation.lug: Ekisembayo, ebbugumu eringi mu Apac lye livaako ensiri ezisiiga Malaria okubiika n'okwalula amangu.

translation.en: Okia says a second type of mosquito called anopheles funestus is also common around the Apac district swamps and bushes.
translation.lug: Okia agamba nti ekika ky'ensiri ekirala ekiyitibwa anopheles funestus nakyo kingi muntobazzi n'ebisiko by'omu Disitulikiti y'e Apac.

translation.en: Since June 2005 when Uganda was considered for the President's Malaria Initiative, millions of dollars have been spent fighting the disease.
translation.lug: Okuva mu Gwomukaaga, 2005 Uganda lwe yaweebwa ssente okulwanyisa Malaria okuva mu ofiisi ya Pulezidenti, Obukadde bwa doolla busaasaanyiziddwa ku kulwanyisa endwadde eno.

translation.en: Uganda completed Phase I of a sixty six million American dollars Global Fund Round Four grant that provided a mix of malaria drugs.
translation.lug: Uganda yamaliriza omutendera ogusooka ku Bukadde bwa ddoola za Amerika enkaaga mu omukaaga eziva mu Global Fund Round Four  abaasindika ebika by'eddagala lya malaria.

translation.en: The Global Fund Round Four Phase II grant of 71 million dollars, signed in 2008 will provide enough supplies of American College Testings.
translation.lug: Ensimbi za Global Fund Round Phase II ez'obuwumbi bwa ddoola 71, ezaateekebwako omukono mu 2008 zijja kuyamba amatendekero ga America okufuna ebikozesebwa mu kukebera.

translation.en: This will be done nationwide through 2011.
translation.lug: Kino kijja kukolebwa mu ggwanga lyonna mu 2011

translation.en: In spite of this, Uganda still falls behind regional countries by fifty percent on the target to cut malaria infections.
translation.lug: Wadde nga kino weekiri, Uganda ekyali mabega ku mawanga g'omu kitundu n'ebitundu ataano ku kikumi ku kigendererwa ky'okumalawo omusujja gw'ensiri.

translation.en: In 2006, the government endorsed the use of indoor residual spraying as a trial programme in ten districts, including Apac.
translation.lug: Mu 2006, gavumenti yayisa okufuuyira ebintu mu mayumba ng'enteekateeka y'okugezesezaako mu distulikiti kkumi omuli ne Apac

translation.en: Indoor residual spraying was last used in 1963, and has so far made use of Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane, Icon, and Fendona.
translation.lug: Okufuuyira ebintu mu mayumba kwasemba kukozesebwa mu 1963, era nga bakyakozesa Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane, Icon ne Fendona.

translation.en: Bendiocrab a chemical endorsed by the World Health Organisation, will soon be rolled out.
translation.lug: Eddagala lya Bendiocrab eryekebejjebwa ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu eky'ensi yonna lijja kutogozebwa amangu ddala..

translation.en: Okia says, the use of different chemicals in spraying mosquitoes follows an insecticide management recess.
translation.lug: Okia agamba nti eddagala erikozesebwa okufuuyira ensiri ligoberera enkwatamu y'eddagala entuufu.

translation.en: Okia explains that malaria parasites in the human body developed resistance to drugs such as chloroquine.
translation.lug: Okia annyonnyola nti obuwuka bw'omusujja gw'ensiri mu mubiri bwatandika okugaana eddagala nga kulolokwini.

translation.en: Okia said that the use of different chemicals in the indoor residual spray is intended to prevent insects from getting used to one chemical.
translation.lug: Okia agamba nti okukozesa eddagala okufuuyira ebintu mu mayumba kiruubiriddwa okutangira ebiwuka kumanyiira ddagala erimu.

translation.en: Dr Chris Baryomunsi says, although it sounds reasonable for mosquitoes to build up a resistance to chemicals, continual use is actually effective.
translation.lug: Dr. Chris Baryomunsi agamba nti wadde nga kiwulikika ng'ekyamagezi ensiri okugaana eddagala, okwongera okulikozesa kulungi.

translation.en: Health experts think of switching chemical sprays because it has been observed that mosquitoes in Apac do not die.
translation.lug: Abakugu mu byobulamu balowooza ku ky'okukyusa eddagala kubanga kirabiddwa nti ensiri z'omu Apac tezifa.

translation.en: This happens when they continuously use the same chemical spray.
translation.lug: Kino kituukawo nga bagenda mu maaso n'okukozesa eddagala lye limu erifuuyira.

translation.en: Baryomunsi adds that a chemical like Icon is more expensive but relatively safer because it is less associated with environmental problems.
translation.lug: Baryomunsi ayongerako nti eddagala nga Icon lya buseereko naye ddungiko kubanga teririna nnyo buzibu na butonde.

translation.en: Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane was used in Europe and several countries in Asia in quarter of the 20th century, where malaria is now history.
translation.lug: Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane yakozesebwa mu Europe ne mu mawanga ag'enjawulo mu Asia ng'ekyasa kya 20 kyakatandika, omusujja gw'ensiri kati byafaayo.

translation.en: Indoor residual spraying using Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane was first used in Uganda between 1959 and 1963 in Kigezi.
translation.lug: Okufuuyira mu mayumba nga bakozesa Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane, kwasooka kukozesebwa mu Uganda wakati wa 1959 ne 1963 mu Kigezi.

translation.en: This was during the malaria trial removal project.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo mu nteekateeka y'okumalawo omusujja gw'ensiri.

translation.en: In fact, the first chemical to use in the Indoor residual spraying project in July 2006 was Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane.
translation.lug: Kituufu, eddagala eryasooka okozesebwa mu nteekateeka y'okufuuyira mu mayumba mu Gwomusanvu lyali lya Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane.

translation.en: DichloroDiphenylTrichloroethane has more than six months, which is the longest, per dosage
translation.lug: Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane alina emyezi egisukka omukaaga era nga ye ddoozi esingayo okuwangaala.

translation.en: The effectiveness of Icon lasts between three and six months after spraying.
translation.lug: Okukola kwa Icon kumala wakati w'emyezi esatu n'omukaaga oluvannyuma lw'okufuuyira.

translation.en: Ebong says government has to take a joint approach in the fight against malaria.
translation.lug: Ebong agamba gavumenti erina okukolera awamu okulwanyisa omusujja gw'ensiri.

translation.en: He notes that emphasis on the use of treated bed nets, indoor residual spraying with DichloroDiphenylTrichloroethane should take centre stage.
translation.lug: Agamba nti essira ku kukozesa obutimba bw'ensiri obulimu eddagala, okufuuyira mu mayumba ne Dichloro Diphenyl Trichloroethane birina okwesigamwako.

translation.en: He wonders why the distribution of bed nets began in central and western Uganda instead of Apac where the disease is widely spread.
translation.lug: Yeewuunya lwaki okugaba obutimba bw'ensiri kwatandikira mu masekkati ne mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda mu kifo kya Apac ekirwadde gye kisaasaanye ennyo.

translation.en: Ebong said that if government can drive out malaria in Apac as a pilot scheme, it can deal with malaria in the country.
translation.lug: Ebong agamba nti bwe kiba nga gavumenti esobola okumalawo omusujja gw'ensiri mu Apac ng'ekyokugezesezaako, esobola okulwanyisa omusujja gw'ensiri mu ggwanga.

translation.en: In Apac each person is still bitten on average five times a day by an infective mosquito.
translation.lug: Mu Apac,  buli muntu akyalumwa ensiri ereeta omusujja ekitono ennyo emirundi etaano.

translation.en: According to the Malaria Operation Plan 2010, there seven hundred thousand houses which will be sprayed in the six districts.
translation.lug: Okusinzira ku nteekateeka z'okumalawo omusujja gw'ensiri mu 2010, waliwo ennyumba emitwalo nsanvu ezijja okufuuyirwa mu distulikiti mukaaga.

translation.en: The finding by researchers supported by the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, part of the NIH;
translation.lug: Ebyazuulibwa abanoonyereza abayambibwako National Institute of Allergy and Infectious, ekitundu ku NIH.

translation.en: Clarifies the picture of parasite metabolism.
translation.lug: Kitangaaza ekifaananyi engeri ekiwuka gye kibeerawo.

translation.en: Manuel Llinas of Princeton University and colleagues discovered that the deadliest malaria parasite, uses a double branched metabolic pathway.
translation.lug: Manuel Linas owa ssettendekero ya Princeton ne banne baazuula ekiwuka ky'ensiri ekisinga okuba eky'obulabe ekikozesa enzira zombi okwebeezaawo.

translation.en: According to Dr. Llinas, this specific branched pathway has not been detected previously in any other organism.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Musawo Linas, ekika kino kibadde tekizuulibwanga mu kintu kyonna.

translation.en: The malaria parasite appears to use one branch primarily to generate the molecule acetyl Certificates of Analysis.
translation.lug: Akawuka k'ensiri kafaanana okukozesa ettabi limu okusooka okukola okwekaliriza kwa satifiketi ez'obuyungiro bwa acetyl

translation.en: This branch may represent particularly weak points to target with antimalarial drugs, says Dr. Llinas.
translation.lug: Musawo Linas agamba nti ettabi lino lirabika okuba eryangu okujjanjabwa eddagala eriwonya omusujja gw'ensiri.

translation.en: An estimated two point eighty five billion people world wide were at risk of contracting malaria in 2009.
translation.lug: Abantu abateeberezebwa okuba obuwumbi bubiri kinaana mu butaano okwetooloola ensi yonna baali mu katyabaga k'okukwatibwa omusujja gw'ensiri mu 2009.

translation.en: Approximately ninety one percent of the world wide population is at risk of Malaria parasite lives in central and south east Asia.
translation.lug: Kumpi ebitundu kyenda mu kimu ku kikumi eby'abantu abali mu nsi bali mu katyabaga k'okufuna akawuka akaleeta omusujja gw'ensiri akali mu masekkati n'obukiikakkono bw'obuvanjuba bwa Asia.

translation.en: Although the United Nations reports that malaria cases and/or deaths have dropped by half in twenty five countries in the past ten years.
translation.lug: Yadde ng'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte kiraga nti abantu abalina oba bafudde omusujja gw'ensiri bakendeddeko ekitundu mu nsi abiri mu ttaano mu myaka ekkumi egiyise.

translation.en: European researchers have discovered that antibiotics could help fight malaria.
translation.lug: Abanonyereza Abazungu bazudde nti eddagala eritta obuwuka lisobola okuyamba mu kulwanyisa omusujja gw'ensiri.

translation.en: A 2009 study published in the New England Journal of Medicine suggested that the leading malaria drug was less effective against the disease.
translation.lug: Mu 2009, okunoonyereza okwafulumira mu New England Journal of Medicine kwateesa nti eddagala erisinga okukozesebwa ku musujja gw'ensiri terikola.

translation.en: Pascal GahamanyiI in July/August 2010 issue of Foreign Policy Magazine explains how malaria causing parasites survive inside human blood cells.
translation.lug: Pascal Gahamanyil mu Gwomusanvu oba Ogwomunaana 2010 ensonga ya Magazine eya   Foreign Policy ennyonyola engeri ebiwuka ebireeta omusujja gw'ensiri gye bibeerawo munda mu butoffaali bw'omusaayi gw'omuntu.

translation.en: Ayittey claimed that the Rwanda Patriotic Front dominates all levels of power.
translation.lug: Ayittey yagamba nti Rwanda Patriotic Front emaamidde emitendera gy'obukulembeze gyonna.

translation.en: His publication also included President Kagame what he calls the "worst of the worst leaders".
translation.lug: Ekiwandiiko kye era kyazingiramu Pulezidenti Paul Kagame gw'agamba nti y'akyasinze obubi mu bakulembeze bonna.

translation.en: Reading the magazine, one wonders whether George Ayittey had any facts to support his shallow and foolish labeling of President Kagame.
translation.lug: Bw'osoma akatabo, omuntu yeewuunya oba George Ayittey yalina obukakafu bwonna okuwagira kalebule gw'ayogera ku Pulezidenti Kagame.

translation.en: Since Railway Protection Force came to power in 1994, it has never attempted to take over political power.
translation.lug: Okuva Railway Protection Force lwe yajja mu buyinza mu 1994, tekigezangako kutwala buyinza.

translation.en: Apart from including all tribal groups in the cabinet, Railway Protection Force also accommodated all political parties.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko okuteekamu amawanga gonna mu lukiiko lwa baminisita, Railway Protection Fore era esembeza ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi byonna.

translation.en: These included the Social Democratic Party, Rwanda Socialist Party, Liberal Party, Democratic Union of the Rwandan People, DRM .
translation.lug: Bino mulimu Social Democratic party, Rwanda Socialist Party, Rwanda Socialist Party, Liberal Party, Democratic Union of the Rwandan People, DRM.

translation.en: The Rwandan constitution of 2003 that marked the end of the transition is an inclusive one.
translation.lug: Ssemateeka wa Rwanda owa 2003 eyakomya enkyukakyuka naye mw'ali.

translation.en: In addition to this, the President, Prime Minister, President of the Senate, Speaker of Parliament must come from different political parties.
translation.lug: Mu kwongera ku kino, Pulezidenti, Ssaabaminisita, Prezidenti wa Senate, Omukubiriza wa paalamenti alina okuva mu kibiina ky'ebyobufuzi eky'enjawulo.

translation.en: Due to this provision, the Rwandan parliament today has the highest percentage of women parliamentarians in the whole world.
translation.lug: Mu kino, Paalamenti ya Rwanda leero y'esingamu omuwendo gw'abakyala omungi mu nsi yonna.

translation.en: The security sector which was dominated by former Rwandan exiles due to historical factors has transformed over the years.
translation.lug: Ebyokwerinda ebyali bimaamiddwa Abanyalwanda abaali mu buwanganguse olw'ensonga z'ebyafaayo kizze kikyuka okumala akaseera.

translation.en: The Rwanda Defence Force has discussed, retrained and absorbed officers and men from the former government forces.
translation.lug: Rwanda Defence Force ekubaganyizza ebirowoozo, ezzizzaawo n'okukuuma abakungu n'abasajja abaaliko mu magye ga gavumenti.

translation.en: For example, over fifteen thousant armed forces of Rwanda have already been joined in Resource Description Framework.
translation.lug: Okugeza, abajaasi ba Rwanda abasukka mu mutwalo gumu n'ekitundu baamaze dda okuyingizibwa mu kitongole ekigaba emirimu.

translation.en: In the Civil Service, the government has put in place various programmes, mechanisms, processes and institutions.
translation.lug: Mu mirimu gya gavumenti, gavumenti etaddewo pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo, eb'yokukanika n'amatendekero.

translation.en: The Public Service Commission has been put in place to handle all recruitments into public offices.
translation.lug: Akakiiko akagaba emirimu kateereddwawo okukola ku kugaba emirimu gya woofiisi za gavumenti.

translation.en: George Ayittey claims that the Rwandan Patriotic Front dominates the education sector as part of the civil service.
translation.lug: George Ayittey agamba nti Rwanadan Patriotic Front emaamidde ebyenjigiriza byonna ng'ekitundu ku mirimu gyabbwe.

translation.en: Almost all of the five public universities in Rwanda are headed by foreigners.
translation.lug: Kumpi ssettendekero za gavumenti zonna mu Rwanda zikulirwa bagwira.

translation.en: Most of the university lecturers in both public and private universities in Rwanda come from foreign countries.
translation.lug: Abasomesa abasinga mu zi ssettendekero za gavumnenti n'ezobwannannyini mu Rwanda baava mu mawanga magwira.

translation.en: Ayittey also reported that those who challenge the president are accused of being isolating, hatemongers and are arrested.
translation.lug: Ayittey era yategeeza nti abo abavuganya Pulezidenti bagambibwa okubeera bokka, ab'ebiruyi era bakwatibwa.

translation.en: The most pressing issue that government had to deal with upon assuming office in 1994 was to ensure the tribal killing does not take place again.
translation.lug: Ensonga eyali esinga okubeera enkulu gavumenti gye yalina okusooka okukolako ng'etuuse mu woofiisi mu 1994 kwe kulaba nti okuttingana kw'amawanga tekuddamu.

translation.en: Avoiding the repeat of 1994 situation, the government of Rwanda decided to immediately deal with the issue of accountability.
translation.lug: Okwewala embeera ya 1994 okuddamu, gavumenti ya Rwanda yasalawo mangu okukola ku nsonga y'ensaasaanya.

translation.en: This accountability was for tribal killing doers within the rule of law.
translation.lug: Obuvunaanyizibwa bwali ku abo abatta nga basinziira ku mawanga nga yeesigamiziddwa ku mateeka.

translation.en: It is a fact that the isolating and deniers of the tutsi genocide exist mainly among Rwandans.
translation.lug: Kituufu nti okusosola n'abeegaana ekittabantu ky'Abatuusi gyekiri okusinga mu Banyalwanda.

translation.en: Non Rwandans associated with the old tribal killing regimes.
translation.lug: Abatali Banyalwanda abalina akakwate ku kuttibwa kw'abantu mu mirembe egyayita.

translation.en: This has been at the core of many African conflicts in the past ten years.
translation.lug: Eno yebadde ensibuko y'obukuubagano bw'Abafirika obungi mu myaka ekkumi egiyise.

translation.en: In Rwanda, there are still some politicians who hope Rwandan Patriotic Front is one of the world's most all inclusive governments.
translation.lug: Mu Rwanda, era wakyaliyo bannabyabufuzi abasuubira nti Rwanda Patriotic Front y'emu ku gavumenti ezisinga okugatta abantu ab'endowooza ez'enjawulo.

translation.en: The problem arises that analysts like George Ayittey mislead the world by focusing on isolated incidents and basing on the present.
translation.lug: Obuzibu bujja nti abatunuulizi b'ensonga nga Goerge Ayittey bawabya ensi ng'essira baliteeka ku bigwawo ebimu n'okusinziira ku biriwo.

translation.en: This does not mean that Africa does not have good leaders.
translation.lug: Kino tekitegeeza nti Afirika terina bakulembeze balungi.

translation.en: Africa has had some of the best leaders in the world; Nelson Mandela, Julius Nyerere, Nkwame Nkrumah and others.
translation.lug: Afirika ebaddeko n'abamu ku bakulembeze abasinga obulungi mu nsi yonna nga Nelson Mandela, Julius Nyerere, Nkwame Nkrumah n'abalala.

translation.en: President Kagame should be seen in that light, a leader with a big vision for both Rwanda and the continent.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Kagame alina kulabibwa mu kifaananyi ekyo, omukulembeze alina ekiruubiriwa ekinene ekya Rwanda ne ssemazinga yenna.

translation.en: Saying that attacks of President Kagame are always accused of dividing peope is thus ill intentioned or uninformed.
translation.lug: Okugamba nti obulumbaganyi bwa Pulezidenti Kagame bulijjo bubeera ku kwawula mu bantu kiba tekirina kye kigenderera oba nga tebalina kye bamanyi.

translation.en: Before long, Mwenda, Kanaabi and approximately forty other individuals that have been charged with sedition, were free.
translation.lug: Ng'akaseera tekannayita, Mwenda, Kanaabi n'abantu abaali bateeberezebwa okuba ana abaali baavunaanibwa ogw'okukuma omuliro mu bantu, baateebwa.

translation.en: Andrew Mwenda's sedition saga originated on Wednesday August 10, 2005.
translation.lug: Akajagalalo ka Andrew Mwenda okukuma mu bantu omuliro kaatandika 10 Ogwomunaana, 2005.

translation.en: His death was a huge blow to the peace agreement that had been signed three weeks earlier.
translation.lug: Okufa kwe lyali kkonda ddene mu ndagaano y'emirembe eyali yaakateekebwako omukono wiiki ssatu emabega.

translation.en: Three days of riots in Sudan followed and left over one hundred thirty people dead.
translation.lug: Ennaku ssatu ez'obwegugungo mu Sudan bwaddirira era ne buleka abantu abasoba mu kikumi asatu nga bafu.

translation.en: Accusing fingers were pointed at President Museveni who had lent the sixty year old leader his own personal helicopter.
translation.lug: Ennwe zaasongebwa mu Pulezidenti Museveni eyali ayazise omukulembeze ow'emyaka enkaaga egy'obukulu ennyonyi eya nnamunkanga ey'obuntu.

translation.en: In Uganda, the most vocal accusations against Museveni came from Andrew Mwenda.
translation.lug: Mu Uganda, omuntu asinga okwogera ng'avunaana Museveni ye Andrew Mwenda.

translation.en: Mwenda felt that Uganda should be held accountable for putting Garang on "a junk helicopter" at night over a rebel infested territory.
translation.lug: Mwenda awulira nga Uganda erina okuvunaanibwa kuteeka Garanga ku nnyonyi ya nnamunkanga ekiro okuyita mu kifo ekijjuddemu abatujju.

translation.en: These comments, together with his role in the subsequent publication of High Command minutes, induced Museveni to lash out at Uganda's press.
translation.lug: Ebyogerebwa binno, wamu n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe nga ow'okuntiko okufulumya ebibadde mu lukiiko, byaletera Museveni okunyiigira bannamawulire.

translation.en: "I have been seeing this young boy, Mwenda, writing about Rwanda, writing about Sudan and writing about the Uganda People's Defence Forces".
translation.lug: Mbaddenga ndaba omulenzi ono, Mwenda ng'awandiika ku Rwanda, Sudan ne Uganda People's Defence Forces.

translation.en: Mwenda and Eastern Africa Media Institute lawyer, Kenneth Kakuru, shared a laugh.
translation.lug: Mwenda ne munnamateeka wa Eastern Africa Media Institute Kenneth Kakuru baasekamu.

translation.en: His threats are completely ignored since President Mobutu Seko ruled Congo for thirty two years and Museveni has yet to clock twenty.
translation.lug: Okutiisatiisa kwe tekwafibwako ddala kuba Pulezidenti Mobutu Seko yafugira Congo emyaka asatu mu ebiri ate Museveni tannaweza myaka abiri.

translation.en: How did he die and how did he leave Congo yet his own soldiers were shooting at him?
translation.lug: Yafa atya era yava atya mu Congo ng'abajaasibe bennyini baali bamukuba amasasi?

translation.en: If Museveni wants to walk that path, I tell you he's welcome to walk that path.
translation.lug: Museveni bw'aba ayagala kuyita mu kubbo eryo, tumwanirizza.

translation.en: The episode, which Mwenda has since acknowledged went extremely overboard, provoking the Ugandan government to shut KFM.
translation.lug: Akatundu Mwenda ke yakkiriza kaagendera ddala wala nga kasosonkereza gavumenti ya Uganda okuggala KFM

translation.en: However, this was not the first time the state had taken the outspoken Mwenda to court.
translation.lug: Newankubadde, guno si gwe gwali omulundi ogusooka gavumenti okutwala Mwenda ateerya ntama mu kkooti.

translation.en: Mwenda and Charles Onyango Obbo, who were the Monitor's senior reporter and editor, respectively at that time, were charged.
translation.lug: Mwenda ne Charles Onyango Obbo abaali abasasi era abasunsuzi b'amawulire abakugu mu budde obwo, baavunaanibwa.

translation.en: The two journalists challenged the charge in the Constitutional Court, but were told to face the charges in a lower court first.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire ababiri baawakanya omusango mu kkooti ya ssemateeka, naye baagambibwa okusooka okuvunaanibwa mu kkooti eya wansi.

translation.en: Between October 24, 1998 and February 16, 1999, the pair made thirty three trips to the courts.
translation.lug: Wakati w'Ogweggumi nga 24, 1998 ne nga 16 Ogwokubiri 1999, ababiri bano baagenda emirundi asatu mu esatu mu kkooti.

translation.en: When they took their petition back to the Constitutional Court, it upheld the legality of the offence with which they had been charged.
translation.lug: Bwe batwala okujulira kwabwe ku kkooti ya ssemateeka, tekwalimu bikwata ku musango ogwali gubavunaanibwa.

translation.en: However, the court's decision was later appealed in the Supreme Court, and the publication of false news law was ruled unconstitutional.
translation.lug: Newankubadde, okusalawo kwa kkooti kwajulirwa mu kkooti ensukulumu era etteeka ly'okufulumya amawulire amafu neriwangula ewali bukwakulizo.

translation.en: Up until the Constitutional Court's landmark ruling on August 25 this year, sedition has been used against politicians.
translation.lug: Okutuusa kkooti ya ssemateeka bwe yakola okutuusa mu Ogwomunaana nga 25 omwaka guno, okukuma mu bantu omuliro kubadde kukozesebwa ku bannabyabufuzi.

translation.en: To date, only Haruna Kanaabi, the former reporter and editor of the now defunct Shariat news paper has served a jail term for a sedition charge.
translation.lug: Okutuuka kati, Haruna Kanaabi yekka, eyali omusasi era omusunsuzi w'olupapula lw'amawulire olwa Shariat olutakyakola abadde yasibwa mu kkomera olw'okukuma omuliro mu bantu.

translation.en: When Mwenda was charged in the aftermath of the "Garang Episode" in 2005, he joined the East African Media Institute.
translation.lug: Mwenda bwe yavunaanibwa olw'akatambi ka Garang mu 2005, yeegatta ku East African Media Institute.

translation.en: "At one point, a judge would be indisposed and another time the state counsel was sick," says James Nangwala of the delay.
translation.lug: James Nangwala agamba nti, olumu omulamuzi yalinga si mwetegefu ate nga ebiseera ebirala nga saabawolereza wa gavumenti mulwadde.

translation.en: All along, however, the government continued to pluck journalists from their office, bring them to the Central Police Station for questioning.
translation.lug: Awo wonna, newankubade, gavumenti yagenda mu maaso n'okuggya bannamawulire mu woofisi zaabwe ng'ebatwala ku kitebe kya poliisi ekikulu okubabuuza.

translation.en: "I've been to the police station over fifty times during my nine years of journalism," recalls Semuju Ibrahim, former editor at The Observer.
translation.lug: Eyaliko omusunsuzi mu The Observer Semuju Ibrahim ajjukira nti yali ku poliisi emirundi egisukka mu ataano mu myaka omwenda gye yamala mu mawulire.

translation.en: Museveni's government, having prosecuted one sedition suspect successfully in the past 24 years, cannot expect to win many of their cases.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ya Museveni, oly'okubeera ng'esobodde okuwaaba omusango gw'abateeberezebwa okukuma omuiliro mu bantu gumu mu myaka 24 egiyise, tesuubira ku bawangula misango mirala.

translation.en: "I've lost friends on account of my charge," says former Independent and current Daily Monitor reporter, John Njoroge.
translation.lug: John Njoroge eyali omusasi wa Independent era nga kati akola ne Daily Monitor agamba nti aviiriddwako mikwano gye olw'emisango gye.

translation.en: Moreover, Makerere University Mass Communication lecturer Adolf Mbaine says many students are now seeking "safer" careers in public relations.
translation.lug: Kyokka, omusomesa wa bannamawulire ku ssettendekero ya Makerere Adolf Mbaine agamba nti abayizi bangi kati banoonya mirimu gitali gya bulabe nga bakolagana n'abantu.

translation.en: "This section of the law was limiting Ugandans from demanding accountability from their leader," says Kanaabi.
translation.lug: Kanaaba agamba nti ekitundu ky'etteeka lino kyali kikugira Bannayuganda okubanja ensaasaana okuva eri abakulembeze baabwe.

translation.en: Subsequent to the Constitutional Court's ruling, State Attorney Patricia Mutesi, said the state will appeal the ruling to the Supreme Court.
translation.lug: Okwefaanaanyirizaako ensala ya kkooti ya ssemateeka, ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti Patricia Mutesi yagamba nti gavumenti ejja kujulira ku nsala mu kkooti ensukkulumu.

translation.en: Mutesi has the support of powerful figures in the government such as Minister of State for Ethics and Integrity James Nsaba Buturo.
translation.lug: Mutebi alina obuwagizi bw'abantu ab'amaanyi mu gavumenti nga minisita omubeezi ow'empisa n'obuntubulamu James Nsaba Buturo.

translation.en: "It is an essential piece of legislation," Minister Buturo told The Independent by phone.
translation.lug: Minisita Buturo yagambye aba Independent ku ssimu nti kintu kikulu nnyo mu mateeka.

translation.en: Buturo added that in most developed countries, the media is mature but, you don't find that here.
translation.lug: Buturo yayongerako nti mu nsi ezaakulaakulana amawulire kikulu naye wano tokisangawo.

translation.en: It is fortunate for Minister Buturo and other members of the government displeased with the sedition ruling.
translation.lug: Kya mukisa eri minisita Buturo n'abali mu gavumenti abalala abatasanyukira nsala ya kkooti ku kukuma muliro mu bantu.

translation.en: "They wanted the Supreme Court to deal with it," Mwenda reasoned confidently afterward.
translation.lug: Mwenda oluvannyuma yayogedde n'obuvumu nti baali baagala kkooti ensukkulumu ekikoleko.

translation.en: In the Independent of September 03 - 09, 2010, they were sure we were going to appeal.
translation.lug: Mu Independent w'omu Gwomwenda 03 okutuusa nga 09, 2010, baali bakakasa nti tugenda kujulira.

translation.en: Nangwala and Kenneth Kakuru, counsel for the Eastern Africa Media Institute appealed the ruling to the Supreme Court.
translation.lug: Nangwala ne Kenneth Kakuru abawolereza ba Eastern Africa Media Institute baajulira ku nsala mu kkooti ensukkulumu.

translation.en: The promoting sectarianism charge, "offers the government with less leg room," says Mwenda.
translation.lug: Mwenda agamba nti okusosola mu bantu kiwadde gavumenti ebbeetu ttono.

translation.en: However, these charges may appear insignificant.
translation.lug: Newankubadde, emisango gino girinza okulabika ng'egitalina makulu.

translation.en: If the proposed amendments to the Press and Journalist Act 1995 are submitted and passed by parliament.
translation.lug: Singa enkyukakyuka ezitegekeddwa mu tteeka ly'amawulire erya 1995 ziweebwayo era ne ziyisibwa paalamenti.

translation.en: Those amendments, would require publications to be licensed yearly by the Media Council and charged with enforcing ethical standards.
translation.lug: Enkyukakyuka ezo, zijja kwetaaga okufulumizibwa Media Council mu mawulirile era ziweebwe olukusa buli mwaka era zibeeko amateeka agaziteekebwako.

translation.en: Under the Press and Journalist Amendment Bill 2010, any publication could have their licence revoked if it publishes injurious material.
translation.lug: Wansi w'etteeka erifuga bannamawulire erya 2010, omukutu gw'amawulire gusobola okuggyibwako layisinsi singa gufulumwa amawulire amakyamu.

translation.en: The Media Council would also be given authority to not only mediate but regulate any potential media violations.
translation.lug: Media Council yandiweeredwa obuyinza obutakoma ku kukwanaganya bukwanaganya wabula n'okuwera yenna avvoola amawulire.

translation.en: Joshua Kyalimpa, President of UJA and member of Article 29 Coalition, says the group has met with the Minister of Information.
translation.lug: Joshua Kyalimpa, Pulezidenti wa UJA era mmemba akkaanya n'akawaayiiro 29, agamba nti ekibiina kirina okusisinkana minisita w'ebyempuliziganya.

translation.en: Even Media Council Chairperson, Professor Goretti Nassanga, has expressed skepticism over the amendments in their current form.
translation.lug: Ne ssentebe wa Media Council, Pulofeesa Goretti Nassanga, yalaze okubuusabusa ku nkola eriwo.

translation.en: "I'm hoping that is not how the bill will turn out," says Professor Goretti.
translation.lug: Pulofeesa Gorretti agamba nti asuubira nti ebbago terijja kuvaamu ekyo kisuubirwa.

translation.en: Professor Goretti Nassanga went on to talk about the bill.
translation.lug: Pulofeesa Goretti Nassanga yageenze mu maaso n'okwogera ku bbago.

translation.en: Professor Nassanga added that the balance between media laws that promote national unity, "is still very touchy".
translation.lug: Pulofeesa Nassanga yayongeddeko nti omwenkanonkano wakati w'amateeka g'amawulire agatumbula obumu mu ggwanga tegakyakwatibwako.

translation.en: The Independent of September 03 - 09, 2010 reported about the Andrew Mwenda and Eastern Africa Media Institute sedition victory.
translation.lug: Independenti w'omu Gwomwenda nga 03 okutuuka nga 09, 2010 yawandiika ku Andrew Mwenda ne Eastern Africa Media Institute ku kuwangula omusango gw'okukuma omuliro mu bantu.

translation.en: "I was able to stay with ordinary prisoners and see the challenge of the prison system in Uganda".
translation.lug: Nasobola okubeera n'abasibe aba bulijjo ne ndaba okusoomoozebwa kw'amakomera mu Uganda.

translation.en: "The police were very nice to me, the president's son came to see me", Mwenda continued.
translation.lug: Mwenda yayongedeko nti abapoliisi baali balungi gyali, mutabani wa pulezidenti yajja okumulaba.

translation.en: Kanaabi is the acting executive secretary for Independent Media Council and the only Ugandan journalist ever convicted of sedition.
translation.lug: Kanaabi ye muwandiisi w'olukiiko lwa Media Council olw'etengeredde era nga ye munnamawulire wa Uganda yekka eyaakasingisibwa omusango gw'okukuma omuliro mu abantu.

translation.en: Haruna Kanaabi has been charged with sedition on two occasions.
translation.lug: Haruna Kanaabi avunaaniddwa olw'okukuma omuliro mu abantu emirundi ebiri.

translation.en: The first, in 1993, occurred after the Shariat newspaper mocked several ministers from trying to get support for Museveni.
translation.lug: Ogwasooka, mu 1993, gwaliwo oluvannyuma lw'eggulire lya Shariat okusosonkereza baminisita abawera obutafuna buganzi okuva owa Museveni.

translation.en: The opinion argued the ministers would have been better served sharing their encouraging words with Museveni's cows.
translation.lug: Ekiteeso ky'alaga nti baminisita bandikoze bulungi singa bagabananga ebigambo byabwe ebizzaamu amaanyi n'ente za Museveni.

translation.en: Kanaabi, who was subeditor of the paper, says he was only responsible for the article's headline.
translation.lug: Kanaabi eyali omusunsuzi w'olupapula, agamba nti ye yali avunaanyizibwa buvunanyizibwa ku mutwe gw'eggulire gwokka.

translation.en: The second occasion took place in 1996 after Museveni had toured Western Uganda and parts of Rwanda.
translation.lug: Omulundi ogwokubiri gwaliwo mu 1996 oluvannyuma lwa Museveni okulambula Obugwanjuba bwa Uganda n'ebitundu bya Rwanda.

translation.en: Museveni was quoted in the nation assuring the people of Rwanda that he was there to write a new history.
translation.lug: Museveni yawulirwa mu ggwanga ng'akakasa abantu b'e Rwanda nti yaliwo kuwandiika byafaayo bipya.

translation.en: Kanaabi recalls that he spoke as if he was the president of Rwanda.
translation.lug: Kanaabi ajjukira nti yayogera nga alinga nti ye Pulezidenti wa Rwanda.

translation.en: As a result, Shariat ran an opinion that mocked Museveni for turning Rwanda into Uganda's fourtieth district.
translation.lug: Ekyavaamu, Shariat yaleeta ekirowoozo ekyasikiriza Museveni okufuula Rwanda disitulikiti ya Uganda ey'ana.

translation.en: The same afternoon that the story came out, Kanaabi was arrested on charges of disobedience for a second time.
translation.lug: Mu ttuntu lye limu emboozi yafuluma nti Kanaabi yali akwatiddwa ku misango gy'okugyema omulundi ogwokubiri.

translation.en: Kanaabi as he was represented the original question says that Mwenda never went to jail.
translation.lug: Kanaabi bwe yaleetebwa, okwebuuza kuli nti Mwenda teyagenda mu kkomera.

translation.en: Luzira is a very different place.
translation.lug: Luzira kifo kya njawulo nnyo.

translation.en: Kanaabi explained that there were no visitors in Luzira.
translation.lug: Kanaabi yannyonnyola nti e Luzira tewaaliyo bagenyi.

translation.en: Kanaabi and others remained behind bars except from 8am to noon.
translation.lug: Kanaabi ne banne baasigala mu kaduukulu okuggyako okuva ku ssaawa bbiri ezookumakya okutuuka mu ttuntu.

translation.en: The cell that would house Kanaabi and seventy to eighty other prisoners would be closed permanently for the night by 3pm everyday.
translation.lug: Akaduukulu Kanaabi mwe yandibadde ne basibe banne abalala nsanvu mu munaana kaggalwanga ekiro okuva ssaawa mwenda buli lunaku.

translation.en: Kanaabi recalls that a man once collapsed from a heart condition and they still refused to open the cell.
translation.lug: Kanaabi ajjukira nti omusajja olumu yazirikako olw'embeera y'omutima naye era ne bagaana okuggulawo akaduukulu.

translation.en: Kanaabi says that at Luzira, the food is simply posho and beans and is served only once daily.
translation.lug: Kanaabi agamba nti e Luzira, emmere yaayo kawunga na bijanjaalo ate egabibwa omulundi gumu gwokka olunaku.

translation.en: But the hardest part for Kanaabi was the communal showers.
translation.lug: Naye ekyasinga okukaluubiriza ennyo Kanaabi bye binaabiro by'olukale.

translation.en: As a result, Kanaabi would resort to washing himself with a jerry can over the toilet in his cell.
translation.lug: Ekyava mu kino, Kanaabi yasalangawo okunaabisa akaddomola mu kabuyonjo y'omu kaduukulu ke.

translation.en: Kanaabi remained in Luzira for the duration of his four month trial.
translation.lug: Kanaabi yasigala e Luzira okumala emyezi gye ena ng'anoonyerezebwako.

translation.en: Although Kanaabi was found guilty of disobedience at the end of his trial, he was released by the officer in charge of the prison shortly afterward.
translation.lug: Newankubadde nga Kanaabi yasingisibwa omusango gw'obujeemu oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyerezebwako, yateebwa omukulu akulira ekkomera nga waakayita akaseera katono.

translation.en: Kanaabi's and Shariat's problems continued on the outside.
translation.lug: Ebizibu bya Kanaabi ne Shariat byeyongera nga bavuddeyo.

translation.en: Harassment and intimidation of reporters and Shariat vendors persisted.
translation.lug: Okutulugunyizibwa n'okutiisibwatiisibwa kwa bannamawulire ne ba Shariat Vendors kweyongera.

translation.en: The August 25 decision was a huge victory for Kanaabi and his colleagues but it still can't erase what has been stripped from him.
translation.lug: Nga 25 Ogwomunaana, okusalawo bwali buwanguzi bunene eri Kanaabi ne banne naye era  kizibu okuzzaawo ebimuggyiddwako.

translation.en: At the end of the interview, Kanaabi reflects back at the suffering he went through.
translation.lug: Ku nkomerero ya yintaaviyu, Kanaabi ajjukira okubonaabona kwe yayitamu.

translation.en: Haruna Kanaabi still reflects back at the suffering he went through while he was behind bars.
translation.lug: Haruna Kanaabi akyajjukira okubonaabona kwe yayitamu nga ali mabega wa mitayimbwa.

translation.en: Seven years after the ruling National Resistance Movement was registered as a political party.
translation.lug: Emyaka musanvu okuva ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya National Resistance Movement lwe kyawandiisibwa ng'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: Ofwono Opondo's insistence that NRM has an annual budget is promptly rejected by the admission of another senior party official.
translation.lug: Ofwono Opondo alemerako nti NRM erina embalirira y'omwaka eyagaanibwa oluvannyuma lw'okujja kw'omukungu w'ekibiina omulala.

translation.en: Captain Mike Mukula says that they don't have that budget and he has never had a budget for his activities, not even a shilling.
translation.lug: Kaputeeni Mike Mukula agamba nti tebalina mbalirira eyo era tabangako na mbalirira ya mirimu gye, wadde ne siringi.

translation.en: His defence is verified by another member of the National Executive Council, who declined to be named.
translation.lug: Obukuumi bwe bukakasibwa mmemba munne ow'olukiiko olufuzi eyagaanye okwasanguzibwa.

translation.en: Other political parties like the DP, UPC and FDC have annual budgets, which they recently passed.
translation.lug: Ebibiina eby'obufuzi ebirala nga DP, UPC ne FDC birina embalirira z'omwaka ze byakayisa gye buvuddeko.

translation.en: The UPC treasurer Peter Mukidi Walubiri says the party has a thirty three billion shillings budget for 2010/2011 ending next June.
translation.lug: Omuwanika wa UPC Peter Mukidi Walubiri agamba nti ekibiina kirina siringi obuwumbi asatu mu busatu obw'embalirira ya 2010/2011 ekoma Ogwomukaaga ogujja.

translation.en: The FDC Spokesperson Wafula Oguttu says the party's national conference passed a twenty three billion shillings budget in February this year.
translation.lug: Omwogezi wa FDC Wafula Oguttu agamba nti olukiiko ttabamiruka lwayisa embalirira ya siringi obuwumbi abiri mu busatu mu Gwokubiri gw'omwaka guno.

translation.en: The Democratic Party treasurer Issa Kikungwe too says his party's National Executive Committee recently passed a budget.
translation.lug: Omuwanika wa DP Issa Kikungwe naye agamba nti akakiiko k'ekibiina kye akoku ntikko kaayisa embalirira gye buvuddeko.

translation.en: It's the National Resistance Movement, Uganda's biggest political party, which does not have a budget among the top four political parties.
translation.lug: National Resistance Movement, ky'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekisinga obunene mu Uganda ekitalina mbalirira mu bibiina ebina ebisinga obunene.

translation.en: Neither is it officially funded by the government like in the case in Tanzania and South Africa where parties have business subsidiaries.
translation.lug: Tekivujjirirwa gavumenti nga bwe kiri mu Tanzania ne South Africa ebibiina gye birina bizinensi mwe biggya ssente.

translation.en: Except for the mid 1990s when NRM, previously called the "Movement system", set up Danze Enterprises Ltd as its trading arm.
translation.lug: Okuggyako mu masekkati ga 1990 NRM bwe yali eyitibwa omugendo bwe yatandikawo Danze Enterprises Ltd n'ettabi lyayo ery'obusuubuzi.

translation.en: Nathan Igeme Nabeta says that each of the NRM's members contributes one hundred thousand shillings to the party every month.
translation.lug: Nathan Igeme Nabeta agamba nti buli mmemba wa NRM awaayo emitwalo kkumi eri ekibiina buli mwezi.

translation.en: It cannot even finance one National Resistance Movement national conference in a year.
translation.lug: Tezisobola wadde okusasulira olukiiko ttabamiruka olwa National Resistance Movement mu mwaka.

translation.en: For instance the National Resistance Movement spent four million shillings.
translation.lug: Okugeza National Resistance Movement yasaasaanya siringi obukadde buna.

translation.en: NRM spent five billion shillings on allowances and transport of the thirty thousand delegates for the June 25 to June 27 conference this year.
translation.lug: NRM yasaasaanya siringi obuwumbi butaano ku nsako n'ebyentambula y'abakiise enkumi ssatu mu lukugaana olwa nga 25 Ogwomukaaga okutuuka nga 27 Ogwomukaaga omwaka guno.

translation.en: That's why, observers say, more than half of the NRM executive are either cabinet ministers or hold other big government jobs.
translation.lug: Eyo y'ensonga lwaki, abalabi bagamba, ettundutundu ly'abali ku kakiiko ka NRM ako ku ntikko baminisita oba balina emirimu emirala eminene mu gavumenti.

translation.en: NRMVice President, Proscovia Salaamu Musumba too says the National Resistance Movement's biggest financier is government.
translation.lug: Amyuka Pulezidenti wa NRM, Proscovia Salaamu Musumba naye agamba nti omuvujjirizi wa National Resistance Movement asinga ye gavumenti.
