translation.en: She says that those are the resources which are used to run the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Agamba nti ezo ssente zeeyambisibwa okuddukanya National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: This insistence is reinforced by Godber Tumushabe, Executive Director of the Advocates union for Development and Environment.
translation.lug: Okulemerako kuno kukubirizibwa Godber Tumushabe, ssenkulu wa Advocates Union for Development and Environment

translation.en: Tumushabe says that it is not possible to separate the National Resistance Movement as a party from the government.
translation.lug: Tumushabe agamba nti tekisoboka kwawula National Resistance Movement ng'ekibiina ku gavumenti.

translation.en: He says that the National Resistance Movement and its team are maintained through a carefully dodged funding system.
translation.lug: Agamba nti National Resistance Movement n'abantu baayo bakuumibwa mu kuvujjirirwa ensimbi ezibadde ez'okukola emirimu emirala.

translation.en: Seven percent of the 2010/11 budget has been allocated to the public administration sector, defence and security.
translation.lug: Ebitundu musanvu ku kikumi eby'embalirira ya 2010/11 bigenda ku mirimu egigasa abantu ebyokwerinda awamu n'obukuumi.

translation.en: For that reason, he says, it is not possible for the National Resistance Movement to be dominated by people who do not hold government jobs.
translation.lug: Ku lw'ensonga eyo, agamba nti, tekisoboka National Resistance Movement okujjulamu abantu abatalina mirimu mu gavumenti.

translation.en: For instance, without considering the President, more than half of the NRM's 22 Central Executive Committee officials are cabinet ministers.
translation.lug: Okugeza, ng'oggyeko Pulezidenti, okusinga ekitundu ky'abakungu ba NRM 22 abali ku kakiiko k'oku ntikko baminisita.

translation.en: The NRM National Chairman is President Yoweri Museveni and the 2nd National Vice Chairperson is Deputy Speaker of Parliament Rebecca Kadaga.
translation.lug: Ssentebe wa NRM ow'oku ntikko Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni n'amyuka ssentebe we owookubiri y'amyuka omwogezi wa paalamenti Rebecca Kadaga.

translation.en: The Secretary General is Security Minister Amama Mbabazi and his Deputy Dorothy Hyuha is Minister without Portfolio.
translation.lug: Ssaabawandiisi ye minisita w'ebyokwerinda Amama Mbabazi ate omumyuka we Dorothy Hyuha ye minisita atalina mulimu gwa nkalakkalira.

translation.en: The Chairperson of the National Resistance Movement Women's League is Education Minister Namirembe Bitamazire.
translation.lug: Ssentebe w'ekibiina ky'abakyala mu National Resistance Movement ye minisita w'ebyenjigiriza Namirembe Bitamazire.

translation.en: The chairman of the youth league is Abbas Agaba, a State House employee.
translation.lug: Ssentebe w'ekisinde ky'abavubuka ye Abbas Agaba, omukozi mu maka g'obwapulezidenti.

translation.en: The regional vice chairpersons general is only the first National Vice Chairman, Haji Moses Kigongo.
translation.lug: Abamyuka bassentebe b'ebitundu be bokka abamyuka ssentebe w'akakiiko, Haji Moses Kigongo.

translation.en: The captain is Moses Ali from the north.
translation.lug: Kaputeeni ye Moses Ali okuva mu bukiikakkono.

translation.en: Mike Mukula, Felistus Magomu, Treasurer Ndawula Kaweesi and his Deputy Katongole Singh do not hold cabinet jobs or senior government offices.
translation.lug: Mike Mukula, Felistus Magomu, omuwanika Ndawula Kaweesi n'omumyuka we Katongole Singh tebalina mirimu gya bwa minisita oba woofiisi za gavumenti enkulu.

translation.en: It is important to note that by October 2005 Muhwezi and Mukula were in cabinet when the NRM Central Executive Committee was elected.
translation.lug: Kya makulu okumanya nti nga 25 Ogwekkumi Muhwezi ne Mukula baali baminisita, olukiiko lwa NRM olw'oku ntikko we lwalondebwa.

translation.en: Muhwezi was the Minister for Health while Mukula was his deputy.
translation.lug: Muhwezi ye yali minisita w'ebyobulamu nga Mukula ye yali omumyuka we.

translation.en: But even members of the Central Executive Committee who don't hold government jobs are beneficiaries of huge government subsidies.
translation.lug: Naye era bammemba b'akakiiko ak'oku ntikko abatalina mirimu gya gavumenti baganyulwa nnyo mu bintu bya gavumenti.

translation.en: Hassan Basajjabalaba, has been a beneficiary of twenty one billion shillings soft loan from Bank of Uganda.
translation.lug: Hassan Basajjabalaba, aganyuddwa mu looni y'obuwumbi abiri mu kamu okuva mu bbanka ya Uganda enkulu.

translation.en: NRM offices whose heads luck profitable government offices are either dormant or in virtual limbo due to financial constraints.
translation.lug: Woofiisi za NRM ng'abazikulira tebalina mirimu gya gavumenti gifuna nnyo kiri nti tebafaayo oba nga balina obuzibu bw'ebyensimbi.

translation.en: They have not held a single meeting since they were formed in October 2005.
translation.lug: Tezituuzangayo lukiiko lwonna okuva lwe zaatandikibwawo mu Gwekkumi nga 2005.

translation.en: Major General Muhwezi, the Chairman of the Veterans League says that all the leagues have not held any meetings.
translation.lug: Mmeeja genero Muhwezi, ssentebe w'abaazirwanako agamba nti ebiwayi byonna tebinnatuuza nkugaana zonna.

translation.en: In a report to the National Executive Committee meeting of 12th January 2010, Mbabazi pointed out poor party.
translation.lug: Mu alipoota y'olukungaana lw'akakiiko ak'oku ntikko eya nga 12 Ogusooka 2010, Mbabazi yayogera ku kibiina ekyavu.

translation.en: Muhwezi said the Members of Parliament contributions are used for rent and facilitation of party branch offices countrywide.
translation.lug: Muhwezi yagamba nti ssente eziweebwayo ababaka ba Paalamenti zikozesebwa okupangisa n'okuvujjirira woofiisi z'amatabi g'ekibiina okwetooloola eggwanga lyonna.

translation.en: He mentioned the case of Rukungiri branch, which has gone for months without pay.
translation.lug: Yanokolayo ettabi ly'e Rukungiri, erimaze emyezi nga terisasula.

translation.en: However, Muhwezi blames this problem on disorganisation within the party.
translation.lug: Wabula, Muhwezi ekizibu kino akiteeka ku bintu ebitatambula bulungi mu kibiina.

translation.en: Dr Frank Nabwiso, says that the National Resistance Movement has over the years built a network through which it draws money.
translation.lug: Musawo Frank Nabwiso, agamba nti National Resistance Movement emyaka gyonna ebadde ezimba enkolagana mw'eggya ensimbi.

translation.en: When the Independent pressed him, he became hostile saying the law allows the NRM to protect the identity of its funders.
translation.lug: Independent bwe yamubuuza ennyo, yava mu mbeera ng'agamba nti etteeka likkiriza NRM obutayasanguza bavujjirizi baakyo.

translation.en: Opondo did not mention a contrary law that allows protection of sources of funding for a political party.
translation.lug: Opondo teyayogera tteeka likontana erikkiriza obutayasanguza makubo agavujjirira ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: Nabudere reminded the people that a new voters' register will be prepared next month.
translation.lug: Nabundere yajjukiza abantu nti enkalala z'abalonzi empaya zijja kuba zimaliriziddwa omwezi ogujja.

translation.en: He thanked the people of Jinja and Iganga for their efforts in arresting vehicles, which smuggle Uganda coffee.
translation.lug: Yasiima abantu b'e Jinja ne Iganga olwa kaweefube gwe baateekamu okukwata ebidduka ebikukusa emmwanyi za Uganda.

translation.en: Mr John Lyavala is the branch chairman.
translation.lug: Mw. Lyavala John ye ssentebe w'ettabi.

translation.en: Lwanga, urged the government to take a closer look at the back bone of the internal security forces.
translation.lug: Lwanga, yasaba gavumenti okwetegereza ennyo ensonga ezeesigamiziddwako ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda eby'omunda.

translation.en: According to the independent issue of September 03-09, 2010, John Howself stated that partnership is not the party's target.
translation.lug: Okusinziira Independent olwafuluma nga 03-09 Ogwomenda 2010, John Howself yategeeza nti omukago si kye kigendererwa ky'ekibiina.

translation.en: Nkurunzinza was returned to office unopposed for a second five year term amid a series of explosive attacks and allegations.
translation.lug: Nkurunzinza yazzibwa mu woofiisi nga tavuganyiziddwa ku kisanja eky'okubiri eky'emyaka etaano wakati mu kuwakanyizibwa n'okwogererwa.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress leader Olara Otunnu split from the Inter Party Cooperation amidst a disagreement.
translation.lug: Omukulembeze wa Uganda People's Congress, Olara Otunnu yava mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi wakati mu butakkaanya.

translation.en: The Federation for Democratic Change along with the Inter Party Cooperation parties seem confident.
translation.lug: Federation for Democratic Change wamu n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi balabika nga bamativu.

translation.en: The argument of the opposition about the Electoral Commission is a means to an end.
translation.lug: Ebyogerwa ab'oludda oluvuganya ku kakiiko k'ebyokulonda bya kubayamba okufuna bye beetaaga.

translation.en: Otunnu argues, the main cause of the UPC splits from the Inter Party Cooperation, is that President Museveni cannot be defeated.
translation.lug: Otunnu agamba, nti ensonga ekulu ereetedde UPC okuva mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi, Museveni tasobola kuwangulwa.

translation.en: The Democratic Party, now the Uganda People's Congress suggest that the opposition response in the lead up to the elections may be unlucky.
translation.lug: Democratic Party, kati Uganda People's Congress egamba enteekateeka z'oludda oluvuganya okugenda mu kalulu ziyinza obutaba na mukisa.

translation.en: The beating of peaceful protesters over this period has undoubtedly tarnished the National Resistance Movement's reputation.
translation.lug: Okukuba kw'abeekalakaasi mu mirembe mu kiseera kino tekibuusibwabuusibwa nti kyayonoona ekifaananyi kya National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: There are multitude of reports and public statements that express fear of violence in preparation for the polls in 2011.
translation.lug: Waliwo alipoota nnyigi n'ebyogerwa abantu ebiraga okutya obutabanguko mu kwetegekera okulonda kwa 2011.

translation.en: Human rights activists Samuel Olara says five years is a long time in politics.
translation.lug: Omulwanirizi w'eddembe ly'obuntu Samuel Olara agamba nti emyaka etaano kiseera kinene mu byobufuzi.

translation.en: When conditions are good, participation in Uganda's politics is the right thing to do.
translation.lug: Embeera bw'eba nga nnungi, okwenyigira mu byobufuzi bya Uganda kye kintu ekituufu okukola.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission has received billions of shillings to help it conduct a free and fair election.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kafunye obuwumbi bwa siringi okuyambako okutegeka akalulu k'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: No donor country has supported the opposition in criticising the unfairness of the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Tewali ggwanga ggabi lya buyambi liyambyeko b'oludda oluvuganya mu kuvumirira obutali bwenkanya bw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: With the opportunity of elections to satisfy donors only every five years, the decision to boycott the opposition is equates to castration.
translation.lug: Tewali ggwanga ggabi lya buyambi liyambyeko b'oludda oluvuganya mu kuvumirira obutali bwenkanya bw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: The Forum For Democratic Change leader's view in the Inter Party Coalition camp is based on his experience in the past elections.
translation.lug: Endowooza y'abakulemeze ba Forum for Democratic Change mu nkambi y'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi esinzidde ku bumanyirivu bwe mu kulonda okuyise.

translation.en: Besigye has been at the forefront of the fraudulent election problem in both the 2001 and 2006 elections.
translation.lug: Besigye abadde ku mwanjo nnyo mu buzibu bw'okulonda okutali kwa mazima mu kulonda kwa 2001 ne 2006.

translation.en: Despite claims to the contrary, the politics of Uganda is driving away from the current status of violence and intimidation.
translation.lug: Wadde nga waliwo ebyogerebwa ebyawukanako, ebyobufuzi bya Uganda bigenda biva ku mbeera eriwo ey'obusambattuko n'okutiisibwatiisibwa.

translation.en: Ugandans, adequately represented by an opposition, reasoned and coordinated, will not tolerate the political games of yesterday.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda, abakiikirirwa oludda oluvuganya, baayogera era ne baakwatagana, tebajja kuguminkiriza buzannyo bwa byabufuzi obw'eggulo.

translation.en: The strategic importance of the Electoral Commission is producing free and fair elections in Uganda.
translation.lug: Omugaso omukulu ogw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kwe kutegeka okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya mu Uganda.

translation.en: Like Burundi, this process is paramount to the long term political and social stability of the Uganda's future.
translation.lug: Nga Burundi, okulonda kuno kwa mugaso nnyo eri ebyobufuzi n'obutebenkevu bwa Uganda obw'omu maaso.

translation.en: Plural participation in this process therefore forms the basis for achieving peace and stability in Uganda.
translation.lug: Abangi okwetaba mu kino n'olw'ekyo kiteekawo omusingi gw'okutuuka ku mirembe n'obutebenkevu mu Uganda.

translation.en: John Howse is a student of Maters in Peace and Conflict Studies programme, Makerere University, studying political violence in electoral processes.
translation.lug: John Howse muyizi wa ddiguli eyookubiri mu ssomo ly'emirembe n'obukuubagano, Makerere University, okusoma obutabanguko mu byobufuzi mu kulonda.

translation.en: Kizza Besigye and Olara Otunnu advised Nkurunziza that the election avoidance will only eliminate opposition to the background.
translation.lug: Kizza Besigya ne Olara Otunu baawa Nkurunziza amagezi nti okwewala okulonda kijja kusaanyaawo oludda oluvuganya okuva mu gye lwava.

translation.en: Kony, Otti, Odyambo, Lukwiya, Abudema, Opio Makas, Ocan Bunia, Angola, Lotiba, and Labalpiny all spoke.
translation.lug: Kony, Otti, Odyambo, Lukwiya, Abudema, Opio Makas, Ocan Bunia, Angola, Lotiba, ne Labalpiny bonna baayogera.

translation.en: Kony sent out several small fighting groups.
translation.lug: Kony yasindika obubinja obulwanyi obw'enjawulo obutonotono.

translation.en: Kony had ordered Odyambo's group to make sure he stops and ambushes the Uganda People's Defense Force without fail.
translation.lug: Kony yali alagidde ekibinja kya Odyambo okufuba okulaba nti aziyiza wamu n'okulumba amagye ga Uganda People's Defence Force awatali kulemererwa.

translation.en: He later directed Odyambo to send some soldiers to him as soon as possible.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma yalagira Odyambo amasindikire abajaasi amangu ddala nga bwe kisoboka.

translation.en: He stated it clearly that the situation might worsen if Makas is destroyed before reaching him.
translation.lug: Yakirambika bulungi nti embeera eyinza okwonooneka singa Makas ey'onoonebwa nga tebannamutuukako.

translation.en: He ordered Lotiba to make sure he meets Makas by 0800hrs today, so they hurry to join him in his defence.
translation.lug: Yalagira Lotiba okufuba okulaba nga asisinkana Makas leero mu ssaawa 08:00, n'olw'ekyo baanguwe bamwegatteko okumukuuma.

translation.en: In reaction to Lukwiya's report, Kony directed him never to stay and continue communicating when the enemy is advancing towards him.
translation.lug: Mu kwanukula alipoota ya Lukwiya, Kony yamulagira obutaddamu kwogera na kugenda mu maaso na kwogera ng'omulabe amusemberera.

translation.en: Otti instructed Angola that he doesn't want to hear that Ojara has separated from him.
translation.lug: Otti yalagira Angola nti tayagala kuwulira nti Ojara amwawukanyeeko.

translation.en: Ocan Bunia closed down after he failed to read Kony clearly.
translation.lug: Ocan Bunia yaggalawo oluvannyuma lw'okulemererwa okutegeera obulungi Kony.

translation.en: Lukwiya reported that he was seriously being followed and attacked by the Uganda People's Defense Force.
translation.lug: Lukwiya yategeeza nti yali alondoolwa wamu n'okulumbibwa amagye ga Uganda People's Defense Force.

translation.en: Angola reported that Ojara had joined him.
translation.lug: Angola yategeeza nti Ojara yali amwegasseeko.

translation.en: He revealed that it was Caca who attacked Minakulu and robbed a mixture of drugs that can help them.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Caca ye yali alumbye Minakulu n'abba eddagala eryali lisobola okubayamba.

translation.en: He also revealed that he attacked Atine and the results were not bad.
translation.lug: Era yategeeza nti yalumba Atine era ebyavaamu tebyali bibi.

translation.en: He did not elaborate the issue.
translation.lug: Teyalambulula nsonga.

translation.en: Lotiba reported that his enemy is disturbing him and he could not stay on air.
translation.lug: Lotiba yategeeza nti omulabe we amutawaanya era yali tasobola kuyimirira mu bbanga.

translation.en: Kony seems to be preparing for his final showdown with the Uganda People's Defense Force.
translation.lug: Kony alabika okuba nga yeetegekera okusaanawo kwe ne Uganda People's Defense Force.

translation.en: It seems he cannot change location before he meets Makas to reinforce him with mainly food and drugs.
translation.lug: Kirabika nga tasobola kukyusa kifo nga tannaba kusisinkana Makas amwongeremu amaanyi okusinga mu mmere n'eddagala.

translation.en: This has forced him to put up a defence sending fighting groups to engage and ambush the advancing Uganda People's Defense Force.
translation.lug: Kino kimuwalirizza okuteekawo ekibinja ekirwanyi ekizzaayo obubaka okwenyigira wamu n'okukola ennumba ku Uganda People Defence Forces esembera.

translation.en: Kony has a habit of putting up a defence and then sneak out without the knowledge of his commanders in the defence.
translation.lug: Koni alina omuze gw'okuteekawo obukuumi oluvannyuma ne yeemulula ng'abaduumizi b'ebyokwerinda bye tebategedde

translation.en: He will stay about a kilometer plus with two or three soldiers who sit in a few meters from his location to hear him if he wants their services.
translation.lug: Ajja kubeera mu bbanga nga lya kkiromita n'abajaasi babiri oba basatu nga batuula kkiromita ntono okuva ku kifo w'ali okuwulira oba yeetaaga obuyambi bwabwe.

translation.en: It is up to Joseph to take action on the recommendations.
translation.lug: Kiri eri Joseph okubaako ky'akola ku bikkaanyizibwako.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Defense Force should put into consideration Kony's survival instinct.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Defense erina okufaayo ku kubaawo kwa Kony.

translation.en: Kony, Otti, Lukwiya, Ocan, Angola, Kapere, Abudema, Dominic, Lotiba, Labongo, Opio Makas, Odokonyero, Wodo, and Oyoo were all on air.
translation.lug: Kony, Otti, Lukwiya, Ocan, Angola, Kapere, Abudema, Dominic, Lotiba, Labongo, Opio Makas, Odokonyero, Wodo, ne Oyoo bonna baali mu bbanga.

translation.en: Kony directed Lukwiya Raska, who had already crossed into Sudan to move and pass through the area.
translation.lug: Kony yalagirira Lukwiya Raska, eyali amaze okuyingira mu Sudan atambule era ayite mu kitundu.

translation.en: Kony instructed all units with the support of weapons such as B10, SPG-912.
translation.lug: Kony yaragira ebibinja byonna nga biyambibwako ebyokulwanyisa nga B10, SPG-912.

translation.en: Museveni should be sent to Sudan to beef up his security.
translation.lug: Museveni alina okusindikibwa e Sudan ayongere amaanyi mu magye ge.

translation.en: President Museveni had a plan to destroy the Lord Resistance Army by deploying mobiles and gun ships at once.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yalina enteekateeka y'okusaanyawo Lord Resistance Army ng'ayungula emmeeri ezitambula era eziriko emmundu omulundi gumu.

translation.en: He instructed Otti to remove Alit from the command of a brigade to a lower post.
translation.lug: Yalagira Otti aggye Alit ku ddaala lya buligeediya amuzze ku ddaala erya wansiko.

translation.en: Labongo was instructed to take all the women of the Lord Resistance Army officers to Lakat.
translation.lug: Labongo yalagirwa okutwala abakyala bonna ab'abakungu ba Lord Resistance Army ewa Lakat.

translation.en: Otti revealed that he was attacked by the Uganda People's Defense Force and many of his soldiers were killed in action.
translation.lug: Otti yategeeza nti yalumbibwa Uganda People's Defense Force era abajaasi be bangi battibwa mu kulwanagana.

translation.en: Bigombe and Adek had peace talks with Kony.
translation.lug: Bigombe ne Adek baalina enjogerezeganya ez'emirembe ne Kony.

translation.en: Lakati was accused of not operating to the Lord Resistance Army's expectation and yet he had just been promoted.
translation.lug: Lakati yanenyezebwa olw'obutakolera ku bigendererwa bya Lord Resistance Army ate nga yali yaakakuzibwa.

translation.en: Labongo reported that he attacked the Kalabongo camp in the Namokora subcounty on June-3-2004.
translation.lug: Labongo yategeeza nti yalumba enkambi y'e Kalabongo mu ggombolola y'e Namokora nga 3 Ogwomukaaga 2004.

translation.en: He ambushed a vehicle on July-18-2004 and charged five liters of gun oil and thirty thousand shillings.
translation.lug: Yalumba ekidduka nga 18 Ogwomusanvu, 2004 n'aggyayo liita z'amafuta g'emmundu ttaano n'emitwalo gya siringi esatu.

translation.en: He further ambushed a vehicle on Madi-Opei road, in both incidents he charged both accumulators.
translation.lug: Yayongera n'alumba ekidduka ku luguudo lwa Madi-Opei, mu nnumba zombi yaggyamu ebintu bye bimu.

translation.en: He revealed that the havoc he did in Kalabongo is a revenge for what the Uganda People's Defense Force did to them.
translation.lug: Yategeeza nti obulabe obwo bwe yakola e Kalabongo kwali kuwoolera ku Uganda People's Defense kye yabakola.

translation.en: Abudema reported that he was off air because of pressure from the Uganda People's Defense Force which attacked him.
translation.lug: Abudama yategeeza nti teyali ku mukutu olw'okutya okuva ku Uganda People's Defense Force eyamulumba.

translation.en: Opio Makas reported that he was hit by a gunship injuring one soldier and killing one recruit and a child.
translation.lug: Opio Makas yategeeza nti yakubwa ekikompola ne kirumwa omusirikale omu ne kitta eyali yaakayingizibwa omu n'omwana.

translation.en: He informed Kony that four soldiers namely; Dwoka, Ongwere, Otto and Oroko where separated from Justine during the contact.
translation.lug: Yategeeza Kony nti abajaasi bana okwali; Dwoka, Ongwere, Otto ne Oroko baali baawukanyiziddwa ku Justine mu bulumbaganyi.

translation.en: Kapere is planning for a serious horror in revenge for the killing of his wife and the child.
translation.lug: Kapere ateekateeka olutalo olw'amaanyi ng'awoolera olw'okuttibwa kwa mukyala we n'omwana.

translation.en: He informed Labongo that he lost his uniform during the attack, so he should get him some pairs.
translation.lug: Yategeeza Kony nti abajaasi bana okwali; Dwoka, Ongwere, Otto ne Oroko baali baawukanyiziddwa ku Justine mu bulumbaganyi.

translation.en: Kony seems to be worried about the Lord Resistance Army stays in Uganda in big numbers.
translation.lug: Konny alabika okuba omweraliikirivu ku kubeera kwa Lord Resistance Army mu Uganda nga bangi.

translation.en: He thinks that they can easily weaken if pressed by the Uganda People's Defense Force.
translation.lug: Alowooza nti basobola mangu okuddamu singa banyigirizibwa Uganda People's Defense.

translation.en: He wants to discuss the way forward after the Sudan government change their offical stand on Lord Resistance Army.
translation.lug: Ayagala kuteesa ku kiddako oluvannyuma lwa gavumenti ya Sudan okukyusa ekyali kyasalibwawo ku Lord Resistancer Army.

translation.en: There are ongoing efforts by the state and President Kagame to intimidate the citizens into total silence.
translation.lug: Waliwo kaweefu agenda mu maaso wakati wa gavumenti ne Pulezidenti Kagame okutiisatiisa bannansi obutabaako kye boogera.

translation.en: In my 10 years of association with Rwanda, I have encountered many people who are reluctant to talk about politics.
translation.lug: Mu myaka gyange 10 nga nkwatagana ne Rwanda, nsisinkanye abantu bangi abateefiirayo kwogera ku byobufuzi.

translation.en: They include members and supporters of the ruling Rwanda Patriotic Front, former members and members of the armed forces.
translation.lug: Bano mulimu bammemba n'abawagizi b'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya Rwanda Patriotic Front, abaaliko mu magye n'abali mu magye.

translation.en: I have also met people, including President Kagame, who is open and willing to discuss any subject.
translation.lug: Era nsisinkanye abantu omuli Pulezidenti Kagame, omwerufu era omwetegefu okukubanya ebirowoozo ku nsonga yonna.

translation.en: Many are members and supporters of the Rwanda Patriotic Front including public officials serving in a wide range of institutions.
translation.lug: Bammemba bangi era abawagizi ba Rwanda Patriotic Front omuli n'abakungu ba gavumenti mu bitongole eby'enjawulo.

translation.en: He later directed Odyambo to send some soldiers to him as soon as possible.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma yalagira Odyambo amasindikire abajaasi amangu ddala nga bwe kisoboka.

translation.en: Nabudere reminded the people that a new voters' register will be prepared next month.
translation.lug: Nabundere yajjukiza abantu nti enkalala z'abalonzi empaya zijja kuba zimaliriziddwa omwezi ogujja.

translation.en: He thanked the people of Jinja and Iganga for their efforts in arresting vehicles, which smuggle Uganda coffee.
translation.lug: Yasiima abantu b'e Jinja ne Iganga olwa kaweefube gwe baateekamu okukwata ebidduka ebikukusa emmwanyi za Uganda.

translation.en: Mr John Lyavala is the branch chairman.
translation.lug: Mw. Lyavala John ye ssentebe w'ettabi.

translation.en: Lwanga, urged the government to take a closer look at the back bone of the internal security forces.
translation.lug: Lwanga, yasaba gavumenti okwetegereza ennyo ensonga ezeesigamiziddwako ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda ebyomunda.

translation.en: According to the independent issue of September 03-09, 2010, John Howself stated that partnership is not the party's target.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent olwafuluma nga 03-09 Ogwomwenda 2010, John Howself yategeeza nti omukago si kye kigendererwa ky'ekibiina.

translation.en: Nkurunzinza was returned to office unopposed for a second five year term amid a series of explosive attacks and allegations.
translation.lug: Nkurunzinza yazzibwa mu woofiisi nga tavuganyiziddwa ku kisanja ekyokubiri eky'emyaka etaano wakati mu kuwakanyizibwa n'okwogererwa.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress leader Olara Otunnu split from the Inter Party Cooperation amidst a disagreement.
translation.lug: Omukulembeze wa Uganda People's Congress, Olara Otunnu yava mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi wakati mu butakkaanya.

translation.en: The Federation for Democratic Change along with the Inter Party Cooperation parties seem confident.
translation.lug: Federation for Democratic Change wamu n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi balabika nga bamativu.

translation.en: The argument of the opposition about the Electoral Commission is a means to an end.
translation.lug: Ebyogerwa ab'oludda oluvuganya ku kakiiko k'ebyokulonda bya kubayamba okufuna bye beetaaga.

translation.en: Otunnu argues, the main cause of the UPC splits from the Inter Party Cooperation, is that President Museveni cannot be defeated.
translation.lug: Otunnu agamba, nti ensonga enkulu ereetedde UPC okuva mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi, Museveni tasobola kuwangulwa.

translation.en: The Democratic Party, now the Uganda People's Congress suggest that the opposition response in the lead up to the elections may be unlucky.
translation.lug: Democratic Party, kati Uganda People's Congress egamba enteekateeka z'oludda oluvuganya okugenda mu kalulu ziyinza obutaba na mukisa.

translation.en: The beating of peaceful protesters over this period has undoubtedly tarnished the National Resistance Movement's reputation.
translation.lug: Okukuba kw'abeekalakaasi mu mirembe mu kiseera kino tekibuusibwabuusibwa nti kyayonoona ekifaananyi kya National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: There are multitude of reports and public statements that express fear of violence in preparation for the polls in 2011.
translation.lug: Waliwo alipoota nnyigi n'ebyogerwa abantu ebiraga okutya obutabanguko mu kwetegekera okulonda kwa 2011.

translation.en: Human rights activists Samuel Olara says five years is a long time in politics.
translation.lug: Omulwanirizi w'eddembe ly'obuntu Samuel Olara agamba nti emyaka etaano kiseera kinene mu byobufuzi.

translation.en: When conditions are good, participation in Uganda's politics is the right thing to do.
translation.lug: Embeera bweba nga nnungi, okwenyigira mu byobufuzi bya Uganda kye kintu ekituufu okukola.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission has received billions of shillings to help it conduct a free and fair election.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kafunye obuwumbi bwa siringi okuyambako okutegeka akalulu k'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: No donor country has supported the opposition in criticising the unfairness of the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Tewali ggwanga ggabi lya buyambi liyambyeko ab'oludda oluvuganya mu kuvumirira obutali bwenkanya bw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: With the opportunity of elections to satisfy donors only every five years, the decision to boycott the opposition is equates to castration.
translation.lug: N'omukisa gw'okulonda okumatiza abagabi b'obuyambi buli myaka etaano gyokka, okusalawo okuzira oludda oluvuganya kyenkanyizibwa ku kulaawa.

translation.en: The Forum For Democratic Change leader's view in the Inter Party Coalition camp is based on his experience in the past elections.
translation.lug: Endowooza y'abakulembeze ba Forum for Democratic Change mu nkambi y'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi esinzidde ku bumanyirivu bwe mu kulonda okuyise.

translation.en: Besigye has been at the forefront of the fraudulent election problem in both the 2001 and 2006 elections.
translation.lug: Besigye abadde ku mwanjo nnyo mu buzibu bw'okulonda okutali kwa mazima mu kulonda kwa 2001 ne 2006.

translation.en: Despite claims to the contrary, the politics of Uganda is driving away from the current status of violence and intimidation.
translation.lug: Wadde nga waliwo ebyogerebwa ebyawukanako, ebyobufuzi bya Uganda bigenda biva ku mbeera eriwo ey'obusambattuko n'okutiisibwatiisibwa.

translation.en: Ugandans, adequately represented by an opposition, reasoned and coordinated, will not tolerate the political games of yesterday.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda, abakiikirirwa oludda oluvuganya, baayogera era ne baakwatagana, tebajja kuguminkiriza buzannyo bwa byabufuzi obw'eggulo.

translation.en: The strategic importance of the Electoral Commission is producing free and fair elections in Uganda.
translation.lug: Omugaso omukulu ogw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kwe kutegeka okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya mu Uganda.

translation.en: Like Burundi, this process is paramount to the long term political and social stability of the Uganda's future.
translation.lug: Nga Burundi, okulonda kuno kwa mugaso nnyo eri ebyobufuzi n'obutebenkevu bwa Uganda obw'omu maaso.

translation.en: Plural participation in this process therefore forms the basis for achieving peace and stability in Uganda.
translation.lug: Abangi okwetaba mu kino nolwekyo kiteekawo omusingi gw'okutuuka ku mirembe n'obutebenkevu mu Uganda.

translation.en: John Howse is a student of Maters in Peace and Conflict Studies programme, Makerere University, studying political violence in electoral processes.
translation.lug: John Howse muyizi wa ddiguli eyookubiri mu ssomo ly'emirembe n'obukuubagano, Makerere University, okusoma obutabanguko mu byobufuzi mu kulonda.

translation.en: Kizza Besigye and Olara Otunnu advised Nkurunziza that the election avoidance will only eliminate opposition to the background.
translation.lug: Kizza Besigya ne Olara Otunnu baawa Nkurunziza amagezi nti okwewala okulonda kijja kusaanyaawo oludda oluvuganya okuva mu gye lwava.

translation.en: Kony, Otti, Odyambo, Lukwiya, Abudema, Opio Makas, Ocan Bunia, Angola, Lotiba, and Labalpiny all spoke.
translation.lug: Kony, Otti, Odyambo, Lukwiya, Abudema, Opio Makas, Ocan Bunia, Angola, Lotiba, ne Labalpiny bonna baayogera.

translation.en: Kony sent out several small fighting groups.
translation.lug: Kony yasindika obubinja obulwanyi obw'enjawulo obutonotono.

translation.en: Kony had ordered Odyambo's group to make sure he stops and ambushes the Uganda People's Defense Force without fail.
translation.lug: Kony yali alagidde ekibinja kya Odyambo okufuba okulaba nti aziyiza wamu n'okulumba amagye ga Uganda People's Defence Force awatali kulemererwa.

translation.en: He stated it clearly that the situation might worsen if Makas is destroyed before reaching him.
translation.lug: Yakirambika bulungi nti embeera eyinza okwonooneka singa Makas eyonoonebwa nga tebannamutuukako.

translation.en: He ordered Lotiba to make sure he meets Makas by 0800hrs today, so they hurry to join him in his defence.
translation.lug: Yalagira Lotiba okufuba okulaba nga asisinkana Makas leero mu ssaawa 0800, nolwekyo baanguwe bamwegatteko okumukuuma.

translation.en: In reaction to Lukwiya's report, Kony directed him never to stay and continue communicating when the enemy is advancing towards him.
translation.lug: Mu kwanukula Alipoota ya Lukwiya, Kony yamulagira obutaddamu kwogera na kugenda mu maaso na kwogera ng'omulabe amusemberera.

translation.en: Otti instructed Angola that he doesn't want to hear that Ojara has separated from him.
translation.lug: Otti yalagira Angola nti tayagala kuwulira nti Ojara amwawukanyeeko.

translation.en: Ocan Bunia closed down after he failed to read Kony clearly.
translation.lug: Ocan Bunia yaggalawo oluvannyuma lw'okulemererwa okutegeera obulungi Kony.

translation.en: Lukwiya reported that he was seriously being followed and attacked by the Uganda People's Defense Force.
translation.lug: Lukwiya yategeeza nti yali alondoolwa wamu n'okulumbibwa amagye ga Uganda People's Defense Force.

translation.en: Angola reported that Ojara had joined him.
translation.lug: Angola yategeeza nti Ojara yali amwegasseeko.

translation.en: He revealed that it was Caca who attacked Minakulu and robbed a mixture of drugs that can help them.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Caca ye yali alumbye Minakulu n'abba eddagala eryali lisobola okubayamba.

translation.en: He also revealed that he attacked Atine and the results were not bad.
translation.lug: Era yategeeza nti yalumba Atine era ebyavaamu tebyali bibi.

translation.en: He did not elaborate the issue.
translation.lug: Teyalambulula nsonga.

translation.en: Lotiba reported that his enemy is disturbing him and he could not stay on air.
translation.lug: Lotiba yategeeza nti omulabe we amutawaanya era yali tasobola kuyimirira mu bbanga.

translation.en: Kony seems to be preparing for his final showdown with the Uganda People's Defense Force.
translation.lug: Kony alabika okuba nga yeetegekera okusaanawo kwe ne Uganda People's Defense Force.

translation.en: It seems he cannot change location before he meets Makas to reinforce him with mainly food and drugs.
translation.lug: Kirabika nga tasobola kukyusa kifo nga tannaba kusisinkana Makas amwongeremu amaanyi okusinga mu mmere n'eddagala.

translation.en: This has forced him to put up a defence sending fighting groups to engage and ambush the advancing Uganda People's Defense Force.
translation.lug: Kino kimuwalirizza okuteekawo ekibinja ekirwanyi ekizzaayo obubaka okwenyigira wamu n'okukola ennumba ku Uganda People Defence Forces esembera.

translation.en: Kony has a habit of putting up a defence and then sneak out without the knowledge of his commanders in the defence.
translation.lug: Kony alina omuze gw'okuteekawo obukuumi oluvannyuma ne yeemulula ng'abaduumizi b'ebyokwerinda bye tebategedde

translation.en: He will stay about a kilometer plus with two or three soldiers who sit in a few meters from his location to hear him if he wants their services.
translation.lug: Ajja kubeera mu bbanga nga lya kkiromita n'abajaasi babiri oba basatu nga batuula kkiromita ntono okuva ku kifo w'ali okuwulira oba yeetaaga obuyambi bwabwe.

translation.en: It is up to Joseph to take action on the recommendations.
translation.lug: Kiri eri Joseph okubaako ky'akola ku bikkaanyizibwako.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Defense Force should put into consideration Kony's survival instinct.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Defense erina okufaayo ku kubaawo kwa Kony.

translation.en: Kony, Otti, Lukwiya, Ocan, Angola, Kapere, Abudema, Dominic, Lotiba, Labongo, Opio Makas, Odokonyero, Wodo, and Oyoo were all on air.
translation.lug: Kony, Otti, Lukwiya, Ocan, Angola, Kapere, Abudema, Dominic, Lotiba, Labongo, Opio Makas, Odokonyero, Wodo, ne Oyoo bonna baali mu bbanga.

translation.en: Kony directed Lukwiya Raska, who had already crossed into Sudan to move and pass through the area.
translation.lug: Kony yalagirira Lukwiya Raska, eyali amaze okuyingira mu Sudan atambule era ayite mu kitundu.

translation.en: Kony instructed all units with the support of weapons such as B10, SPG-912.
translation.lug: Kony yaragira ebibinja byonna nga biyambibwako ebyokulwanyisa nga B10, SPG-912.

translation.en: Museveni should be sent to Sudan to beef up his security.
translation.lug: Museveni alina okusindikibwa e Sudan ayogere n'amagye ge.

translation.en: President Museveni had a plan to destroy the Lord Resistance Army by deploying mobiles and gun ships at once.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yalina enteekateeka y'okusaanyawo Lord Resistance Army ng'ayungula emmeeri ezitambula era eziriko emmundu omulundi gumu.

translation.en: He instructed Otti to remove Alit from the command of a brigade to a lower post.
translation.lug: Yalagira Otti aggye Alit ku ddaala lya buligeediya amuzze ku ddaala erya wansiko.

translation.en: Labongo was instructed to take all the women of the Lord Resistance Army officers to Lakat.
translation.lug: Labongo yalagirwa okutwala abakyala bonna ab'abakungu ba Lord Resistance Army ewa Lakat.

translation.en: Otti revealed that he was attacked by the Uganda People's Defense Force and many of his soldiers were killed in action.
translation.lug: Otti yategeeza nti yalumbibwa Uganda People's Defense Force era abajaasi be bangi battibwa mu kulwanagana.

translation.en: Bigombe and Adek had peace talks with Kony.
translation.lug: Bigombe ne Adek baalina enjogerezeganya ez'emirembe ne Kony.

translation.en: Lakati was accused of not operating to the Lord Resistance Army's expectation and yet he had just been promoted.
translation.lug: Lakati yanenyezebwa olw'obutakolera ku bigendererwa bya Lord Resistance Army ate nga yali yaakakuzibwa.

translation.en: Labongo reported that he attacked the Kalabongo camp in the Namokora subcounty on June-3-2004.
translation.lug: Labongo yategeeza nti yalumba enkambi y'e Kalabongo mu ggombolola y'e Namokora nga 3 Ogwomukaaga 2004.

translation.en: He ambushed a vehicle on July-18-2004 and charged five liters of gun oil and thirty thousand shillings.
translation.lug: Yalumba ekidduka nga 18 Ogwomusanvu, 2004 n'aggyayo liita z'amafuta g'emmundu ttaano n'emitwalo gya siringi esatu.

translation.en: He further ambushed a vehicle on Madi-Opei road, in both incidents he charged both accumulators.
translation.lug: Yayongera n'alumba ekidduka ku luguudo lwa Madi-Opei, mu nnumba zombi yaggyamu ebintu bye bimu.

translation.en: He revealed that the havoc he did in Kalabongo is a revenge for what the Uganda People's Defense Force did to them.
translation.lug: Yategeeza nti obulabe obwo bwe yakola e Kalabongo kwali kuwoolera ku Uganda People's Defense kye yabakola.

translation.en: Abudema reported that he was off air because of pressure from the Uganda People's Defense Force which attacked him.
translation.lug: Abudama yategeeza nti teyali ku mukutu olw'okutya okuva ku Uganda People's Defense Force eyamulumba.

translation.en: Opio Makas reported that he was hit by a gunship injuring one soldier and killing one recruit and a child.
translation.lug: Opio Makas yategeeza nti yakubwa ekikompola ne kirumya omusirikale omu ne kitta omu ku baali baakayingizibwa n'omwana.

translation.en: He informed Kony that four soldiers namely; Dwoka, Ongwere, Otto and Oroko where separated from Justine during the contact.
translation.lug: Yategeeza Kony nti abajaasi bana okwali; Dwoka, Ongwere, Otto ne Oroko baali baawukanyiziddwa ku Justine mu bulumbaganyi.

translation.en: Kapere is planning for a serious horror in revenge for the killing of his wife and the child.
translation.lug: Kapere ateekateeka olutalo olw'amaanyi ng'awoolera olw'okuttibwa kwa mukyala we n'omwana.

translation.en: He informed Labongo that he lost his uniform during the attack, so he should get him some pairs.
translation.lug: Yategeeza Labongo nti yabulwako yunifoomu ye mu bulumbaganyi, era alina okumufunirayo ebirala.

translation.en: Kony seems to be worried about the Lord Resistance Army stays in Uganda in big numbers.
translation.lug: Konny alabika okuba omweraliikirivu ku kubeera kwa Lord Resistance Army mu Uganda nga bangi.

translation.en: He thinks that they can easily weaken if pressed by the Uganda People's Defense Force.
translation.lug: Alowooza nti basobola mangu okuddamu singa banyigirizibwa Uganda People's Defense.

translation.en: He wants to discuss the way forward after the Sudan government change their offical stand on Lord Resistance Army.
translation.lug: Ayagala kuteesa ku kiddako oluvannyuma lwa gavumenti ya Sudan okukyusa ekyali kyasalibwawo ku Lord Resistance Army.

translation.en: There are ongoing efforts by the state and President Kagame to intimidate the citizens into total silence.
translation.lug: Waliwo kaweefube agenda mu maaso wakati wa gavumenti ne Pulezidenti Kagame okutiisatiisa bannansi obutabaako kye boogera.

translation.en: In my 10 years of association with Rwanda, I have encountered many people who are reluctant to talk about politics.
translation.lug: Mu myaka gyange 10 nga nkwatagana ne Rwanda, nsisinkanye abantu bangi abateefiirayo kwogera ku byobufuzi.

translation.en: They include members and supporters of the ruling Rwanda Patriotic Front, former members and members of the armed forces.
translation.lug: Bano mulimu bammemba n'abawagizi b'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya Rwanda Patriotic Front, abaaliko mu magye n'abali mu magye.

translation.en: I have also met people, including President Kagame, who is open and willing to discuss any subject.
translation.lug: Era nsisinkanye abantu omuli Pulezidenti Kagame, omwerufu era omwetegefu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga yonna.

translation.en: Many are members and supporters of the Rwanda Patriotic Front including public officials serving in a wide range of institutions.
translation.lug: Bammemba bangi era abawagizi ba Rwanda Patriotic Front omuli n'abakungu ba gavumenti mu bitongole eby'enjawulo.

translation.en: Rwandan government critics, some of whom have never been there or read anything about genocide never ask themselves this question.
translation.lug: Abakolokota Gavumenti y'e Rwanda abamu ku bbo tebabeerangayo oba okusoma ku kintu kyonna ekikwata ku kittabantu tebeebuuzangako kibuuzo kino.

translation.en: I have attended several public meetings where, before President Kagame speaks, people are given an opportunity to present their views on issues.
translation.lug: Neetabye mu nkungaana z'eggwanga eziwera gye ndabidde nga pulezidenti Kagame bw'aba tanayogera, abantu baweebwa omukisa okuwa ebirowoozo byabwe ku nsonga.

translation.en: The government of Rwanda also hosts an Annual National Dialogue attended by people from all walks of life.
translation.lug: Gavumenti y'e Rwanda era etegeka olukungana lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo olwa buli mwaka olwetabwamu abantu ab'engeri ez'enjawulo.

translation.en: The "climate of fear" claims have been used by some to explain large crowds during President Kagame's campaigns and on election day.
translation.lug: Embeera y'okutya egambibwa okuba nga ekozeseddwa abamu okunyonyola abantu abangi mu kampeyini za pulezidenti Kagame ne ku lunaku lw'okulonda.

translation.en: It seems the objective was to portray Rwandans as incapable of deciding on whether to attend election rallies or even vote.
translation.lug: Kirabika ekigendererwa kyali kya kulanga Abanyalwanda nga abatasobola kusalawo oba beetaba mu nkungaana kunoonya obululu oba n'okulonda.

translation.en: However, the large turn-outs by Diaspora Rwandans on election day and the resounding endorsement they gave to Kagame tell a different story.
translation.lug: Wabula, okukomawo ennyo kw'Abanyalwanda okuva mu nsi z'ebweru ku lunaku lw'okulonda n'engeri ey'amaanyi gye baawagiramu Kagame yayawukana ku ngeri ebintu gye byali bisuubirwa.

translation.en: Yet one ought not to stop at the popular endorsement that President Kagame has won.
translation.lug: Ate nga wandisuubidde nti tekyandikomye ku kuwagira Pulezidenti Kagame nti awangudde.

translation.en: Rwanda is the only country in the region that has demonstrated the organizational capacity to conduct transparent elections.
translation.lug: Rwanda lye ggwanga lyokka mu kitundu eriraze obusobozi bw'okuteekateeka akalulu ak'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: The enormity of this achievement becomes more striking when one considers Rwanda as 2nd poorest country among the East African countries.
translation.lug: Obuzibu bw'obuwanguzi buno bufuuka ekyewuunyisa ng'omuntu atwala Rwanda okuba eggwanga eryokubiri ku gasinga obwavu mu mawanga g'obuvanjuba bw'Afirika.

translation.en: In a recent profile of Kagame by the Financial Times of London, Tom Burgis, quoted; "he`s sitting on an ethnic time bomb."
translation.lug: Mu bikwata ku Kagame aba Financial Times of London bye baakamufulumyako, Tom Burgis, yagamba nti; "atudde ku bbomu enaatera okutulika."

translation.en: This claim is loved by diplomats and aid workers whose knowledge of Rwanda and interactions with locals are often superficial.
translation.lug: Okusaba kuno kwagalwa abakungu n'abagabi b'obuyambi ng'amagezi gabwe ku Rwanda n'okukwatagana ne bannansi gatera okuba amatuufu.

translation.en: It is argued that Rwanda is set to explode into violence any time.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti essaawa yonna Rwanda eyinza okubaamu obutabanguko essaawa yonna.

translation.en: The less restrained among them argue that those being denied a voice are the Hutu population.
translation.lug: Abatatulugunyizibwa nnyo mu bo bagamba nti abo abataweebwa mukisa gwa kwogera be Bahutu.

translation.en: I do not claim that Rwanda is guaranteed never to become unstable again.
translation.lug: Sigamba nti kyankomeredde nti Rwanda teriddamu kubaamu butabanguko.

translation.en: There is no guarantee that the Hutu are currently denied a voice.
translation.lug: Sikyankomeredde mu kiseera kino nti Abahutu tebawulirizibwa.

translation.en: If there are Hutu that have been denied a voice, it is those who aspire to exploit their identity for political purposes.
translation.lug: Bwewaba nga waliwo Abahutu nga baganiddwa okwogera, be bo abagala okukozesa ekyo kye bali ku lw'ensonga z'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: Frederick Golooba Mutebi said that he has listened to some women claiming that their husbands are in prison on genocide charges.
translation.lug: Frederick Golooba Mutebi yagamba nti awuliddeko abakazi abamu nga bagamba nti abaami baabwe bali mu kkomera ku misango gy'ekittabantu.

translation.en: It is important to note that even the Tutsi are not free to use ethnicity as a political tool.
translation.lug: Kya makulu okukitegeera nti n'Abatutsi tebalina ddembe okukozesa eggwanga ng'eky'okulwanyisa mu byobufuzi.

translation.en: The Rwandan government has been characterized as hostile to the press by media rights groups.
translation.lug: Ebitongole ebiryanirira eddembe lya bannamawulire bigamba nti gavumenti y'e Rwanda ebadde etyoboola nnyo eddembe ly'abannamawulire.

translation.en: As for President Kagame, the best label the France-based Reporters could come up with was ‚Äòmedia predator' or something to that effect.
translation.lug: Eri Pulezidenti Kagame, erinnya erisinga bannamawulire b'e France lye baalina okuvaayo nalyo liri‚ Äòmedia predator'.

translation.en: The media in Rwanda are much more restrained in their assessment of Kagame and his government compared to Uganda.
translation.lug: Amawulire mu Rwanda gateekebwamu amaanyi ku ngeri gye googeramu ku Kagame ne gavumenti ye bw'ogeraageranya ne Uganda.

translation.en: It is true that since the France based Reporters took over power, journalists have fled or been prosecuted for various offences.
translation.lug: Kituufu nti okuva omusasi w'amawulire asinziira mu Bufalansa lwe yafuna obuyinza, bannamawulire bawanganguse oba okuvunaanibwa emisango emingi .

translation.en: One journalist was murdered following what international media allege was his investigation into the shooting of Lt.Gen. Kayumba in South Africa.
translation.lug: Munnamawulire omu yatibwa olw'amawulire g'ensi yonna okugamba nti yali anoonyereza ku kukubibwa kwa Lt. Gen. Kayumba amasasi mu South Africa.

translation.en: Taken together without reference to context, these things easily raise questions about both President Kagame and his government.
translation.lug: Okutwalira awamu nga tetufudde ku mbeera, ebintu bino bireeta wo ebibuuzo ku Pulezidenti Kagame ne gavumenti ye.

translation.en: But there are also important aspects of Kagame's relationship with the media that critics do not talk about.
translation.lug: Era waliwo ensonga enkulu ez'enkolagana ya Kagame ne bannamawulire abakolokosi bye batoogerako.

translation.en: Kagame has also held many long meetings with members of the media fraternity, during which frank views have been exchanged.
translation.lug: Kagame atuuzizza enkungana enkungaana empanvu nnyingi ne bannamawulire mwe bawanyisiganyirizza ebirowoozo ebirungi.

translation.en: I have a recording of President Kagame condemning a government minister at one press conference.
translation.lug: Nina eddoboozi lya Pulezidenti Kagame ng'anenya minisita wa gavumenti mu lukungana lwa bannamawulire olumu.

translation.en: Kagame's view was that, it should be a matter for the courts to sort out between individual journalists and aggrieved parties.
translation.lug: Endowooza ya Kagame yali nti yalibadde nsonga ya kkooti okwawula wakati wa bannamawulire ssekinoomu n'ebibiina ebyemulugunya.

translation.en: Anyone in the media would know that it is divided over the criticisms rights groups throw at President Kagame and his government.
translation.lug: Oyo yenna ali mu mawulire yanditegedde nti kyawuddwamu eddembe ly'ebibinja abikolokota Pulezidenti Kagame ne gavumenti ye.

translation.en: At a media conference held in Rwanda in July this year, several journalists denounced the "self appointed champions of media freedom".
translation.lug: Mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire olwali e Rwanda mu Gwomusanvu omwaka guno, bannamawulire abawera bagaana abaali beeronda nga abawanguzi mu kulwanirira eddembe lya bannamawulire.

translation.en: It is not enough to argue that Kagame is a dictator and another genocide is likely unless freedom of speech is respected.
translation.lug: Tekimala kugamba nti Kagame nnakyemalira era ekittabantu ekirala kyandibaawo okuggyako ng'eddembe ly'okwogera lissiddwamu ekitiibwa.

translation.en: Rwanda's politics is heavily shaped by the country's history of periods of state-planned violence, ethnic and regional discrimination and restrictions.
translation.lug: Ebyobufuzi bya Rwanda byetooloolera nnyo ku byafaayo by'emivuyo ebitekebwawo gavumenti, amawanga, obusosoze mu bitundu n'obukwakkulizo.

translation.en: If we see the Hutu elect Kagame and Rwandan Patriotic Front, we should recall that they have been victims of dirty politics.
translation.lug: Bwe tulaba nga Abahutu balonda Kagame ne Rwandan Patriotic Front, tulina okujjukira nti babaddenga beenyigira mu byobufuzi ebijjudde emivuyo.

translation.en: There are things the post-genocide government, the Rwandan Patriotic Front and President Kagame could be criticized for.
translation.lug: Waliwo ebintu gavumenti eze oluvannyuma lw'ekittabantu, Rwandan Patriotic Front ne pulezidenti Kagame by'erina okunonyezebwako.

translation.en: They should also join Rwandans in celebrating the RPF's vast achievements which will leave a permanent imprint on the country.
translation.lug: Era balina okwegatta ku Banyalwanda mu kujaguza obuwanguzi kwa RPF's obujja okuleka omukululo ogw'olubeerera ku ggwanga.

translation.en: Kagame may not take them to that destination, but he has helped them navigate some of its most difficult stages.
translation.lug: Kagame ayinza obutabatuusa mu kifo ekyo wabula abayambyeko okubayisa mu biseera ebisinga okuba ebizibu.

translation.en: This is the last part of the "Rwandan secrets" commentary written by Senior Research Fellow at the Makerere Institute of Social Research.
translation.lug: Kino kyo kitundu ky'ebyama ekisembayo eky'emboozi ku Rwanda eyawandiikibwa Omunoonyereza omukuukuutivu era akola ne Makerere Institute of Social Research.

translation.en: Over the last years, he has conducted research for the Crisis States Research Centre at London School of Economics and Political Science.
translation.lug: Mu myaka egisembyeyo, akoze okunoonyereza ku kasandali akaaliyo ng'asinziira ku Crisis States Research Centre ku London School of Economics and Political Science.

translation.en: James Mangu lost more than his home in the Bududa landslides on March 1st, 2010.
translation.lug: James Mangu yafiirwa kingi okusinga amaka ge mu kubumbulukuka kw'ettaka e Bududa nga 1 Ogwokusatu 2010.

translation.en: Mangu explains that he lost his pride because of living amongst hovering houseflies ,halfnaked children at Bulucheke Internally Displaced Camp.
translation.lug: Mangu annyonnyola nti yafiirwa ekitiibwa kye olw'okubeera mu nkambi y'e Bulucheke erimu enswera eziwuuma n'abaana abambala ebiitundu.

translation.en: The former Nametsi resident said ,"I can no longer till the land to provide for my family."
translation.lug: Eyaliko omutuuze w'e Nametsi yagamba nti takyasobola kulima kubeezaawo maka ge.

translation.en: Mangu is just one of over eight thousand people that were left homeless as a result of the mudslides.
translation.lug: Mangu y'omu ku bantu abasoba mu kanaana abaalekebwa nga tebalina waakubeera oluvannyuma lw'amataba.

translation.en: Eighty nine people were killed and more than three hundred are still missing in the Mount Elgon village of Nametsi.
translation.lug: Abantu kinaana mu mwenda be battibwa n'abasuka mu bisatu tebannalabika ku kyalo ky'olusozi Elgon eky'e Nametsi.

translation.en: Atleast eight thousand one hundred seventy seven internally displaced persons live in Bulucheke camp, which lies on the east of Mount Elgon.
translation.lug: Waakiri abantu emitwalo munaana mu kikumi mu nsanvu mu musanvu abaasengulwa munda mu ggwanga babeera mu nkambi y'e Bulucheke esangibwa mu buvanjuba bw'olusozi Elgon.

translation.en: Bulucheke is plagued by bad sanitary conditions and rampant illness; malaria is taking its toll on children.
translation.lug: Embeera y'ebyobulamu mbi nnyo mu Bulucheke era n'omusujja mungi ng'omusujja gw'ensiri gutta abaana bangi.

translation.en: It is the only other option is Bududa Hospital but it's located fifteen kilometers from the camp.
translation.lug: Eky'okusalawo ekirala kyokka ly'e ddwaliro ly'e Bududa naye liri kkiromita kkumi na ttaano okuva ku nkambi.

translation.en: Students at the school inside the camp are drawn from three primary schools; Nametsi, Tunwatsi and Kitsatsa.
translation.lug: Abayizi mu nkambi basomera mu masomero aga pulayimale asatu okuli Nametsi, Tunwatsi ne Kitsatsa.

translation.en: The Uganda Red Cross Society is operating a trauma counseling centre in the camp.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya Uganda Red Cross Society kye kiddukanya ekifo ekibudaabuda abantu mu nkambi.

translation.en: Julius Weleka, the Bulucheke "Internally displaced persons" camp chairman, told the Independent that people are tired of terrible camp conditions.
translation.lug: Julius Weleka, sentebe w'enkambi y'e Bulucheke yagambye Independent nti abantu bakooye embeera z'omu nkambi embi .

translation.en: Dison Kuloba, a seventy year old farmer, broke his ribs and both his legs when he was buried in the landslides.
translation.lug: Dison Kuloba omulimi ow'emyaka ensanvu yamenyeka embirizi n'amagulu gombi bwe yaziikibwa ettaka eryabumbulukuka.

translation.en: Kuloba was discharged from Bududa Hospital on August 3rd after five months.
translation.lug: Kuloba yasiibulwa okuva mu ddwaliro ly'e Bududa nga ssatu Ogwomunaana oluvannyuma lw'emyezi etaano.

translation.en: Kuloba relies on the help of his grandchildren who now have to divide their time between school and caring for their grandfather.
translation.lug: Kuloba yeesigama ku buyambi bwa bazzukulu be abalina kati okugabanya obudde bwabwe wakati w'okusoma n'okulabirira jjajja waabwe.

translation.en: On March 3rd, President Museveni arrived in Bududa district by helicopter and promised shelter for the displaced.
translation.lug: Nga ssatu Ogwokusatu, Pulezidenti Museveni yatuuka mu disitulikiti y'e Bududa mu nnyonyi ya nnamunkanga n'asuubiza okufunira abaasengudwa aw'okubeera.

translation.en: He directed that everyone living in the villages of Tunwatsi, Mulwere and Kubewo be relocated to Bulecheke, Bubiita and Bududa district headquarters.
translation.lug: Yalagira nti buli abeera mu byalo by'e Tunwatsi, Mulwere ne Kubewo basengulwe bazzibwe e Bulucheke, Bubiita ne ku kitebe ekikulu ekya disitulikiti y'e Bududa.

translation.en: The OPM, which oversees the Ministry of Disaster Preparedness and Refugees, announced they would allocate shs 10 billion for resettlement.
translation.lug: Woofiisi ya Ssaabaminisita ekola ku minisitule y'ebigwa tebiraze n'abanoonyiboobubudamu yalangirira nti banditadde siringi obuwumbi kkumi mu kuteeka abantu mu kifo ekipya.

translation.en: A month after the president's visit, Minister for general duties, Janat Mukwaya, had a meeting with the eastern regional leaders in Mbale.
translation.lug: Nga wayiseewo omwezi bukyanga Pulezidenti akyalayo, minisita owa guno na guli, Janat Mukwaya yatuuza olukiiko n'abakulembeze b'ekitundu ky'e buvanjuba e Mbale.

translation.en: They proceeded to Bududa together and announced to the land slide victims that the government had already secured the required funds.
translation.lug: Beeyongerayo e Bududa era n'alangirira eri abaakosebwa okubumbulukuka kw'ettaka nti gavumenti yali yafuna dda ssente ezeetaagisa.

translation.en: On Aug 14th, the urgency of relocating Bududa survivors became more pressing following mudslides that killed 5 people in Bukibokolo subcounty.
translation.lug: Nga kkumi na nnya Ogwomunaana, obwetaavu bw'okusengula bakaawoonawo b'e Bududa kyafuuka nnyo esonga oluvannyuma lw'amataba okutta abantu bataano mu ggombolola y'e Bukibokolo.

translation.en: Bukibokolo was not planned for evacuations.
translation.lug: Bukibokolo yali tebaliddwa mu abo abagenda okusengulwa.

translation.en: This confirmed the call of subcounty leaders of Bududa landslide victims destined for Kiryandongo.
translation.lug: Kino kyakakasa obwetaavu bw'abakulembeze b'amagombolola g'abo abakosebwa okubumbulukuka kw'ettaka e Bududa okutwalibwa e Kiryandongo

translation.en: Bumayoka and Bukalasi and internally displaced persons at Bulucheke are to be included in the fourteen more landslide prone villages.
translation.lug: Bumayoka ne Bukalasi n'abantu abaasengulwa e Bulucheke bajja kugattibwa ku byalo ekkumi n'ebina ebirala ebyakosebwa okubumbulukuka kw'ettaka.

translation.en: The major mosquito pests in the South east United States seem to prefer the host odor of small herbivorous mammals or birds.
translation.lug: Ensiri ezisinga mu bukiikaddyo bw'obuvanjuba bwa United States zaagala nnyo ebisolo okusinga ebinyonyi.

translation.en: The losers in the National Resistance Movement primaries filed with the party's electoral commission at the secretariat.
translation.lug: Abaawangulwa mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement beeyiwa ku ggwandiisizo ly'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda ak'ekibiina.

translation.en: The new proposed age at which workers saving with National Social Security Fund should get their money is fourty five years.
translation.lug: Emyaka emiggya egiteekeddwateekeddwa abatereka ensimbi ne National Social Security Fund kwe balina okufunira ssente zaabwe giri ana mu etaano.

translation.en: Minister Kirunda Kivejinja will pay fourty million shillings to his political rival Abdu Katuntu as costs of the election petition he lost.
translation.lug: Minisita Kirunda Kiveijinja ajja kusasula obukadde ana eri gw'avuganya ennyo mu byobufuzi Abdu Katuntu ng'omutango ku kujulira mu kulonda ate n'awangulwa.

translation.en: There fifty heads of cattle which die of Nagana in Tororo every month.
translation.lug: Ente ataano ze zifa Nagana e Tororo buli mwezi.

translation.en: Makerere University Business School suspended fourty four students last week for reported examination malpractice.
translation.lug: Ettendekero lya Makerere University Business School lyagobye abayizi bana wiiki ewedde ku byekuusa ku kukoppa ebibuuzo.

translation.en: Twenty one Karimojong children among others received a blanket and a sweater each as a benefit from an Indian girl's donation.
translation.lug: Abaana Abakaramoja abiri mu omu n'abalala buli omu yafunye bulangiti n'essweta okuva mu bagabi b'obuyambi abayamba abaana abawala.

translation.en: According to Michael Kotlikoff, the fluorescence is associated with changes in calcium levels at the cellular level.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Michael Kotlikoff, enta y'ekitangaala okuva mu kintu, ekwatagana n'enkyukakyuka y'ekipimo kya Calcium ku kipimo ky'obutafaali bw'obulamu.

translation.en: He told Access Excellence that the fluorescence is proportional to the level of calcium in the cell.
translation.lug: Yagamba aba Access Excellence nti enta y'ekitangaala okuva mu kintu yenkanankana n'eddaala lya calcium mu butafaali bw'obulamu.

translation.en: How could the National Resistance Movement Electoral Commission announce that Nkalubo has defeated me with a difference of fourty three?
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda aka National Resistance Movement kalangirira katya nti Nkalubo ampangudde n'enjawulo ya ana mu busatu?

translation.en: The use and involvement of police, Uganda People's Defence Force and all other government departments following National Resistance Movement activities must stop.
translation.lug: Enkozesa n'okweyambisa Poliisi, Uganda People's Defence Force n'ebitongole bya Gavumenti ebirala mu mirimu gya National Resistance Movement kirina okukoma.

translation.en: FDC President Dr Kizza Besigye talking about the chaos that spoilt the recent National Resistance Movement primaries countrywide.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti wa FDC Dr Kizza Besigye ayogera ku buvuyo obwaliwo mu kulonda kw'akamyufu ka National Resistance Movement okwaliwo gye buvuddeko.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement is a mass political party which canot be managed well with the current centralized secretariat.
translation.lug: National Resistance Movement kibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekirimu abantu abangi abatasobola kuddukanyizibwa bulungi n'eggwandiisizo erimu.

translation.en: Vice President Gilbert Bukenya talking about the recent mess in the National Resistance Movement primaries .
translation.lug: Omumyuka wa Pulezidenti Gilbert Bukenya ng'ayogera ku nsobi ezaabaddewo gye buvuddeko mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: President Museveni warns losers in the NRM primaries who have vowed to stand as independents in next year's general elections.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni alabula abaawangulwa mu kamyufu ka NRM abeeweze okwesimbawo ku bwannamunigina mu kulonda kwa bonna okw'awamu omwaka ogujja.

translation.en: Rally winner, Ponsiano Lwakataka telling off his enemies who doubted his victory in the Jinja rally on September 12.
translation.lug: Eyawangudde empaka z'emmotoka z'empaka, Ponsiano Lwakataka ng'agamba abalabe be abaawakanya obuwanguzi bwe mu mpaka ezaali e Jinja nga 12 Ogwomwenda.

translation.en: We don't know how Mpuuma came to own the land which had been occupied by Uganda People's Defence Force since 1986.
translation.lug: Tetumanyi ngeri Mpuuma gye yajjamu okuba nannyini ttaka eribaddeko Uganda People's Defence Force okuva mu 1986.

translation.en: It seems there are people in the army who planned with Mpuuma to take advantage of public money.
translation.lug: Kirabika waliwo abantu mu magye abeekobaana ne Mpuuma okwezza ssente z'omuwi w'omusolo.

translation.en: Uganda People's Defence Force should have applied directly to Mpigi district for new rent since the government was already occupying the land.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Defence Force yandigenze butereevu ku disitulikiti y'e Mpigi okusobola okupangisa obuto bwe kiba nga gavumenti y'eri ku ttaka mu kiseera kino.

translation.en: Nandala Mafabi talked about the land at Lunyo in Entebbe which the Uganda People's Defence Force purchased from a private investor Mpuuma.
translation.lug: Nandala Mafabi yayogedde ku ttaka ly'e Lunyo ery'e Entebbe, Uganda People's Defence Force lye yagula okuva ku musigansimbi Mpuuma.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress president Olara Otunnu has launched a weekly newsletter.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti wa Uganda People's Congress Olara Otunnu atongozza enkola y'okufunirako amawulire buli wiiki.

translation.en: Police have said if Mike Ezra does not appear in court to pay his debts and tax liabilities as asked, they will arrest him wherever he is.
translation.lug: Poliisi egambye nti singa Mike Ezra talabikako mu kkooti okusasula amabanja ge n'emisolo egyamusabibwa, bajja kumukwatira yonna gy'anaaba.

translation.en: Ezra was reported to be abroad last week.
translation.lug: Ezra yali agambibwa okubeera ebweru w'eggwanga wiiki ewedde.

translation.en: Dozens of losing candidates have vowed to stand as independents in the 2011 elections.
translation.lug: Abeesimbyewo bangi beewera okujja ku bwannamunigina mu kulonda kwa 2011.

translation.en: If they do and win, they will constitute an equivalent of a splinter party from the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Singa bajja ne bawangula, bajja kuleetera okubaawo ekibiina ekirala mu National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Olara Otunnu and Dan Muliika on September 9 called upon Ugandans to remember the dead victims of the Buganda September 2009 riots.
translation.lug: Olara Otunu ne Dan Muliika nga 9 Ogwomwenda baakunga Bannayuganda okujjukira abantu abaafiira mu bwegugungo mu Buganda mu Gwomwenda gwa 2009.

translation.en: A lady was carried across a flooded road in Kampala on September 11.
translation.lug: Omukyala yaweekebwa okusazibwa oluguudo olwali lujjudde amazzi mu kampala nga 11 Ogwomwenda.

translation.en: Electoral Commisssion has a long battle to win opposition hearts From September 6 to 7 September .
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kalina olutalo lw'amaanyi okuwangula emitima gy'aboludda oluvuganya okuva nga 6 okutuuka nga 7 Ogwomwenda.

translation.en: At Collin Hotel, they discussed the Kiboko Squad, a paramilitary group that beats up opposition during demonstrations for political reforms.
translation.lug: Ku Collin Hotel, baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku Kibooko Squard, akabinja k'abajaasi akakuba ab'oludda oluvuganya nga beekalakaasa ku bikwata ku nkyukakyuka mu byobufuzi.

translation.en: They also criticized massive election rigging by the National Resistance Movement in the recent party primaries.
translation.lug: Era baavumirira okubba ennyo obululu mu kulonda kw'akamyufu ka National Resistance Movementi okwaliwo gye buvuddeko.

translation.en: Bindadi Ssali asked the Electoral Commission to call on the NRM to declare their source of finances for their many political activities.
translation.lug: Bidandi Ssali yasaba akakiiko k'ebyokulonda okuyita NRM ennyonnyole gy'eggya ensimbi z'ekozesa mu mirimu gy'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement has carried out national registration and primary elections for their members.
translation.lug: National Resistance Movement ewandiisizza enkalala z'abalonzi n'okulonda kw'akamyufu ka bammemba baayo.

translation.en: He said that Resident District Commissioners delegate themselves powers to stop people from addressing people on radio stations.
translation.lug: Yagambye nti ababaka ba Pulezidenti mu disitulikiti beewa obuyinza ne bagaana abantu okwogerako eri abantu ku mikutu gya laadiyo.

translation.en: Rubaramira Ruranga said that the Electoral Commission is trying to put up a fa√ßade that they are working with the opposition.
translation.lug: Rubaramira Ruranga yagamba nti akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kagezaako okwefuula nti kakola n'abooludda oluvuganya.
